40 include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT .'/core/lib/json.lib.php';

42 
54 function getDoliDBInstance($type, $host, $user, $pass, $name, $port)
55 {
56  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT ."/core/db/".$type.'.class.php';
57 
58  $class='DoliDB'.ucfirst($type);
59  $dolidb=new $class($type, $host, $user, $pass, $name, $port);
60  return $dolidb;
61 }
62 
80 function getEntity($element, $shared = 1, $currentobject = null)
81 {
82  global $conf, $mc;
83 
84  if (is_object($mc))
85  {
86  return $mc->getEntity($element, $shared, $currentobject);
87  }
88  else
89  {
90  $out='';
91  $addzero = array('user', 'usergroup', 'c_email_templates', 'email_template', 'default_values');
92  if (in_array($element, $addzero)) $out.= '0,';
93  $out.= $conf->entity;
94  return $out;
95  }
96 }
97 
104 function setEntity($currentobject)
105 {
106  global $conf, $mc;
107 
108  if (is_object($mc))
109  {
110  return $mc->setEntity($currentobject);
111  }
112  else
113  {
114  return ((is_object($currentobject) && $currentobject->id > 0 && $currentobject->entity > 0) ? $currentobject->entity : $conf->entity);
115  }
116 }
117 
134 function getBrowserInfo($user_agent)
135 {
136  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/includes/mobiledetect/mobiledetectlib/Mobile_Detect.php';
137 
138  $name='unknown';
139  $version='';
140  $os='unknown';
141  $phone = '';
142 
143  $detectmobile = new Mobile_Detect(null, $user_agent);
144  $tablet = $detectmobile->isTablet();
145 
146  if ($detectmobile->isMobile()) {
147 
148  $phone = 'unknown';
149 
150  // If phone/smartphone, we set phone os name.
151  if ($detectmobile->is('AndroidOS')) {
152  $os = $phone = 'android';
153  } elseif ($detectmobile->is('BlackBerryOS')) {
154  $os = $phone = 'blackberry';
155  } elseif ($detectmobile->is('iOS')) {
156  $os = 'ios';
157  $phone = 'iphone';
158  } elseif ($detectmobile->is('PalmOS')) {
159  $os = $phone = 'palm';
160  } elseif ($detectmobile->is('SymbianOS')) {
161  $os = 'symbian';
162  } elseif ($detectmobile->is('webOS')) {
163  $os = 'webos';
164  } elseif ($detectmobile->is('MaemoOS')) {
165  $os = 'maemo';
166  } elseif ($detectmobile->is('WindowsMobileOS') || $detectmobile->is('WindowsPhoneOS')) {
167  $os = 'windows';
168  }
169  }
170 
171  // OS
172  if (preg_match('/linux/i', $user_agent)) { $os='linux'; }
173  elseif (preg_match('/macintosh/i', $user_agent)) { $os='macintosh'; }
174  elseif (preg_match('/windows/i', $user_agent)) { $os='windows'; }
175 
176  // Name
177  if (preg_match('/firefox(\/|\s)([\d\.]*)/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name='firefox'; $version=$reg[2]; }
178  elseif (preg_match('/edge(\/|\s)([\d\.]*)/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name='edge'; $version=$reg[2]; }
179  elseif (preg_match('/chrome(\/|\s)([\d\.]+)/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name='chrome'; $version=$reg[2]; } // we can have 'chrome (Mozilla...) chrome x.y' in one string
180  elseif (preg_match('/chrome/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name='chrome'; }
181  elseif (preg_match('/iceweasel/i', $user_agent)) { $name='iceweasel'; }
182  elseif (preg_match('/epiphany/i', $user_agent)) { $name='epiphany'; }
183  elseif (preg_match('/safari(\/|\s)([\d\.]*)/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name='safari'; $version=$reg[2]; } // Safari is often present in string for mobile but its not.
184  elseif (preg_match('/opera(\/|\s)([\d\.]*)/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name='opera'; $version=$reg[2]; }
185  elseif (preg_match('/(MSIE\s([0-9]+\.[0-9]))|.*(Trident\/[0-9]+.[0-9];.*rv:([0-9]+\.[0-9]+))/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name='ie'; $version=end($reg); } // MS products at end
186  elseif (preg_match('/(Windows NT\s([0-9]+\.[0-9])).*(Trident\/[0-9]+.[0-9];.*rv:([0-9]+\.[0-9]+))/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name='ie'; $version=end($reg); } // MS products at end
187  elseif (preg_match('/l(i|y)n(x|ks)(\(|\/|\s)*([\d\.]+)/i', $user_agent, $reg)) { $name='lynxlinks'; $version=$reg[4]; }
188 
189  if ($tablet) {
190  $layout = 'tablet';
191  } elseif ($phone) {
192  $layout = 'phone';
193  } else {
194  $layout = 'classic';
195  }
196 
197  return array(
198  'browsername' => $name,
199  'browserversion' => $version,
200  'browseros' => $os,
201  'layout' => $layout,
202  'phone' => $phone,
203  'tablet' => $tablet
204  );
205 }
206 
212 function dol_shutdown()
213 {
214  global $conf,$user,$langs,$db;
215  $disconnectdone=false; $depth=0;
216  if (is_object($db) && ! empty($db->connected)) { $depth=$db->transaction_opened; $disconnectdone=$db->close(); }
217  dol_syslog("--- End access to ".$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"].(($disconnectdone && $depth)?' (Warn: db disconnection forced, transaction depth was '.$depth.')':''), (($disconnectdone && $depth)?LOG_WARNING:LOG_INFO));
218 }
219 
226 function GETPOSTISSET($paramname)
227 {
228  return (isset($_POST[$paramname]) || isset($_GET[$paramname]));
229 }
230 
255 function GETPOST($paramname, $check = 'none', $method = 0, $filter = null, $options = null, $noreplace = 0)
256 {
257  global $mysoc,$user,$conf;
258 
259  if (empty($paramname)) return 'BadFirstParameterForGETPOST';
260  if (empty($check))
261  {
262  dol_syslog("Deprecated use of GETPOST, called with 1st param = ".$paramname." and 2nd param is '', when calling page ".$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"], LOG_WARNING);
263  // Enable this line to know who call the GETPOST with '' $check parameter.
264  //var_dump(debug_backtrace()[0]);
265  }
266 
267  if (empty($method)) $out = isset($_GET[$paramname])?$_GET[$paramname]:(isset($_POST[$paramname])?$_POST[$paramname]:'');
268  elseif ($method==1) $out = isset($_GET[$paramname])?$_GET[$paramname]:'';
269  elseif ($method==2) $out = isset($_POST[$paramname])?$_POST[$paramname]:'';
270  elseif ($method==3) $out = isset($_POST[$paramname])?$_POST[$paramname]:(isset($_GET[$paramname])?$_GET[$paramname]:'');
271  else return 'BadThirdParameterForGETPOST';
272 
273  if (empty($method) || $method == 3 || $method == 4)
274  {
275  $relativepathstring = $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"];
276  // Clean $relativepathstring
277  if (constant('DOL_URL_ROOT')) $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^'.preg_quote(constant('DOL_URL_ROOT'), '/').'/', '', $relativepathstring);
278  $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^\//', '', $relativepathstring);
279  $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^custom\//', '', $relativepathstring);
280  //var_dump($relativepathstring);
281  //var_dump($user->default_values);
282 
283  // Code for search criteria persistence.
284  // Retrieve values if restore_lastsearch_values
285  if (! empty($_GET['restore_lastsearch_values'])) // Use $_GET here and not GETPOST
286  {
287  if (! empty($_SESSION['lastsearch_values_'.$relativepathstring])) // If there is saved values
288  {
289  $tmp=json_decode($_SESSION['lastsearch_values_'.$relativepathstring], true);
290  if (is_array($tmp))
291  {
292  foreach($tmp as $key => $val)
293  {
294  if ($key == $paramname) // We are on the requested parameter
295  {
296  $out=$val;
297  break;
298  }
299  }
300  }
301  }
302  // If there is saved contextpage, page or limit
303  if ($paramname == 'contextpage' && ! empty($_SESSION['lastsearch_contextpage_'.$relativepathstring]))
304  {
305  $out = $_SESSION['lastsearch_contextpage_'.$relativepathstring];
306  }
307  elseif ($paramname == 'page' && ! empty($_SESSION['lastsearch_page_'.$relativepathstring]))
308  {
309  $out = $_SESSION['lastsearch_page_'.$relativepathstring];
310  }
311  elseif ($paramname == 'limit' && ! empty($_SESSION['lastsearch_limit_'.$relativepathstring]))
312  {
313  $out = $_SESSION['lastsearch_limit_'.$relativepathstring];
314  }
315  }
316  // Else, retreive default values if we are not doing a sort
317  elseif (! isset($_GET['sortfield'])) // If we did a click on a field to sort, we do no apply default values. Same if option MAIN_ENABLE_DEFAULT_VALUES is not set
318  {
319  if (! empty($_GET['action']) && $_GET['action'] == 'create' && ! isset($_GET[$paramname]) && ! isset($_POST[$paramname]))
320  {
321  // Search default value from $object->field
322  global $object;
323  if (is_object($object) && isset($object->fields[$paramname]['default']))
324  {
325  $out = $object->fields[$paramname]['default'];
326  }
327  }
328  if (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_ENABLE_DEFAULT_VALUES))
329  {
330  if (! empty($_GET['action']) && (preg_match('/^create/', $_GET['action']) || preg_match('/^presend/', $_GET['action'])) && ! isset($_GET[$paramname]) && ! isset($_POST[$paramname]))
331  {
332  // Now search in setup to overwrite default values
333  if (! empty($user->default_values)) // $user->default_values defined from menu 'Setup - Default values'
334  {
335  if (isset($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['createform']))
336  {
337  foreach($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['createform'] as $defkey => $defval)
338  {
339  $qualified = 0;
340  if ($defkey != '_noquery_')
341  {
342  $tmpqueryarraytohave=explode('&', $defkey);
343  $tmpqueryarraywehave=explode('&', dol_string_nohtmltag($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']));
344  $foundintru=0;
345  foreach($tmpqueryarraytohave as $tmpquerytohave)
346  {
347  if (! in_array($tmpquerytohave, $tmpqueryarraywehave)) $foundintru=1;
348  }
349  if (! $foundintru) $qualified=1;
350  //var_dump($defkey.'-'.$qualified);
351  }
352  else $qualified = 1;
353 
354  if ($qualified)
355  {
356  //var_dump($user->default_values[$relativepathstring][$defkey]['createform']);
357  if (isset($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['createform'][$defkey][$paramname]))
358  {
359  $out = $user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['createform'][$defkey][$paramname];
360  break;
361  }
362  }
363  }
364  }
365  }
366  }
367  // Management of default search_filters and sort order
368  //elseif (preg_match('/list.php$/', $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"]) && ! empty($paramname) && ! isset($_GET[$paramname]) && ! isset($_POST[$paramname]))
369  elseif (! empty($paramname) && ! isset($_GET[$paramname]) && ! isset($_POST[$paramname]))
370  {
371  if (! empty($user->default_values)) // $user->default_values defined from menu 'Setup - Default values'
372  {
373  //var_dump($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]);
374  if ($paramname == 'sortfield' || $paramname == 'sortorder') // Sorted on which fields ? ASC or DESC ?
375  {
376  if (isset($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['sortorder'])) // Even if paramname is sortfield, data are stored into ['sortorder...']
377  {
378  foreach($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['sortorder'] as $defkey => $defval)
379  {
380  $qualified = 0;
381  if ($defkey != '_noquery_')
382  {
383  $tmpqueryarraytohave=explode('&', $defkey);
384  $tmpqueryarraywehave=explode('&', dol_string_nohtmltag($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']));
385  $foundintru=0;
386  foreach($tmpqueryarraytohave as $tmpquerytohave)
387  {
388  if (! in_array($tmpquerytohave, $tmpqueryarraywehave)) $foundintru=1;
389  }
390  if (! $foundintru) $qualified=1;
391  //var_dump($defkey.'-'.$qualified);
392  }
393  else $qualified = 1;
394 
395  if ($qualified)
396  {
397  $forbidden_chars_to_replace=array(" ","'","/","\\",":","*","?","\"","<",">","|","[","]",";","="); // we accept _, -, . and ,
398  foreach($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['sortorder'][$defkey] as $key => $val)
399  {
400  if ($out) $out.=', ';
401  if ($paramname == 'sortfield')
402  {
403  $out.=dol_string_nospecial($key, '', $forbidden_chars_to_replace);
404  }
405  if ($paramname == 'sortorder')
406  {
407  $out.=dol_string_nospecial($val, '', $forbidden_chars_to_replace);
408  }
409  }
410  //break; // No break for sortfield and sortorder so we can cumulate fields (is it realy usefull ?)
411  }
412  }
413  }
414  }
415  elseif (isset($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['filters']))
416  {
417  foreach($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['filters'] as $defkey => $defval) // $defkey is a querystring like 'a=b&c=d', $defval is key of user
418  {
419  $qualified = 0;
420  if ($defkey != '_noquery_')
421  {
422  $tmpqueryarraytohave=explode('&', $defkey);
423  $tmpqueryarraywehave=explode('&', dol_string_nohtmltag($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']));
424  $foundintru=0;
425  foreach($tmpqueryarraytohave as $tmpquerytohave)
426  {
427  if (! in_array($tmpquerytohave, $tmpqueryarraywehave)) $foundintru=1;
428  }
429  if (! $foundintru) $qualified=1;
430  //var_dump($defkey.'-'.$qualified);
431  }
432  else $qualified = 1;
433 
434  if ($qualified)
435  {
436  if (isset($_POST['sall']) || isset($_POST['search_all']) || isset($_GET['sall']) || isset($_GET['search_all']))
437  {
438  // We made a search from quick search menu, do we still use default filter ?
439  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_DEFAULT_FILTER_FOR_QUICK_SEARCH))
440  {
441  $forbidden_chars_to_replace=array(" ","'","/","\\",":","*","?","\"","<",">","|","[","]",";","="); // we accept _, -, . and ,
442  $out = dol_string_nospecial($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['filters'][$defkey][$paramname], '', $forbidden_chars_to_replace);
443  }
444  }
445  else
446  {
447  $forbidden_chars_to_replace=array(" ","'","/","\\",":","*","?","\"","<",">","|","[","]",";","="); // we accept _, -, . and ,
448  $out = dol_string_nospecial($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['filters'][$defkey][$paramname], '', $forbidden_chars_to_replace);
449  }
450  break;
451  }
452  }
453  }
454  }
455  }
456  }
457  }
458  }
459 
460  // Substitution variables for GETPOST (used to get final url with variable parameters or final default value with variable parameters)
461  // Example of variables: __DAY__, __MONTH__, __YEAR__, __MYCOMPANY_COUNTRY_ID__, __USER_ID__, ...
462  // We do this only if var is a GET. If it is a POST, may be we want to post the text with vars as the setup text.
463  if (! is_array($out) && empty($_POST[$paramname]) && empty($noreplace))
464  {
465  $maxloop=20; $loopnb=0; // Protection against infinite loop
466  while (preg_match('/__([A-Z0-9]+_?[A-Z0-9]+)__/i', $out, $reg) && ($loopnb < $maxloop)) // Detect '__ABCDEF__' as key 'ABCDEF' and '__ABC_DEF__' as key 'ABC_DEF'. Detection is also correct when 2 vars are side by side.
467  {
468  $loopnb++; $newout = '';
469 
470  if ($reg[1] == 'DAY') { $tmp=dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $newout = $tmp['mday']; }
471  elseif ($reg[1] == 'MONTH') { $tmp=dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $newout = $tmp['mon']; }
472  elseif ($reg[1] == 'YEAR') { $tmp=dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $newout = $tmp['year']; }
473  elseif ($reg[1] == 'PREVIOUS_DAY') { $tmp=dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $tmp2=dol_get_prev_day($tmp['mday'], $tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']); $newout = $tmp2['day']; }
474  elseif ($reg[1] == 'PREVIOUS_MONTH') { $tmp=dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $tmp2=dol_get_prev_month($tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']); $newout = $tmp2['month']; }
475  elseif ($reg[1] == 'PREVIOUS_YEAR') { $tmp=dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $newout = ($tmp['year'] - 1); }
476  elseif ($reg[1] == 'NEXT_DAY') { $tmp=dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $tmp2=dol_get_next_day($tmp['mday'], $tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']); $newout = $tmp2['day']; }
477  elseif ($reg[1] == 'NEXT_MONTH') { $tmp=dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $tmp2=dol_get_next_month($tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']); $newout = $tmp2['month']; }
478  elseif ($reg[1] == 'NEXT_YEAR') { $tmp=dol_getdate(dol_now(), true); $newout = ($tmp['year'] + 1); }
479  elseif ($reg[1] == 'MYCOMPANY_COUNTRY_ID' || $reg[1] == 'MYCOUNTRY_ID' || $reg[1] == 'MYCOUNTRYID')
480  {
481  $newout = $mysoc->country_id;
482  }
483  elseif ($reg[1] == 'USER_ID' || $reg[1] == 'USERID')
484  {
485  $newout = $user->id;
486  }
487  elseif ($reg[1] == 'USER_SUPERVISOR_ID' || $reg[1] == 'SUPERVISOR_ID' || $reg[1] == 'SUPERVISORID')
488  {
489  $newout = $user->fk_user;
490  }
491  elseif ($reg[1] == 'ENTITY_ID' || $reg[1] == 'ENTITYID')
492  {
493  $newout = $conf->entity;
494  }
495  else $newout = ''; // Key not found, we replace with empty string
496  //var_dump('__'.$reg[1].'__ -> '.$newout);
497  $out = preg_replace('/__'.preg_quote($reg[1], '/').'__/', $newout, $out);
498  }
499  }
500 
501  // Check is done after replacement
502  switch ($check)
503  {
504  case 'none':
505  break;
506  case 'int': // Check param is a numeric value (integer but also float or hexadecimal)
507  if (! is_numeric($out)) { $out=''; }
508  break;
509  case 'intcomma':
510  if (preg_match('/[^0-9,-]+/i', $out)) $out='';
511  break;
512  case 'alpha':
513  if (! is_array($out))
514  {
515  $out=trim($out);
516  // '"' is dangerous because param in url can close the href= or src= and add javascript functions.
517  // '../' is dangerous because it allows dir transversals
518  if (preg_match('/"/', $out)) $out='';
519  elseif (preg_match('/\.\.\//', $out)) $out='';
520  }
521  break;
522  case 'san_alpha':
523  $out=filter_var($out, FILTER_SANITIZE_STRING);
524  break;
525  case 'aZ':
526  if (! is_array($out))
527  {
528  $out=trim($out);
529  if (preg_match('/[^a-z]+/i', $out)) $out='';
530  }
531  break;
532  case 'aZ09':
533  if (! is_array($out))
534  {
535  $out=trim($out);
536  if (preg_match('/[^a-z0-9_\-\.]+/i', $out)) $out='';
537  }
538  break;
539  case 'aZ09comma': // great to sanitize sortfield or sortorder params that can be t.abc,t.def_gh
540  if (! is_array($out))
541  {
542  $out=trim($out);
543  if (preg_match('/[^a-z0-9_\-\.,]+/i', $out)) $out='';
544  }
545  break;
546  case 'array':
547  if (! is_array($out) || empty($out)) $out=array();
548  break;
549  case 'nohtml': // Recommended for most scalar parameters
550  $out=dol_string_nohtmltag($out, 0);
551  break;
552  case 'alphanohtml': // Recommended for search parameters
553  if (! is_array($out))
554  {
555  $out=trim($out);
556  // '"' is dangerous because param in url can close the href= or src= and add javascript functions.
557  // '../' is dangerous because it allows dir transversals
558  if (preg_match('/"/', $out)) $out='';
559  elseif (preg_match('/\.\.\//', $out)) $out='';
560  $out=dol_string_nohtmltag($out);
561  }
562  break;
563  case 'custom':
564  if (empty($filter)) return 'BadFourthParameterForGETPOST';
565  $out=filter_var($out, $filter, $options);
566  break;
567  }
568 
569  // Code for search criteria persistence.
570  // Save data into session if key start with 'search_' or is 'smonth', 'syear', 'month', 'year'
571  if (empty($method) || $method == 3 || $method == 4)
572  {
573  if (preg_match('/^search_/', $paramname) || in_array($paramname, array('sortorder','sortfield')))
574  {
575  //var_dump($paramname.' - '.$out.' '.$user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['filters'][$paramname]);
576 
577  // We save search key only if $out not empty that means:
578  // - posted value not empty, or
579  // - if posted value is empty and a default value exists that is not empty (it means we did a filter to an empty value when default was not).
580 
581  if ($out != '') // $out = '0' or 'abc', it is a search criteria to keep
582  {
583  $user->lastsearch_values_tmp[$relativepathstring][$paramname]=$out;
584  }
585  }
586  }
587 
588  return $out;
589 }
590 
591 
592 if (! function_exists('dol_getprefix'))
593 {
602  function dol_getprefix($mode = '')
603  {
604  global $conf;
605 
606  // If prefix is for email
607  if ($mode == 'email')
608  {
609  if (! empty($conf->global->MAIL_PREFIX_FOR_EMAIL_ID)) // If MAIL_PREFIX_FOR_EMAIL_ID is set (a value initialized with a random value is recommended)
610  {
611  if ($conf->global->MAIL_PREFIX_FOR_EMAIL_ID != 'SERVER_NAME') return $conf->global->MAIL_PREFIX_FOR_EMAIL_ID;
612  elseif (isset($_SERVER["SERVER_NAME"])) return $_SERVER["SERVER_NAME"];
613  }
614 
615  // The recommended value (may be not defined for old versions)
616  if (! empty($conf->file->instance_unique_id)) return $conf->file->instance_unique_id;
617 
618  // For backward compatibility
619  return dol_hash(DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.DOL_URL_ROOT, '3');
620  }
621 
622  // The recommended value (may be not defined for old versions)
623  if (! empty($conf->file->instance_unique_id)) return $conf->file->instance_unique_id;
624 
625  // For backward compatibility
626  if (isset($_SERVER["SERVER_NAME"]) && isset($_SERVER["DOCUMENT_ROOT"]))
627  {
628  return dol_hash($_SERVER["SERVER_NAME"].$_SERVER["DOCUMENT_ROOT"].DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.DOL_URL_ROOT, '3');
629  }
630 
631  return dol_hash(DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.DOL_URL_ROOT, '3');
632  }
633 }
634 
645 function dol_include_once($relpath, $classname = '')
646 {
647  global $conf,$langs,$user,$mysoc; // Do not remove this. They must be defined for files we include. Other globals var must be retreived with $GLOBALS['var']
648 
649  $fullpath = dol_buildpath($relpath);
650 
651  if (!file_exists($fullpath)) {
652  dol_syslog('functions::dol_include_once Tried to load unexisting file: '.$relpath, LOG_WARNING);
653  return false;
654  }
655 
656  if (! empty($classname) && ! class_exists($classname)) {
657  return include $fullpath;
658  } else {
659  return include_once $fullpath;
660  }
661 }
662 
663 
674 function dol_buildpath($path, $type = 0, $returnemptyifnotfound = 0)
675 {
676  global $conf;
677 
678  $path=preg_replace('/^\//', '', $path);
679 
680  if (empty($type)) // For a filesystem path
681  {
682  $res = DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/'.$path; // Standard default path
683  if (is_array($conf->file->dol_document_root))
684  {
685  foreach ($conf->file->dol_document_root as $key => $dirroot) // ex: array("main"=>"/home/main/htdocs", "alt0"=>"/home/dirmod/htdocs", ...)
686  {
687  if ($key == 'main')
688  {
689  continue;
690  }
691  if (file_exists($dirroot.'/'.$path))
692  {
693  $res=$dirroot.'/'.$path;
694  return $res;
695  }
696  }
697  }
698  if ($returnemptyifnotfound) // Not found into alternate dir
699  {
700  if ($returnemptyifnotfound == 1 || ! file_exists($res)) return '';
701  }
702  }
703  else // For an url path
704  {
705  // We try to get local path of file on filesystem from url
706  // Note that trying to know if a file on disk exist by forging path on disk from url
707  // works only for some web server and some setup. This is bugged when
708  // using proxy, rewriting, virtual path, etc...
709  $res='';
710  if ($type == 1) $res = DOL_URL_ROOT.'/'.$path; // Standard value
711  if ($type == 2) $res = DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT.'/'.$path; // Standard value
712  if ($type == 3) $res = DOL_URL_ROOT.'/'.$path;
713 
714  foreach ($conf->file->dol_document_root as $key => $dirroot) // ex: array(["main"]=>"/home/main/htdocs", ["alt0"]=>"/home/dirmod/htdocs", ...)
715  {
716  if ($key == 'main')
717  {
718  if ($type == 3)
719  {
720  global $dolibarr_main_url_root;
721 
722  // Define $urlwithroot
723  $urlwithouturlroot=preg_replace('/'.preg_quote(DOL_URL_ROOT, '/').'$/i', '', trim($dolibarr_main_url_root));
724  $urlwithroot=$urlwithouturlroot.DOL_URL_ROOT; // This is to use external domain name found into config file
725  //$urlwithroot=DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT; // This is to use same domain name than current
726 
727  $res=(preg_match('/^http/i', $conf->file->dol_url_root[$key])?'':$urlwithroot).'/'.$path; // Test on start with http is for old conf syntax
728  }
729  continue;
730  }
731  preg_match('/^([^\?]+(\.css\.php|\.css|\.js\.php|\.js|\.png|\.jpg|\.php)?)/i', $path, $regs); // Take part before '?'
732  if (! empty($regs[1]))
733  {
734  //print $key.'-'.$dirroot.'/'.$path.'-'.$conf->file->dol_url_root[$type].'<br>'."\n";
735  if (file_exists($dirroot.'/'.$regs[1]))
736  {
737  if ($type == 1)
738  {
739  $res=(preg_match('/^http/i', $conf->file->dol_url_root[$key])?'':DOL_URL_ROOT).$conf->file->dol_url_root[$key].'/'.$path;
740  }
741  if ($type == 2)
742  {
743  $res=(preg_match('/^http/i', $conf->file->dol_url_root[$key])?'':DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT).$conf->file->dol_url_root[$key].'/'.$path;
744  }
745  if ($type == 3)
746  {
747  global $dolibarr_main_url_root;
748 
749  // Define $urlwithroot
750  $urlwithouturlroot=preg_replace('/'.preg_quote(DOL_URL_ROOT, '/').'$/i', '', trim($dolibarr_main_url_root));
751  $urlwithroot=$urlwithouturlroot.DOL_URL_ROOT; // This is to use external domain name found into config file
752  //$urlwithroot=DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT; // This is to use same domain name than current
753 
754  $res=(preg_match('/^http/i', $conf->file->dol_url_root[$key])?'':$urlwithroot).$conf->file->dol_url_root[$key].'/'.$path; // Test on start with http is for old conf syntax
755  }
756  break;
757  }
758  }
759  }
760  }
761 
762  return $res;
763 }
764 
775 function dol_clone($object, $native = 0)
776 {
777  if (empty($native))
778  {
779  $myclone=unserialize(serialize($object));
780  }
781  else
782  {
783  $myclone = clone $object; // PHP clone is a shallow copy only, not a real clone, so properties of references will keep references (refer to the same target/variable)
784  }
785 
786  return $myclone;
787 }
788 
798 function dol_size($size, $type = '')
799 {
800  global $conf;
801  if (empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen)) return $size;
802  if ($type == 'width' && $size > 250) return 250;
803  else return 10;
804 }
805 
806 
817 function dol_sanitizeFileName($str, $newstr = '_', $unaccent = 1)
818 {
819  // List of special chars for filenames are defined on page https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/fileio/naming-a-file
820  $filesystem_forbidden_chars = array('<', '>', '/', '\\', '?', '*', '|', '"', ':', '°');
821  return dol_string_nospecial($unaccent?dol_string_unaccent($str):$str, $newstr, $filesystem_forbidden_chars);
822 }
823 
834 function dol_sanitizePathName($str, $newstr = '_', $unaccent = 1)
835 {
836  $filesystem_forbidden_chars = array('<','>','?','*','|','"','°');
837  return dol_string_nospecial($unaccent?dol_string_unaccent($str):$str, $newstr, $filesystem_forbidden_chars);
838 }
839 
848 function dol_string_unaccent($str)
849 {
850  if (utf8_check($str))
851  {
852  // See http://www.utf8-chartable.de/
853  $string = rawurlencode($str);
854  $replacements = array(
855  '%C3%80' => 'A','%C3%81' => 'A','%C3%82' => 'A','%C3%83' => 'A','%C3%84' => 'A','%C3%85' => 'A',
856  '%C3%88' => 'E','%C3%89' => 'E','%C3%8A' => 'E','%C3%8B' => 'E',
857  '%C3%8C' => 'I','%C3%8D' => 'I','%C3%8E' => 'I','%C3%8F' => 'I',
858  '%C3%92' => 'O','%C3%93' => 'O','%C3%94' => 'O','%C3%95' => 'O','%C3%96' => 'O',
859  '%C3%99' => 'U','%C3%9A' => 'U','%C3%9B' => 'U','%C3%9C' => 'U',
860  '%C3%A0' => 'a','%C3%A1' => 'a','%C3%A2' => 'a','%C3%A3' => 'a','%C3%A4' => 'a','%C3%A5' => 'a',
861  '%C3%A7' => 'c',
862  '%C3%A8' => 'e','%C3%A9' => 'e','%C3%AA' => 'e','%C3%AB' => 'e',
863  '%C3%AC' => 'i','%C3%AD' => 'i','%C3%AE' => 'i','%C3%AF' => 'i',
864  '%C3%B1' => 'n',
865  '%C3%B2' => 'o','%C3%B3' => 'o','%C3%B4' => 'o','%C3%B5' => 'o','%C3%B6' => 'o',
866  '%C3%B9' => 'u','%C3%BA' => 'u','%C3%BB' => 'u','%C3%BC' => 'u',
867  '%C3%BF' => 'y'
868  );
869  $string=strtr($string, $replacements);
870  return rawurldecode($string);
871  }
872  else
873  {
874  // See http://www.ascii-code.com/
875 $string = strtr(
876  $str,
877  "\xC0\xC1\xC2\xC3\xC4\xC5\xC7
878  \xC8\xC9\xCA\xCB\xCC\xCD\xCE\xCF\xD0\xD1
879  \xD2\xD3\xD4\xD5\xD8\xD9\xDA\xDB\xDD
880  \xE0\xE1\xE2\xE3\xE4\xE5\xE7\xE8\xE9\xEA\xEB
881  \xEC\xED\xEE\xEF\xF0\xF1\xF2\xF3\xF4\xF5\xF8
882  \xF9\xFA\xFB\xFC\xFD\xFF",
883  "AAAAAAC
884  EEEEIIIIDN
885  OOOOOUUUY
886  aaaaaaceeee
887  iiiidnooooo
888  uuuuyy"
889  );
890  $string = strtr($string, array("\xC4"=>"Ae", "\xC6"=>"AE", "\xD6"=>"Oe", "\xDC"=>"Ue", "\xDE"=>"TH", "\xDF"=>"ss", "\xE4"=>"ae", "\xE6"=>"ae", "\xF6"=>"oe", "\xFC"=>"ue", "\xFE"=>"th"));
891  return $string;
892  }
893 }
894 
906 function dol_string_nospecial($str, $newstr = '_', $badcharstoreplace = '')
907 {
908  $forbidden_chars_to_replace=array(" ", "'", "/", "\\", ":", "*", "?", "\"", "<", ">", "|", "[", "]", ",", ";", "=", '°'); // more complete than dol_sanitizeFileName
909  $forbidden_chars_to_remove=array();
910  if (is_array($badcharstoreplace)) $forbidden_chars_to_replace=$badcharstoreplace;
911  //$forbidden_chars_to_remove=array("(",")");
912 
913  return str_replace($forbidden_chars_to_replace, $newstr, str_replace($forbidden_chars_to_remove, "", $str));
914 }
915 
916 
925 function dol_escape_js($stringtoescape, $mode = 0, $noescapebackslashn = 0)
926 {
927  // escape quotes and backslashes, newlines, etc.
928  $substitjs=array("&#039;"=>"\\'","\r"=>'\\r');
929  //$substitjs['</']='<\/'; // We removed this. Should be useless.
930  if (empty($noescapebackslashn)) { $substitjs["\n"]='\\n'; $substitjs['\\']='\\\\'; }
931  if (empty($mode)) { $substitjs["'"]="\\'"; $substitjs['"']="\\'"; }
932  elseif ($mode == 1) $substitjs["'"]="\\'";
933  elseif ($mode == 2) { $substitjs['"']='\\"'; }
934  elseif ($mode == 3) { $substitjs["'"]="\\'"; $substitjs['"']="\\\""; }
935  return strtr($stringtoescape, $substitjs);
936 }
937 
938 
948 function dol_escape_htmltag($stringtoescape, $keepb = 0, $keepn = 0)
949 {
950  // escape quotes and backslashes, newlines, etc.
951  $tmp=html_entity_decode($stringtoescape, ENT_COMPAT, 'UTF-8'); // TODO Use htmlspecialchars_decode instead, that make only required change for html tags
952  if (! $keepb) $tmp=strtr($tmp, array("<b>"=>'','</b>'=>''));
953  if (! $keepn) $tmp=strtr($tmp, array("\r"=>'\\r',"\n"=>'\\n'));
954  return htmlentities($tmp, ENT_COMPAT, 'UTF-8'); // TODO Use htmlspecialchars instead, that make only required change for html tags
955 }
956 
957 
964 function dol_strtolower($utf8_string)
965 {
966  return mb_strtolower($utf8_string, "UTF-8");
967 }
968 
975 function dol_strtoupper($utf8_string)
976 {
977  return mb_strtoupper($utf8_string, "UTF-8");
978 }
979 
980 
1002 function dol_syslog($message, $level = LOG_INFO, $ident = 0, $suffixinfilename = '', $restricttologhandler = '', $logcontext = null)
1003 {
1004  global $conf, $user, $debugbar;
1005 
1006  // If syslog module enabled
1007  if (empty($conf->syslog->enabled)) return;
1008 
1009  if ($ident < 0)
1010  {
1011  foreach ($conf->loghandlers as $loghandlerinstance)
1012  {
1013  $loghandlerinstance->setIdent($ident);
1014  }
1015  }
1016 
1017  if (! empty($message))
1018  {
1019  // Test log level
1020  $logLevels = array(LOG_EMERG=>'EMERG', LOG_ALERT=>'ALERT', LOG_CRIT=>'CRITICAL', LOG_ERR=>'ERR', LOG_WARNING=>'WARN', LOG_NOTICE=>'NOTICE', LOG_INFO=>'INFO', LOG_DEBUG=>'DEBUG');
1021  if (! array_key_exists($level, $logLevels))
1022  {
1023  throw new Exception('Incorrect log level');
1024  }
1025  if ($level > $conf->global->SYSLOG_LEVEL) return;
1026 
1027  $message = preg_replace('/password=\'[^\']*\'/', 'password=\'hidden\'', $message); // protection to avoid to have value of password in log
1028 
1029  // If adding log inside HTML page is required
1030  if ((! empty($_REQUEST['logtohtml']) && ! empty($conf->global->MAIN_ENABLE_LOG_TO_HTML))
1031  || (! empty($user->rights->debugbar->read) && is_object($debugbar)))
1032  {
1033  $conf->logbuffer[] = dol_print_date(time(), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")." ".$logLevels[$level]." ".$message;
1034  }
1035 
1036  //TODO: Remove this. MAIN_ENABLE_LOG_INLINE_HTML should be deprecated and use a log handler dedicated to HTML output
1037  // If html log tag enabled and url parameter log defined, we show output log on HTML comments
1038  if (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_ENABLE_LOG_INLINE_HTML) && ! empty($_GET["log"]))
1039  {
1040  print "\n\n<!-- Log start\n";
1041  print $message."\n";
1042  print "Log end -->\n";
1043  }
1044 
1045  $data = array(
1046  'message' => $message,
1047  'script' => (isset($_SERVER['PHP_SELF'])? basename($_SERVER['PHP_SELF'], '.php') : false),
1048  'level' => $level,
1049  'user' => ((is_object($user) && $user->id) ? $user->login : false),
1050  'ip' => false
1051  );
1052 
1053  // This is when server run behind a reverse proxy
1054  if (!empty($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'])) $data['ip'] = $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'].(empty($_SERVER["REMOTE_ADDR"])?'':'->'.$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']);
1055  // This is when server run normally on a server
1056  elseif (! empty($_SERVER["REMOTE_ADDR"])) $data['ip'] = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'];
1057  // This is when PHP session is ran inside a web server but not inside a client request (example: init code of apache)
1058  elseif (! empty($_SERVER['SERVER_ADDR'])) $data['ip'] = $_SERVER['SERVER_ADDR'];
1059  // This is when PHP session is ran outside a web server, like from Windows command line (Not always defined, but useful if OS defined it).
1060  elseif (! empty($_SERVER['COMPUTERNAME'])) $data['ip'] = $_SERVER['COMPUTERNAME'].(empty($_SERVER['USERNAME'])?'':'@'.$_SERVER['USERNAME']);
1061  // This is when PHP session is ran outside a web server, like from Linux command line (Not always defined, but usefull if OS defined it).
1062  elseif (! empty($_SERVER['LOGNAME'])) $data['ip'] = '???@'.$_SERVER['LOGNAME'];
1063  // Loop on each log handler and send output
1064  foreach ($conf->loghandlers as $loghandlerinstance)
1065  {
1066  if ($restricttologhandler && $loghandlerinstance->code != $restricttologhandler) continue;
1067  $loghandlerinstance->export($data, $suffixinfilename);
1068  }
1069  unset($data);
1070  }
1071 
1072  if ($ident > 0)
1073  {
1074  foreach ($conf->loghandlers as $loghandlerinstance)
1075  {
1076  $loghandlerinstance->setIdent($ident);
1077  }
1078  }
1079 }
1080 
1081 
1095 function dol_fiche_head($links = array(), $active = '0', $title = '', $notab = 0, $picto = '', $pictoisfullpath = 0, $morehtmlright = '', $morecss = '')
1096 {
1097  print dol_get_fiche_head($links, $active, $title, $notab, $picto, $pictoisfullpath, $morehtmlright, $morecss);
1098 }
1099 
1113 function dol_get_fiche_head($links = array(), $active = '', $title = '', $notab = 0, $picto = '', $pictoisfullpath = 0, $morehtmlright = '', $morecss = '')
1114 {
1115  global $conf, $langs, $hookmanager;
1116 
1117  $out="\n".'<div class="tabs" data-role="controlgroup" data-type="horizontal">'."\n";
1118 
1119  if ($morehtmlright) $out.='<div class="inline-block floatright tabsElem">'.$morehtmlright.'</div>'; // Output right area first so when space is missing, text is in front of tabs and not under.
1120 
1121  // Show title
1122  $showtitle=1;
1123  if (! empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen)) $showtitle=0;
1124  if (! empty($title) && $showtitle)
1125  {
1126  $limittitle=30;
1127  $out.='<a class="tabTitle">';
1128  if ($picto) $out.=img_picto($title, ($pictoisfullpath?'':'object_').$picto, '', $pictoisfullpath).' ';
1129  $out.='<span class="tabTitleText">'.dol_trunc($title, $limittitle).'</span>';
1130  $out.='</a>';
1131  }
1132 
1133  // Define max of key (max may be higher than sizeof because of hole due to module disabling some tabs).
1134  $maxkey=-1;
1135  if (is_array($links) && ! empty($links))
1136  {
1137  $keys=array_keys($links);
1138  if (count($keys)) $maxkey=max($keys);
1139  }
1140 
1141  if (! empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen)) $conf->global->MAIN_MAXTABS_IN_CARD=2;
1142 
1143  // Show tabs
1144  $bactive=false;
1145  // if =0 we don't use the feature
1146  $limittoshow=(empty($conf->global->MAIN_MAXTABS_IN_CARD)?99:$conf->global->MAIN_MAXTABS_IN_CARD);
1147  $displaytab=0;
1148  $nbintab=0;
1149  $popuptab=0; $outmore='';
1150  for ($i = 0 ; $i <= $maxkey ; $i++)
1151  {
1152  if ((is_numeric($active) && $i == $active) || (! empty($links[$i][2]) && ! is_numeric($active) && $active == $links[$i][2]))
1153  {
1154  // If active tab is already present
1155  if ($i >= $limittoshow) $limittoshow--;
1156  }
1157  }
1158 
1159  for ($i = 0 ; $i <= $maxkey ; $i++)
1160  {
1161  if ((is_numeric($active) && $i == $active) || (! empty($links[$i][2]) && ! is_numeric($active) && $active == $links[$i][2]))
1162  {
1163  $isactive=true;
1164  $bactive=true;
1165  }
1166  else
1167  {
1168  $isactive=false;
1169  }
1170 
1171  if ($i < $limittoshow || $isactive)
1172  {
1173  $out.='<div class="inline-block tabsElem'.($isactive ? ' tabsElemActive' : '').((! $isactive && ! empty($conf->global->MAIN_HIDE_INACTIVETAB_ON_PRINT))?' hideonprint':'').'"><!-- id tab = '.(empty($links[$i][2])?'':$links[$i][2]).' -->';
1174  if (isset($links[$i][2]) && $links[$i][2] == 'image')
1175  {
1176  if (!empty($links[$i][0]))
1177  {
1178  $out.='<a class="tabimage'.($morecss?' '.$morecss:'').'" href="'.$links[$i][0].'">'.$links[$i][1].'</a>'."\n";
1179  }
1180  else
1181  {
1182  $out.='<span class="tabspan">'.$links[$i][1].'</span>'."\n";
1183  }
1184  }
1185  elseif (! empty($links[$i][1]))
1186  {
1187  //print "x $i $active ".$links[$i][2]." z";
1188  if ($isactive)
1189  {
1190  $out.='<a'.(! empty($links[$i][2])?' id="'.$links[$i][2].'"':'').' class="tabactive tab inline-block'.($morecss?' '.$morecss:'').'" href="'.$links[$i][0].'">';
1191  $out.=$links[$i][1];
1192  $out.='</a>'."\n";
1193  }
1194  else
1195  {
1196  $out.='<a'.(! empty($links[$i][2])?' id="'.$links[$i][2].'"':'').' class="tabunactive tab inline-block'.($morecss?' '.$morecss:'').'" href="'.$links[$i][0].'">';
1197  $out.=$links[$i][1];
1198  $out.='</a>'."\n";
1199  }
1200  }
1201  $out.='</div>';
1202  }
1203  else
1204  {
1205  // The popup with the other tabs
1206  if (! $popuptab)
1207  {
1208  $popuptab=1;
1209  $outmore.='<div class="popuptabset wordwrap">'; // The css used to hide/show popup
1210  }
1211  $outmore.='<div class="popuptab wordwrap" style="display:inherit;">';
1212  if (isset($links[$i][2]) && $links[$i][2] == 'image')
1213  {
1214  if (!empty($links[$i][0]))
1215  $outmore.='<a class="tabimage'.($morecss?' '.$morecss:'').'" href="'.$links[$i][0].'">'.$links[$i][1].'</a>'."\n";
1216  else
1217  $outmore.='<span class="tabspan">'.$links[$i][1].'</span>'."\n";
1218  }
1219  elseif (! empty($links[$i][1]))
1220  {
1221  $outmore.='<a'.(! empty($links[$i][2])?' id="'.$links[$i][2].'"':'').' class="wordwrap inline-block'.($morecss?' '.$morecss:'').'" href="'.$links[$i][0].'">';
1222  $outmore.=preg_replace('/([a-z])\/([a-z])/i', '\\1 / \\2', $links[$i][1]); // Replace x/y with x / y to allow wrap on long composed texts.
1223  $outmore.='</a>'."\n";
1224  }
1225  $outmore.='</div>';
1226 
1227  $nbintab++;
1228  }
1229  $displaytab=$i;
1230  }
1231  if ($popuptab) $outmore.='</div>';
1232 
1233  if ($popuptab) // If there is some tabs not shown
1234  {
1235  $left=($langs->trans("DIRECTION") == 'rtl'?'right':'left');
1236  $right=($langs->trans("DIRECTION") == 'rtl'?'left':'right');
1237 
1238  $tabsname=str_replace("@", "", $picto);
1239  $out.='<div id="moretabs'.$tabsname.'" class="inline-block tabsElem">';
1240  $out.='<a href="#" class="tab moretab inline-block tabunactive reposition">'.$langs->trans("More").'... ('.$nbintab.')</a>';
1241  $out.='<div id="moretabsList'.$tabsname.'" style="position: absolute; '.$left.': -999em; text-align: '.$left.'; margin:0px; padding:2px">';
1242  $out.=$outmore;
1243  $out.='</div>';
1244  $out.='<div></div>';
1245  $out.="</div>\n";
1246 
1247  $out.="<script>";
1248  $out.="$('#moretabs".$tabsname."').mouseenter( function() { console.log('mouseenter ".$left."'); $('#moretabsList".$tabsname."').css('".$left."','auto');});";
1249  $out.="$('#moretabs".$tabsname."').mouseleave( function() { console.log('mouseleave ".$left."'); $('#moretabsList".$tabsname."').css('".$left."','-999em');});";
1250  $out.="</script>";
1251  }
1252 
1253  $out.="</div>\n";
1254 
1255  if (! $notab || $notab == -1 || $notab == -2) $out.="\n".'<div class="tabBar'.($notab == -1 ? '' : ($notab == -2 ? ' tabBarNoTop' : ' tabBarWithBottom')).'">'."\n";
1256 
1257  $parameters=array('tabname' => $active, 'out' => $out);
1258  $reshook=$hookmanager->executeHooks('printTabsHead', $parameters); // This hook usage is called just before output the head of tabs. Take also a look at "completeTabsHead"
1259  if ($reshook > 0)
1260  {
1261  $out = $hookmanager->resPrint;
1262  }
1263 
1264  return $out;
1265 }
1266 
1273 function dol_fiche_end($notab = 0)
1274 {
1275  print dol_get_fiche_end($notab);
1276 }
1277 
1284 function dol_get_fiche_end($notab = 0)
1285 {
1286  if (! $notab || $notab == -1) return "\n</div>\n";
1287  else return '';
1288 }
1289 
1309 function dol_banner_tab($object, $paramid, $morehtml = '', $shownav = 1, $fieldid = 'rowid', $fieldref = 'ref', $morehtmlref = '', $moreparam = '', $nodbprefix = 0, $morehtmlleft = '', $morehtmlstatus = '', $onlybanner = 0, $morehtmlright = '')
1310 {
1311  global $conf, $form, $user, $langs;
1312 
1313  $error = 0;
1314 
1315  $maxvisiblephotos=1;
1316  $showimage=1;
1317  $entity=(empty($object->entity)?$conf->entity:$object->entity);
1318  $showbarcode=empty($conf->barcode->enabled)?0:($object->barcode?1:0);
1319  if (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_ADVANCED_PERMS) && empty($user->rights->barcode->lire_advance)) $showbarcode=0;
1320  $modulepart='unknown';
1321 
1322  if ($object->element == 'societe') $modulepart='societe';
1323  if ($object->element == 'contact') $modulepart='contact';
1324  if ($object->element == 'member') $modulepart='memberphoto';
1325  if ($object->element == 'user') $modulepart='userphoto';
1326  if ($object->element == 'product') $modulepart='product';
1327  if ($object->element == 'ticket') $modulepart='ticket';
1328 
1329  if (class_exists("Imagick"))
1330  {
1331  if ($object->element == 'propal') $modulepart='propal';
1332  if ($object->element == 'commande') $modulepart='commande';
1333  if ($object->element == 'facture') $modulepart='facture';
1334  if ($object->element == 'fichinter') $modulepart='ficheinter';
1335  if ($object->element == 'contrat') $modulepart='contract';
1336  if ($object->element == 'supplier_proposal') $modulepart='supplier_proposal';
1337  if ($object->element == 'order_supplier') $modulepart='supplier_order';
1338  if ($object->element == 'invoice_supplier') $modulepart='supplier_invoice';
1339  if ($object->element == 'expensereport') $modulepart='expensereport';
1340  }
1341 
1342  if ($object->element == 'product')
1343  {
1344  $width=80; $cssclass='photoref';
1345  $showimage=$object->is_photo_available($conf->product->multidir_output[$entity]);
1346  $maxvisiblephotos=(isset($conf->global->PRODUCT_MAX_VISIBLE_PHOTO)?$conf->global->PRODUCT_MAX_VISIBLE_PHOTO:5);
1347  if ($conf->browser->layout == 'phone') $maxvisiblephotos=1;
1348  if ($showimage) $morehtmlleft.='<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref">'.$object->show_photos('product', $conf->product->multidir_output[$entity], 'small', $maxvisiblephotos, 0, 0, 0, $width, 0).'</div>';
1349  else
1350  {
1351  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_NODISPLAYIFNOPHOTO)) {
1352  $nophoto='';
1353  $morehtmlleft.='<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref"></div>';
1354  }
1355  else { // Show no photo link
1356  $nophoto='/public/theme/common/nophoto.png';
1357  $morehtmlleft.='<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref"><img class="photo'.$modulepart.($cssclass?' '.$cssclass:'').'" alt="No photo"'.($width?' style="width: '.$width.'px"':'').' src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.$nophoto.'"></div>';
1358  }
1359  }
1360  }
1361  elseif ($object->element == 'ticket')
1362  {
1363  $width=80; $cssclass='photoref';
1364  $showimage=$object->is_photo_available($conf->ticket->multidir_output[$entity].'/'.$object->track_id);
1365  $maxvisiblephotos=(isset($conf->global->TICKETSUP_MAX_VISIBLE_PHOTO)?$conf->global->TICKETSUP_MAX_VISIBLE_PHOTO:2);
1366  if ($conf->browser->layout == 'phone') $maxvisiblephotos=1;
1367  if ($showimage) $morehtmlleft.='<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref">'.$object->show_photos('ticket', $conf->ticket->multidir_output[$entity], 'small', $maxvisiblephotos, 0, 0, 0, $width, 0).'</div>';
1368  else
1369  {
1370  if (!empty($conf->global->TICKETSUP_NODISPLAYIFNOPHOTO)) {
1371  $nophoto='';
1372  $morehtmlleft.='<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref"></div>';
1373  }
1374  else { // Show no photo link
1375  $nophoto='/public/theme/common/nophoto.png';
1376  $morehtmlleft.='<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref"><img class="photo'.$modulepart.($cssclass?' '.$cssclass:'').'" alt="No photo" border="0"'.($width?' style="width: '.$width.'px"':'').' src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.$nophoto.'"></div>';
1377  }
1378  }
1379  }
1380  else
1381  {
1382  if ($showimage)
1383  {
1384  if ($modulepart != 'unknown')
1385  {
1386  $phototoshow='';
1387  // Check if a preview file is available
1388  if (in_array($modulepart, array('propal', 'commande', 'facture', 'ficheinter', 'contract', 'supplier_order', 'supplier_proposal', 'supplier_invoice', 'expensereport')) && class_exists("Imagick"))
1389  {
1390  $objectref = dol_sanitizeFileName($object->ref);
1391  $dir_output = (empty($conf->$modulepart->multidir_output[$entity]) ? $conf->$modulepart->dir_output : $conf->$modulepart->multidir_output[$entity]) . "/";
1392  if (in_array($modulepart, array('invoice_supplier', 'supplier_invoice')))
1393  {
1394  $subdir = get_exdir($object->id, 2, 0, 1, $object, $modulepart);
1395  $subdir.= ((! empty($subdir) && ! preg_match('/\/$/', $subdir))?'/':'').$objectref; // the objectref dir is not included into get_exdir when used with level=2, so we add it at end
1396  }
1397  else
1398  {
1399  $subdir = get_exdir($object->id, 0, 0, 1, $object, $modulepart);
1400  }
1401  if (empty($subdir)) $subdir = 'errorgettingsubdirofobject'; // Protection to avoid to return empty path
1402 
1403  $filepath = $dir_output . $subdir . "/";
1404 
1405  $filepdf = $filepath . $objectref . ".pdf";
1406  $relativepath = $subdir.'/'.$objectref.'.pdf';
1407 
1408  // Define path to preview pdf file (preview precompiled "file.ext" are "file.ext_preview.png")
1409  $fileimage = $filepdf.'_preview.png';
1410  $relativepathimage = $relativepath.'_preview.png';
1411 
1412  $pdfexists = file_exists($filepdf);
1413 
1414  // If PDF file exists
1415  if ($pdfexists)
1416  {
1417  // Conversion du PDF en image png si fichier png non existant
1418  if (! file_exists($fileimage) || (filemtime($fileimage) < filemtime($filepdf)))
1419  {
1420  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_PDF_THUMBS)) // If you experience trouble with pdf thumb generation and imagick, you can disable here.
1421  {
1422  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/files.lib.php';
1423  $ret = dol_convert_file($filepdf, 'png', $fileimage, '0'); // Convert first page of PDF into a file _preview.png
1424  if ($ret < 0) $error++;
1425  }
1426  }
1427  }
1428 
1429  if ($pdfexists && ! $error)
1430  {
1431  $heightforphotref=70;
1432  if (! empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen)) $heightforphotref=60;
1433  // If the preview file is found
1434  if (file_exists($fileimage))
1435  {
1436  $phototoshow = '<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref"><div class="photoref">';
1437  $phototoshow.= '<img height="'.$heightforphotref.'" class="photo photowithmargin photowithborder" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT . '/viewimage.php?modulepart=apercu'.$modulepart.'&amp;file='.urlencode($relativepathimage).'">';
1438  $phototoshow.= '</div></div>';
1439  }
1440  }
1441  }
1442  elseif (! $phototoshow)
1443  {
1444  $phototoshow.= $form->showphoto($modulepart, $object, 0, 0, 0, 'photoref', 'small', 1, 0, $maxvisiblephotos);
1445  }
1446 
1447  if ($phototoshow)
1448  {
1449  $morehtmlleft.='<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref">';
1450  $morehtmlleft.=$phototoshow;
1451  $morehtmlleft.='</div>';
1452  }
1453  }
1454 
1455  if (! $phototoshow) // Show No photo link (picto of pbject)
1456  {
1457  $morehtmlleft.='<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref">';
1458  if ($object->element == 'action')
1459  {
1460  $width=80;
1461  $cssclass='photorefcenter';
1462  $nophoto=img_picto('', 'title_agenda', '', false, 1);
1463  }
1464  else
1465  {
1466  $width=14; $cssclass='photorefcenter';
1467  $picto = $object->picto;
1468  if ($object->element == 'project' && ! $object->public) $picto = 'project'; // instead of projectpub
1469  $nophoto=img_picto('', 'object_'.$picto, '', false, 1);
1470  }
1471  $morehtmlleft.='<!-- No photo to show -->';
1472  $morehtmlleft.='<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref"><div class="photoref"><img class="photo'.$modulepart.($cssclass?' '.$cssclass:'').'" alt="No photo"'.($width?' style="width: '.$width.'px"':'').' src="'.$nophoto.'"></div></div>';
1473 
1474  $morehtmlleft.='</div>';
1475  }
1476  }
1477  }
1478 
1479  if ($showbarcode) $morehtmlleft.='<div class="floatleft inline-block valignmiddle divphotoref">'.$form->showbarcode($object).'</div>';
1480 
1481  if ($object->element == 'societe')
1482  {
1483  if (! empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && $user->rights->societe->creer && ! empty($conf->global->MAIN_DIRECT_STATUS_UPDATE))
1484  {
1485  $morehtmlstatus.=ajax_object_onoff($object, 'status', 'status', 'InActivity', 'ActivityCeased');
1486  }
1487  else {
1488  $morehtmlstatus.=$object->getLibStatut(6);
1489  }
1490  }
1491  elseif ($object->element == 'product')
1492  {
1493  //$morehtmlstatus.=$langs->trans("Status").' ('.$langs->trans("Sell").') ';
1494  if (! empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && $user->rights->produit->creer && ! empty($conf->global->MAIN_DIRECT_STATUS_UPDATE)) {
1495  $morehtmlstatus.=ajax_object_onoff($object, 'status', 'tosell', 'ProductStatusOnSell', 'ProductStatusNotOnSell');
1496  } else {
1497  $morehtmlstatus.='<span class="statusrefsell">'.$object->getLibStatut(6, 0).'</span>';
1498  }
1499  $morehtmlstatus.=' &nbsp; ';
1500  //$morehtmlstatus.=$langs->trans("Status").' ('.$langs->trans("Buy").') ';
1501  if (! empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && $user->rights->produit->creer && ! empty($conf->global->MAIN_DIRECT_STATUS_UPDATE)) {
1502  $morehtmlstatus.=ajax_object_onoff($object, 'status_buy', 'tobuy', 'ProductStatusOnBuy', 'ProductStatusNotOnBuy');
1503  } else {
1504  $morehtmlstatus.='<span class="statusrefbuy">'.$object->getLibStatut(6, 1).'</span>';
1505  }
1506  }
1507  elseif (in_array($object->element, array('facture', 'invoice', 'invoice_supplier', 'chargesociales', 'loan')))
1508  {
1509  $tmptxt=$object->getLibStatut(6, $object->totalpaye);
1510  if (empty($tmptxt) || $tmptxt == $object->getLibStatut(3)) $tmptxt=$object->getLibStatut(5, $object->totalpaye);
1511  $morehtmlstatus.=$tmptxt;
1512  }
1513  elseif ($object->element == 'contrat' || $object->element == 'contract')
1514  {
1515  if ($object->statut == 0) $morehtmlstatus.=$object->getLibStatut(5);
1516  else $morehtmlstatus.=$object->getLibStatut(4);
1517  }
1518  elseif ($object->element == 'facturerec')
1519  {
1520  if ($object->frequency == 0) $morehtmlstatus.=$object->getLibStatut(2);
1521  else $morehtmlstatus.=$object->getLibStatut(5);
1522  }
1523  elseif ($object->element == 'project_task')
1524  {
1525  $object->fk_statut = 1;
1526  if ($object->progress > 0) $object->fk_statut = 2;
1527  if ($object->progress >= 100) $object->fk_statut = 3;
1528  $tmptxt=$object->getLibStatut(5);
1529  $morehtmlstatus.=$tmptxt; // No status on task
1530  }
1531  else { // Generic case
1532  $tmptxt=$object->getLibStatut(6);
1533  if (empty($tmptxt) || $tmptxt == $object->getLibStatut(3)) $tmptxt=$object->getLibStatut(5);
1534  $morehtmlstatus.=$tmptxt;
1535  }
1536 
1537  // Add if object was dispatched "into accountancy"
1538  if (! empty($conf->accounting->enabled) && in_array($object->element, array('bank', 'facture', 'invoice', 'invoice_supplier', 'expensereport')))
1539  {
1540  if (method_exists($object, 'getVentilExportCompta'))
1541  {
1542  $accounted = $object->getVentilExportCompta();
1543  $langs->load("accountancy");
1544  $morehtmlstatus.='</div><div class="statusref statusrefbis">'.($accounted > 0 ? $langs->trans("Accounted") : '<span class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans("NotYetAccounted").'</span>');
1545  }
1546  }
1547 
1548  // Add alias for thirdparty
1549  if (! empty($object->name_alias)) $morehtmlref.='<div class="refidno">'.$object->name_alias.'</div>';
1550 
1551  // Add label
1552  if ($object->element == 'product' || $object->element == 'bank_account' || $object->element == 'project_task')
1553  {
1554  if (! empty($object->label)) $morehtmlref.='<div class="refidno">'.$object->label.'</div>';
1555  }
1556 
1557  if (method_exists($object, 'getBannerAddress') && $object->element != 'product' && $object->element != 'bookmark' && $object->element != 'ecm_directories' && $object->element != 'ecm_files')
1558  {
1559  $morehtmlref.='<div class="refidno">';
1560  $morehtmlref.=$object->getBannerAddress('refaddress', $object);
1561  $morehtmlref.='</div>';
1562  }
1563  if (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_SHOW_TECHNICAL_ID) && in_array($object->element, array('societe', 'contact', 'member', 'product')))
1564  {
1565  $morehtmlref.='<div style="clear: both;"></div><div class="refidno">';
1566  $morehtmlref.=$langs->trans("TechnicalID").': '.$object->id;
1567  $morehtmlref.='</div>';
1568  }
1569 
1570  print '<div class="'.($onlybanner?'arearefnobottom ':'arearef ').'heightref valignmiddle centpercent">';
1571  print $form->showrefnav($object, $paramid, $morehtml, $shownav, $fieldid, $fieldref, $morehtmlref, $moreparam, $nodbprefix, $morehtmlleft, $morehtmlstatus, $morehtmlright);
1572  print '</div>';
1573  print '<div class="underrefbanner clearboth"></div>';
1574 }
1575 
1585 function fieldLabel($langkey, $fieldkey, $fieldrequired = 0)
1586 {
1587  global $conf, $langs;
1588  $ret='';
1589  if ($fieldrequired) $ret.='<span class="fieldrequired">';
1590  if (($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4)) $ret.='<label for="'.$fieldkey.'">';
1591  $ret.=$langs->trans($langkey);
1592  if (($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4)) $ret.='</label>';
1593  if ($fieldrequired) $ret.='</span>';
1594  return $ret;
1595 }
1596 
1604 function dol_bc($var, $moreclass = '')
1605 {
1606  global $bc;
1607  $ret=' '.$bc[$var];
1608  if ($moreclass) $ret=preg_replace('/class=\"/', 'class="'.$moreclass.' ', $ret);
1609  return $ret;
1610 }
1611 
1623 function dol_format_address($object, $withcountry = 0, $sep = "\n", $outputlangs = '', $mode = 0)
1624 {
1625  global $conf,$langs;
1626 
1627  $ret='';
1628  $countriesusingstate=array('AU','CA','US','IN','GB','ES','UK','TR'); // See also MAIN_FORCE_STATE_INTO_ADDRESS
1629 
1630  // Address
1631  if (empty($mode)) {
1632  $ret .= $object->address;
1633  }
1634  // Zip/Town/State
1635  if (in_array($object->country_code, array('AU', 'CA', 'US')) || ! empty($conf->global->MAIN_FORCE_STATE_INTO_ADDRESS)) // US: title firstname name \n address lines \n town, state, zip \n country
1636  {
1637  $ret .= ($ret ? $sep : '' ).$object->town;
1638  if ($object->state)
1639  {
1640  $ret.=($ret?", ":'').$object->state;
1641  }
1642  if ($object->zip) $ret .= ($ret?", ":'').$object->zip;
1643  }
1644  elseif (in_array($object->country_code, array('GB','UK'))) // UK: title firstname name \n address lines \n town state \n zip \n country
1645  {
1646  $ret .= ($ret ? $sep : '' ).$object->town;
1647  if ($object->state)
1648  {
1649  $ret.=($ret?", ":'').$object->state;
1650  }
1651  if ($object->zip) $ret .= ($ret ? $sep : '' ).$object->zip;
1652  }
1653  elseif (in_array($object->country_code, array('ES','TR'))) // ES: title firstname name \n address lines \n zip town \n state \n country
1654  {
1655  $ret .= ($ret ? $sep : '' ).$object->zip;
1656  $ret .= ($object->town?(($object->zip?' ':'').$object->town):'');
1657  if ($object->state)
1658  {
1659  $ret.="\n".$object->state;
1660  }
1661  }
1662  elseif (in_array($object->country_code, array('IT'))) // IT: tile firstname name\n address lines \n zip (Code Departement) \n country
1663  {
1664  $ret .= ($ret ? $sep : '' ).$object->zip;
1665  $ret .= ($object->town?(($object->zip?' ':'').$object->town):'');
1666  $ret .= ($object->state_id?(' ('.($object->state_id).')'):'');
1667  }
1668  else // Other: title firstname name \n address lines \n zip town \n country
1669  {
1670  $ret .= $object->zip ? (($ret ? $sep : '' ).$object->zip) : '';
1671  $ret .= ($object->town?(($object->zip?' ':($ret ? $sep : '' )).$object->town):'');
1672  if ($object->state && in_array($object->country_code, $countriesusingstate))
1673  {
1674  $ret.=($ret?", ":'').$object->state;
1675  }
1676  }
1677  if (! is_object($outputlangs)) $outputlangs=$langs;
1678  if ($withcountry)
1679  {
1680  $langs->load("dict");
1681  $ret.=($object->country_code?($ret?$sep:'').$outputlangs->convToOutputCharset($outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv("Country".$object->country_code)):'');
1682  }
1683 
1684  return $ret;
1685 }
1686 
1687 
1688 
1697 function dol_strftime($fmt, $ts = false, $is_gmt = false)
1698 {
1699  if ((abs($ts) <= 0x7FFFFFFF)) { // check if number in 32-bit signed range
1700  return ($is_gmt)? @gmstrftime($fmt, $ts): @strftime($fmt, $ts);
1701  }
1702  else return 'Error date into a not supported range';
1703 }
1704 
1726 function dol_print_date($time, $format = '', $tzoutput = 'tzserver', $outputlangs = '', $encodetooutput = false)
1727 {
1728  global $conf,$langs;
1729 
1730  // Clean parameters
1731  $to_gmt=false;
1732  $offsettz=$offsetdst=0;
1733  if ($tzoutput)
1734  {
1735  $to_gmt=true; // For backward compatibility
1736  if (is_string($tzoutput))
1737  {
1738  if ($tzoutput == 'tzserver')
1739  {
1740  $to_gmt=false;
1741  $offsettzstring=@date_default_timezone_get(); // Example 'Europe/Berlin' or 'Indian/Reunion'
1742  $offsettz=0;
1743  $offsetdst=0;
1744  }
1745  elseif ($tzoutput == 'tzuser' || $tzoutput == 'tzuserrel')
1746  {
1747  $to_gmt=true;
1748  $offsettzstring=(empty($_SESSION['dol_tz_string'])?'UTC':$_SESSION['dol_tz_string']); // Example 'Europe/Berlin' or 'Indian/Reunion'
1749  $offsettz=(empty($_SESSION['dol_tz'])?0:$_SESSION['dol_tz'])*60*60; // Will not be used anymore
1750  $offsetdst=(empty($_SESSION['dol_dst'])?0:$_SESSION['dol_dst'])*60*60; // Will not be used anymore
1751  }
1752  }
1753  }
1754  if (! is_object($outputlangs)) $outputlangs=$langs;
1755  if (! $format) $format='daytextshort';
1756  $reduceformat=(! empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen) && in_array($format, array('day','dayhour')))?1:0;
1757  $formatwithoutreduce = preg_replace('/reduceformat/', '', $format);
1758  if ($formatwithoutreduce != $format) { $format = $formatwithoutreduce; $reduceformat=1; } // so format 'dayreduceformat' is processed like day
1759 
1760  // Change predefined format into computer format. If found translation in lang file we use it, otherwise we use default.
1761  // TODO Add format daysmallyear and dayhoursmallyear
1762  if ($format == 'day') $format=($outputlangs->trans("FormatDateShort")!="FormatDateShort"?$outputlangs->trans("FormatDateShort"):$conf->format_date_short);
1763  elseif ($format == 'hour') $format=($outputlangs->trans("FormatHourShort")!="FormatHourShort"?$outputlangs->trans("FormatHourShort"):$conf->format_hour_short);
1764  elseif ($format == 'hourduration') $format=($outputlangs->trans("FormatHourShortDuration")!="FormatHourShortDuration"?$outputlangs->trans("FormatHourShortDuration"):$conf->format_hour_short_duration);
1765  elseif ($format == 'daytext') $format=($outputlangs->trans("FormatDateText")!="FormatDateText"?$outputlangs->trans("FormatDateText"):$conf->format_date_text);
1766  elseif ($format == 'daytextshort') $format=($outputlangs->trans("FormatDateTextShort")!="FormatDateTextShort"?$outputlangs->trans("FormatDateTextShort"):$conf->format_date_text_short);
1767  elseif ($format == 'dayhour') $format=($outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourShort")!="FormatDateHourShort"?$outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourShort"):$conf->format_date_hour_short);
1768  elseif ($format == 'dayhoursec') $format=($outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourSecShort")!="FormatDateHourSecShort"?$outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourSecShort"):$conf->format_date_hour_sec_short);
1769  elseif ($format == 'dayhourtext') $format=($outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourText")!="FormatDateHourText"?$outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourText"):$conf->format_date_hour_text);
1770  elseif ($format == 'dayhourtextshort') $format=($outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourTextShort")!="FormatDateHourTextShort"?$outputlangs->trans("FormatDateHourTextShort"):$conf->format_date_hour_text_short);
1771  // Format not sensitive to language
1772  elseif ($format == 'dayhourlog') $format='%Y%m%d%H%M%S';
1773  elseif ($format == 'dayhourldap') $format='%Y%m%d%H%M%SZ';
1774  elseif ($format == 'dayhourxcard') $format='%Y%m%dT%H%M%SZ';
1775  elseif ($format == 'dayxcard') $format='%Y%m%d';
1776  elseif ($format == 'dayrfc') $format='%Y-%m-%d'; // DATE_RFC3339
1777  elseif ($format == 'dayhourrfc') $format='%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ'; // DATETIME RFC3339
1778  elseif ($format == 'standard') $format='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S';
1779 
1780  if ($reduceformat)
1781  {
1782  $format=str_replace('%Y', '%y', $format);
1783  $format=str_replace('yyyy', 'yy', $format);
1784  }
1785 
1786  // If date undefined or "", we return ""
1787  if (dol_strlen($time) == 0) return ''; // $time=0 allowed (it means 01/01/1970 00:00:00)
1788 
1789  // Clean format
1790  if (preg_match('/%b/i', $format)) // There is some text to translate
1791  {
1792  // We inhibate translation to text made by strftime functions. We will use trans instead later.
1793  $format=str_replace('%b', '__b__', $format);
1794  $format=str_replace('%B', '__B__', $format);
1795  }
1796  if (preg_match('/%a/i', $format)) // There is some text to translate
1797  {
1798  // We inhibate translation to text made by strftime functions. We will use trans instead later.
1799  $format=str_replace('%a', '__a__', $format);
1800  $format=str_replace('%A', '__A__', $format);
1801  }
1802 
1803  // Analyze date
1804  $reg=array();
1805  if (preg_match('/^([0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9])([0-9][0-9])([0-9][0-9])([0-9][0-9])([0-9][0-9])([0-9][0-9])$/i', $time, $reg)) // Deprecated. Ex: 1970-01-01, 1970-01-01 01:00:00, 19700101010000
1806  {
1807  dol_print_error("Functions.lib::dol_print_date function called with a bad value from page ".$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"]);
1808  return '';
1809  }
1810  elseif (preg_match('/^([0-9]+)\-([0-9]+)\-([0-9]+) ?([0-9]+)?:?([0-9]+)?:?([0-9]+)?/i', $time, $reg)) // Still available to solve problems in extrafields of type date
1811  {
1812  // This part of code should not be used.
1813  dol_syslog("Functions.lib::dol_print_date function called with a bad value from page ".$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"], LOG_WARNING);
1814  //if (function_exists('debug_print_backtrace')) debug_print_backtrace();
1815  // Date has format 'YYYY-MM-DD' or 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS'
1816  $syear = (! empty($reg[1]) ? $reg[1] : '');
1817  $smonth = (! empty($reg[2]) ? $reg[2] : '');
1818  $sday = (! empty($reg[3]) ? $reg[3] : '');
1819  $shour = (! empty($reg[4]) ? $reg[4] : '');
1820  $smin = (! empty($reg[5]) ? $reg[5] : '');
1821  $ssec = (! empty($reg[6]) ? $reg[6] : '');
1822 
1823  $time=dol_mktime($shour, $smin, $ssec, $smonth, $sday, $syear, true);
1824  $ret=adodb_strftime($format, $time+$offsettz+$offsetdst, $to_gmt);
1825  }
1826  else
1827  {
1828  // Date is a timestamps
1829  if ($time < 100000000000) // Protection against bad date values
1830  {
1831  $timetouse = $time+$offsettz+$offsetdst; // TODO Replace this with function Date PHP. We also should not use anymore offsettz and offsetdst but only offsettzstring.
1832 
1833  $ret=adodb_strftime($format, $timetouse, $to_gmt);
1834  }
1835  else $ret='Bad value '.$time.' for date';
1836  }
1837 
1838  if (preg_match('/__b__/i', $format))
1839  {
1840  $timetouse = $time+$offsettz+$offsetdst; // TODO Replace this with function Date PHP. We also should not use anymore offsettz and offsetdst but only offsettzstring.
1841 
1842  // Here ret is string in PHP setup language (strftime was used). Now we convert to $outputlangs.
1843  $month=adodb_strftime('%m', $timetouse);
1844  $month=sprintf("%02d", $month); // $month may be return with format '06' on some installation and '6' on other, so we force it to '06'.
1845  if ($encodetooutput)
1846  {
1847  $monthtext=$outputlangs->transnoentities('Month'.$month);
1848  $monthtextshort=$outputlangs->transnoentities('MonthShort'.$month);
1849  }
1850  else
1851  {
1852  $monthtext=$outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv('Month'.$month);
1853  $monthtextshort=$outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv('MonthShort'.$month);
1854  }
1855  //print 'monthtext='.$monthtext.' monthtextshort='.$monthtextshort;
1856  $ret=str_replace('__b__', $monthtextshort, $ret);
1857  $ret=str_replace('__B__', $monthtext, $ret);
1858  //print 'x'.$outputlangs->charset_output.'-'.$ret.'x';
1859  //return $ret;
1860  }
1861  if (preg_match('/__a__/i', $format))
1862  {
1863  $timetouse = $time+$offsettz+$offsetdst; // TODO Replace this with function Date PHP. We also should not use anymore offsettz and offsetdst but only offsettzstring.
1864 
1865  $w=adodb_strftime('%w', $timetouse); // TODO Replace this with function Date PHP. We also should not use anymore offsettz and offsetdst but only offsettzstring.
1866  $dayweek=$outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv('Day'.$w);
1867  $ret=str_replace('__A__', $dayweek, $ret);
1868  $ret=str_replace('__a__', dol_substr($dayweek, 0, 3), $ret);
1869  }
1870 
1871  return $ret;
1872 }
1873 
1874 
1908 function dol_getdate($timestamp, $fast = false)
1909 {
1910  global $conf;
1911 
1912  $usealternatemethod=false;
1913  if ($timestamp <= 0) $usealternatemethod=true; // <= 1970
1914  if ($timestamp >= 2145913200) $usealternatemethod=true; // >= 2038
1915 
1916  if ($usealternatemethod)
1917  {
1918  $arrayinfo=adodb_getdate($timestamp, $fast);
1919  }
1920  else
1921  {
1922  $arrayinfo=getdate($timestamp);
1923  }
1924 
1925  return $arrayinfo;
1926 }
1927 
1947 function dol_mktime($hour, $minute, $second, $month, $day, $year, $gm = false, $check = 1)
1948 {
1949  global $conf;
1950  //print "- ".$hour.",".$minute.",".$second.",".$month.",".$day.",".$year.",".$_SERVER["WINDIR"]." -";
1951 
1952  // Clean parameters
1953  if ($hour == -1 || empty($hour)) $hour=0;
1954  if ($minute == -1 || empty($minute)) $minute=0;
1955  if ($second == -1 || empty($second)) $second=0;
1956 
1957  // Check parameters
1958  if ($check)
1959  {
1960  if (! $month || ! $day) return '';
1961  if ($day > 31) return '';
1962  if ($month > 12) return '';
1963  if ($hour < 0 || $hour > 24) return '';
1964  if ($minute< 0 || $minute > 60) return '';
1965  if ($second< 0 || $second > 60) return '';
1966  }
1967 
1968  if (method_exists('DateTime', 'getTimestamp'))
1969  {
1970  if (empty($gm) || $gm === 'server')
1971  {
1972  $default_timezone=@date_default_timezone_get(); // Example 'Europe/Berlin'
1973  $localtz = new DateTimeZone($default_timezone);
1974  }
1975  elseif ($gm === 'user')
1976  {
1977  // We use dol_tz_string first because it is more reliable.
1978  $default_timezone=(empty($_SESSION["dol_tz_string"])?@date_default_timezone_get():$_SESSION["dol_tz_string"]); // Example 'Europe/Berlin'
1979  try {
1980  $localtz = new DateTimeZone($default_timezone);
1981  }
1982  catch(Exception $e)
1983  {
1984  dol_syslog("Warning dol_tz_string contains an invalid value ".$_SESSION["dol_tz_string"], LOG_WARNING);
1985  $default_timezone=@date_default_timezone_get();
1986  }
1987  }
1988  elseif (strrpos($gm, "tz,") !== false)
1989  {
1990  $timezone=str_replace("tz,", "", $gm); // Example 'tz,Europe/Berlin'
1991  try
1992  {
1993  $localtz = new DateTimeZone($timezone);
1994  }
1995  catch(Exception $e)
1996  {
1997  dol_syslog("Warning passed timezone contains an invalid value ".$timezone, LOG_WARNING);
1998  }
1999  }
2000 
2001  if (empty($localtz)) {
2002  $localtz = new DateTimeZone('UTC');
2003  }
2004  //var_dump($localtz);
2005  //var_dump($year.'-'.$month.'-'.$day.'-'.$hour.'-'.$minute);
2006  $dt = new DateTime(null, $localtz);
2007  $dt->setDate((int) $year, (int) $month, (int) $day);
2008  $dt->setTime((int) $hour, (int) $minute, (int) $second);
2009  $date=$dt->getTimestamp(); // should include daylight saving time
2010  //var_dump($date);
2011  return $date;
2012  }
2013  else
2014  {
2015  dol_print_error('', 'PHP version must be 5.4+');
2016  return '';
2017  }
2018 }
2019 
2020 
2030 function dol_now($mode = 'gmt')
2031 {
2032  $ret=0;
2033 
2034  // Note that gmmktime and mktime return same value (GMT) when used without parameters
2035  //if ($mode == 'gmt') $ret=gmmktime(); // Strict Standards: gmmktime(): You should be using the time() function instead
2036  if ($mode == 'gmt') $ret=time(); // Time for now at greenwich.
2037  elseif ($mode == 'tzserver') // Time for now with PHP server timezone added
2038  {
2039  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/date.lib.php';
2040  $tzsecond=getServerTimeZoneInt('now'); // Contains tz+dayling saving time
2041  $ret=(int) (dol_now('gmt')+($tzsecond*3600));
2042  }
2043  /*else if ($mode == 'tzref') // Time for now with parent company timezone is added
2044  {
2045  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/date.lib.php';
2046  $tzsecond=getParentCompanyTimeZoneInt(); // Contains tz+dayling saving time
2047  $ret=dol_now('gmt')+($tzsecond*3600);
2048  }*/
2049  elseif ($mode == 'tzuser') // Time for now with user timezone added
2050  {
2051  //print 'time: '.time().'-'.mktime().'-'.gmmktime();
2052  $offsettz=(empty($_SESSION['dol_tz'])?0:$_SESSION['dol_tz'])*60*60;
2053  $offsetdst=(empty($_SESSION['dol_dst'])?0:$_SESSION['dol_dst'])*60*60;
2054  $ret=(int) (dol_now('gmt')+($offsettz+$offsetdst));
2055  }
2056 
2057  return $ret;
2058 }
2059 
2060 
2069 function dol_print_size($size, $shortvalue = 0, $shortunit = 0)
2070 {
2071  global $conf,$langs;
2072  $level=1024;
2073 
2074  if (! empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen)) $shortunit=1;
2075 
2076  // Set value text
2077  if (empty($shortvalue) || $size < ($level*10))
2078  {
2079  $ret=$size;
2080  $textunitshort=$langs->trans("b");
2081  $textunitlong=$langs->trans("Bytes");
2082  }
2083  else
2084  {
2085  $ret=round($size/$level, 0);
2086  $textunitshort=$langs->trans("Kb");
2087  $textunitlong=$langs->trans("KiloBytes");
2088  }
2089  // Use long or short text unit
2090  if (empty($shortunit)) { $ret.=' '.$textunitlong; }
2091  else { $ret.=' '.$textunitshort; }
2092 
2093  return $ret;
2094 }
2095 
2105 function dol_print_url($url, $target = '_blank', $max = 32, $withpicto = 0)
2106 {
2107  global $langs;
2108 
2109  if (empty($url)) return '';
2110 
2111  $link='<a href="';
2112  if (! preg_match('/^http/i', $url)) $link.='http://';
2113  $link.=$url;
2114  $link.='"';
2115  if ($target) $link.=' target="'.$target.'"';
2116  $link.='>';
2117  if (! preg_match('/^http/i', $url)) $link.='http://';
2118  $link.=dol_trunc($url, $max);
2119  $link.='</a>';
2120  return '<div class="nospan float" style="margin-right: 10px">'.($withpicto?img_picto($langs->trans("Url"), 'object_globe.png').' ':'').$link.'</div>';
2121 }
2122 
2135 function dol_print_email($email, $cid = 0, $socid = 0, $addlink = 0, $max = 64, $showinvalid = 1, $withpicto = 0)
2136 {
2137  global $conf,$user,$langs,$hookmanager;
2138 
2139  $newemail=$email;
2140 
2141  if (empty($email)) return '&nbsp;';
2142 
2143  if (! empty($addlink))
2144  {
2145  $newemail='<a style="text-overflow: ellipsis;" href="';
2146  if (! preg_match('/^mailto:/i', $email)) $newemail.='mailto:';
2147  $newemail.=$email;
2148  $newemail.='">';
2149  $newemail.=dol_trunc($email, $max);
2150  $newemail.='</a>';
2151  if ($showinvalid && ! isValidEmail($email))
2152  {
2153  $langs->load("errors");
2154  $newemail.=img_warning($langs->trans("ErrorBadEMail", $email));
2155  }
2156 
2157  if (($cid || $socid) && ! empty($conf->agenda->enabled) && $user->rights->agenda->myactions->create)
2158  {
2159  $type='AC_EMAIL'; $link='';
2160  if (! empty($conf->global->AGENDA_ADDACTIONFOREMAIL)) $link='<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/comm/action/card.php?action=create&amp;backtopage=1&amp;actioncode='.$type.'&amp;contactid='.$cid.'&amp;socid='.$socid.'">'.img_object($langs->trans("AddAction"), "calendar").'</a>';
2161  if ($link) $newemail='<div>'.$newemail.' '.$link.'</div>';
2162  }
2163  }
2164  else
2165  {
2166  if ($showinvalid && ! isValidEmail($email))
2167  {
2168  $langs->load("errors");
2169  $newemail.=img_warning($langs->trans("ErrorBadEMail", $email));
2170  }
2171  }
2172 
2173  $rep = '<div class="nospan float" style="margin-right: 10px">'.($withpicto?img_picto($langs->trans("EMail"), 'object_email.png').' ':'').$newemail.'</div>';
2174  if ($hookmanager) {
2175  $parameters = array('cid' => $cid, 'socid' => $socid,'addlink' => $addlink, 'picto' => $withpicto);
2176  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printEmail', $parameters, $email);
2177  $rep.=$hookmanager->resPrint;
2178  }
2179 
2180  return $rep;
2181 }
2182 
2192 function dol_print_socialnetworks($value, $cid, $socid, $type)
2193 {
2194  global $conf,$user,$langs;
2195 
2196  $newskype=$value;
2197 
2198  if (empty($value)) return '&nbsp;';
2199 
2200  if (! empty($type))
2201  {
2202  $newskype ='<div class="divsocialnetwork inline-block valignmiddle">';
2203  $newskype.=img_picto($langs->trans(strtoupper($type)), $type.'.png', '', false, 0, 0, '', 'paddingright');
2204  $newskype.=$value;
2205  if ($type == 'skype')
2206  {
2207  $newskype.= '&nbsp;';
2208  $newskype.='<a href="skype:';
2209  $newskype.=$value;
2210  $newskype.='?call" alt="'.$langs->trans("Call").'&nbsp;'.$value.'" title="'.$langs->trans("Call").'&nbsp;'.$value.'">';
2211  $newskype.='<img src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/common/skype_callbutton.png" border="0">';
2212  $newskype.='</a><a href="skype:';
2213  $newskype.=$value;
2214  $newskype.='?chat" alt="'.$langs->trans("Chat").'&nbsp;'.$value.'" title="'.$langs->trans("Chat").'&nbsp;'.$value.'">';
2215  $newskype.='<img class="paddingleft" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/common/skype_chatbutton.png" border="0">';
2216  $newskype.='</a>';
2217  }
2218  if (($cid || $socid) && ! empty($conf->agenda->enabled) && $user->rights->agenda->myactions->create && $type=='skype')
2219  {
2220  $addlink='AC_SKYPE'; $link='';
2221  if (! empty($conf->global->AGENDA_ADDACTIONFORSKYPE)) $link='<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/comm/action/card.php?action=create&amp;backtopage=1&amp;actioncode='.$addlink.'&amp;contactid='.$cid.'&amp;socid='.$socid.'">'.img_object($langs->trans("AddAction"), "calendar").'</a>';
2222  $newskype.=($link?' '.$link:'');
2223  }
2224  $newskype.='</div>';
2225  }
2226  else
2227  {
2228  $langs->load("errors");
2229  $newskype.=img_warning($langs->trans("ErrorBadSocialNetworkValue", $value));
2230  }
2231  return $newskype;
2232 }
2233 
2248 function dol_print_phone($phone, $countrycode = '', $cid = 0, $socid = 0, $addlink = '', $separ = "&nbsp;", $withpicto = '', $titlealt = '', $adddivfloat = 0)
2249 {
2250  global $conf, $user, $langs, $mysoc, $hookmanager;
2251 
2252  // Clean phone parameter
2253  $phone = preg_replace("/[\s.-]/", "", trim($phone));
2254  if (empty($phone)) { return ''; }
2255  if (empty($countrycode)) $countrycode=$mysoc->country_code;
2256 
2257  // Short format for small screens
2258  if ($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen) $separ='';
2259 
2260  $newphone=$phone;
2261  if (strtoupper($countrycode) == "FR")
2262  {
2263  // France
2264  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 10) {
2265  $newphone=substr($newphone, 0, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 2, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 2);
2266  }
2267  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 7)
2268  {
2269  $newphone=substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 5, 2);
2270  }
2271  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 9)
2272  {
2273  $newphone=substr($newphone, 0, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 2, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 5, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 2);
2274  }
2275  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 11)
2276  {
2277  $newphone=substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 5, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 2);
2278  }
2279  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2280  {
2281  $newphone=substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 2);
2282  }
2283  }
2284 
2285  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "CA")
2286  {
2287  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 10) {
2288  $newphone=($separ!=''?'(':'').substr($newphone, 0, 3).($separ!=''?')':'').$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 3).($separ!=''?'-':'').substr($newphone, 6, 4);
2289  }
2290  }
2291  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "PT" )
2292  {//Portugal
2293  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 13)
2294  {//ex: +351_ABC_DEF_GHI
2295  $newphone= substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 3);
2296  }
2297  }
2298  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "SR" )
2299  {//Suriname
2300  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 10)
2301  {//ex: +597_ABC_DEF
2302  $newphone= substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 3);
2303  }
2304  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 11)
2305  {//ex: +597_ABC_DEFG
2306  $newphone= substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 4);
2307  }
2308  }
2309  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "DE" )
2310  {//Allemagne
2311  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 14)
2312  {//ex: +49_ABCD_EFGH_IJK
2313  $newphone= substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 11, 3);
2314  }
2315  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 13)
2316  {//ex: +49_ABC_DEFG_HIJ
2317  $newphone= substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 3);
2318  }
2319  }
2320  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "ES")
2321  {//Espagne
2322  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2323  {//ex: +34_ABC_DEF_GHI
2324  $newphone= substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 3);
2325  }
2326  }
2327  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "BF")
2328  {// Burkina Faso
2329  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2330  {//ex : +22 A BC_DE_FG_HI
2331  $newphone= substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 1).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 2);
2332  }
2333  }
2334  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "RO")
2335  {// Roumanie
2336  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2337  {//ex : +40 AB_CDE_FG_HI
2338  $newphone= substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 5, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 2);
2339  }
2340  }
2341  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "TR")
2342  {//Turquie
2343  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 13)
2344  {//ex : +90 ABC_DEF_GHIJ
2345  $newphone= substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 4);
2346  }
2347  }
2348  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "US")
2349  {//Etat-Unis
2350  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2351  {//ex: +1 ABC_DEF_GHIJ
2352  $newphone= substr($newphone, 0, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 2, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 5, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 4);
2353  }
2354  }
2355  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "MX")
2356  {//Mexique
2357  if (dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2358  {//ex: +52 ABCD_EFG_HI
2359  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 2);
2360  }
2361  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 11)
2362  {//ex: +52 AB_CD_EF_GH
2363  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 5, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 2);
2364  }
2365  elseif (dol_strlen($phone) == 13)
2366  {//ex: +52 ABC_DEF_GHIJ
2367  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 4);
2368  }
2369  }

2371  {//Mali
2372  if(dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2373  {//ex: +223 AB_CD_EF_GH
2374  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 2);
2375  }
2376  }

2398  }
2399  }
2400  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "ZA")
2401  {//Afrique du sud

2477  }

2491  }

2494  {//Suisse
