2497  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 5, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 10, 2);
2498  }
2499  elseif(dol_strlen($phone) == 15)
2500  {// +41_AB_CDE_FGH_IJKL
2501  $newphone =$newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 5, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 11, 4);
2502  }
2503  }
2504  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "TN")
2505  {//Tunisie

2509  }
2510  }

2512  {//Guyane francaise
2513  if(dol_strlen($phone) == 13)
2514  {//ex: +594_ABC_DE_FG_HI (ABC=594 de nouveau)
2515  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 11, 2);
2516  }
2517  }

2519  {//Guadeloupe

2523  }
2524  }
2525  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "MQ")
2526  {//Martinique
2527  if(dol_strlen($phone) == 13)
2528  {//ex: +596_ABC_DE_FG_HI (ABC=596 de nouveau)
2529  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 7, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 11, 2);
2530  }
2531  }
2532  elseif (strtoupper($countrycode) == "IT")
2533  {//Italie
2534  if(dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2535  {//ex: +39_ABC_DEF_GHI
2536  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 3);
2537  }
2538  elseif(dol_strlen($phone) == 13)
2539  {//ex: +39_ABC_DEF_GH_IJ
2540  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 6, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 9, 2).$separ.substr($newphone, 11, 2);
2541  }
2542  }
2543  elseif(strtoupper($countrycode) == "AU")
2544  {
2545  //Australie
2546  if(dol_strlen($phone) == 12)
2547  {
2548  //ex: +61_A_BCDE_FGHI
2549  $newphone = substr($newphone, 0, 3).$separ.substr($newphone, 3, 1).$separ.substr($newphone, 4, 4).$separ.substr($newphone, 8, 4);
2550  }
2551  }
2552  if (! empty($addlink)) // Link on phone number (+ link to add action if conf->global->AGENDA_ADDACTIONFORPHONE set)
2553  {
2554  if ($conf->browser->layout == 'phone' || (! empty($conf->clicktodial->enabled) && ! empty($conf->global->CLICKTODIAL_USE_TEL_LINK_ON_PHONE_NUMBERS))) // If phone or option for, we use link of phone
2555  {
2556  $newphone ='<a href="tel:'.$phone.'"';
2557  $newphone.='>'.$phone.'</a>';
2558  }
2559  elseif (! empty($conf->clicktodial->enabled) && $addlink == 'AC_TEL') // If click to dial, we use click to dial url
2560  {
2561  if (empty($user->clicktodial_loaded)) $user->fetch_clicktodial();
2562 
2563  // Define urlmask
2564  $urlmask='ErrorClickToDialModuleNotConfigured';
2565  if (! empty($conf->global->CLICKTODIAL_URL)) $urlmask=$conf->global->CLICKTODIAL_URL;
2566  if (! empty($user->clicktodial_url)) $urlmask=$user->clicktodial_url;
2567 
2568  $clicktodial_poste=(! empty($user->clicktodial_poste)?urlencode($user->clicktodial_poste):'');
2569  $clicktodial_login=(! empty($user->clicktodial_login)?urlencode($user->clicktodial_login):'');
2570  $clicktodial_password=(! empty($user->clicktodial_password)?urlencode($user->clicktodial_password):'');
2571  // This line is for backward compatibility
2572  $url = sprintf($urlmask, urlencode($phone), $clicktodial_poste, $clicktodial_login, $clicktodial_password);
2573  // Thoose lines are for substitution
2574  $substitarray=array('__PHONEFROM__'=>$clicktodial_poste,
2575  '__PHONETO__'=>urlencode($phone),
2576  '__LOGIN__'=>$clicktodial_login,
2577  '__PASS__'=>$clicktodial_password);
2578  $url = make_substitutions($url, $substitarray);
2579  $newphonesav=$newphone;
2580  $newphone ='<a href="'.$url.'"';
2581  if (! empty($conf->global->CLICKTODIAL_FORCENEWTARGET)) $newphone.=' target="_blank"';
2582  $newphone.='>'.$newphonesav.'</a>';
2583  }
2584 
2585  //if (($cid || $socid) && ! empty($conf->agenda->enabled) && $user->rights->agenda->myactions->create)
2586  if (! empty($conf->agenda->enabled) && $user->rights->agenda->myactions->create)
2587  {
2588  $type='AC_TEL'; $link='';
2589  if ($addlink == 'AC_FAX') $type='AC_FAX';
2590  if (! empty($conf->global->AGENDA_ADDACTIONFORPHONE)) $link='<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/comm/action/card.php?action=create&amp;backtopage=1&amp;actioncode='.$type.($cid?'&amp;contactid='.$cid:'').($socid?'&amp;socid='.$socid:'').'">'.img_object($langs->trans("AddAction"), "calendar").'</a>';
2591  if ($link) $newphone='<div>'.$newphone.' '.$link.'</div>';
2592  }
2593  }
2594 
2595  if (empty($titlealt))
2596  {
2597  $titlealt=($withpicto=='fax'?$langs->trans("Fax"):$langs->trans("Phone"));
2598  }
2599  $rep='';
2600 
2601  if ($hookmanager) {
2602  $parameters = array('countrycode' => $countrycode, 'cid' => $cid, 'socid' => $socid,'titlealt' => $titlealt, 'picto' => $withpicto);
2603  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printPhone', $parameters, $phone);
2604  $rep.=$hookmanager->resPrint;
2605  }
2606  if (empty($reshook))
2607  {
2608  $picto = '';
2609  if($withpicto){
2610  if($withpicto=='fax'){
2611  $picto = 'phoning_fax';
2612  }elseif($withpicto=='phone'){
2613  $picto = 'phoning';
2614  }elseif($withpicto=='mobile'){
2615  $picto = 'phoning_mobile';
2616  }else{
2617  $picto = '';
2618  }
2619  }
2620  if ($adddivfloat) $rep.='<div class="nospan float" style="margin-right: 10px">';
2621  else $rep.='<span style="margin-right: 10px;">';
2622  $rep.=($withpicto?img_picto($titlealt, 'object_'.$picto.'.png').' ':'').$newphone;
2623  if ($adddivfloat) $rep.='</div>';
2624  else $rep.='</span>';
2625  }
2626 
2627  return $rep;
2628 }
2629 
2637 function dol_print_ip($ip, $mode = 0)
2638 {
2639  global $conf,$langs;
2640 
2641  $ret='';
2642 
2643  if (empty($mode)) $ret.=$ip;
2644 
2645  if ($mode != 2)
2646  {
2647  $countrycode=dolGetCountryCodeFromIp($ip);
2648  if ($countrycode) // If success, countrycode is us, fr, ...
2649  {
2650  if (file_exists(DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/theme/common/flags/'.$countrycode.'.png'))
2651  {
2652  $ret.=' '.img_picto($countrycode.' '.$langs->trans("AccordingToGeoIPDatabase"), DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/common/flags/'.$countrycode.'.png', '', 1);
2653  }
2654  else $ret.=' ('.$countrycode.')';
2655  }
2656  else
2657  {
2658  // Nothing
2659  }
2660  }
2661 
2662  return $ret;
2663 }
2664 
2673 function getUserRemoteIP()
2674 {
2675  $ip = empty($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'])? (empty($_SERVER['HTTP_CLIENT_IP'])?(empty($_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'])?'':$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']):$_SERVER['HTTP_CLIENT_IP']) : $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'];
2676  return $ip;
2677 }
2678 
2685 function dolGetCountryCodeFromIp($ip)
2686 {
2687  global $conf;
2688 
2689  $countrycode='';
2690 
2691  if (! empty($conf->geoipmaxmind->enabled))
2692  {
2693  $datafile=$conf->global->GEOIPMAXMIND_COUNTRY_DATAFILE;
2694  //$ip='24.24.24.24';
2695  //$datafile='/usr/share/GeoIP/GeoIP.dat'; Note that this must be downloaded datafile (not same than datafile provided with ubuntu packages)
2696  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/dolgeoip.class.php';
2697  $geoip=new DolGeoIP('country', $datafile);
2698  //print 'ip='.$ip.' databaseType='.$geoip->gi->databaseType." GEOIP_CITY_EDITION_REV1=".GEOIP_CITY_EDITION_REV1."\n";
2699  $countrycode=$geoip->getCountryCodeFromIP($ip);
2700  }
2701 
2702  return $countrycode;
2703 }
2704 
2705 
2712 function dol_user_country()
2713 {
2714  global $conf,$langs,$user;
2715 
2716  //$ret=$user->xxx;
2717  $ret='';
2718  if (! empty($conf->geoipmaxmind->enabled))
2719  {
2720  $ip=getUserRemoteIP();
2721  $datafile=$conf->global->GEOIPMAXMIND_COUNTRY_DATAFILE;
2722  //$ip='24.24.24.24';
2723  //$datafile='E:\Mes Sites\Web\Admin1\awstats\maxmind\GeoIP.dat';
2724  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/dolgeoip.class.php';
2725  $geoip=new DolGeoIP('country', $datafile);
2726  $countrycode=$geoip->getCountryCodeFromIP($ip);
2727  $ret=$countrycode;
2728  }
2729  return $ret;
2730 }
2731 
2744 function dol_print_address($address, $htmlid, $mode, $id, $noprint = 0, $charfornl = '')
2745 {
2746  global $conf, $user, $langs, $hookmanager;
2747 
2748  $out = '';
2749 
2750  if ($address)
2751  {
2752  if ($hookmanager) {
2753  $parameters = array('element' => $mode, 'id' => $id);
2754  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printAddress', $parameters, $address);
2755  $out.=$hookmanager->resPrint;
2756  }
2757  if (empty($reshook))
2758  {
2759  if (empty($charfornl)) $out.=nl2br($address);
2760  else $out.=preg_replace('/[\r\n]+/', $charfornl, $address);
2761 
2762  $showgmap=$showomap=0;
2763 
2764  // TODO Add a hook here
2765  if (($mode=='thirdparty' || $mode =='societe') && ! empty($conf->google->enabled) && ! empty($conf->global->GOOGLE_ENABLE_GMAPS)) $showgmap=1;
2766  if ($mode=='contact' && ! empty($conf->google->enabled) && ! empty($conf->global->GOOGLE_ENABLE_GMAPS_CONTACTS)) $showgmap=1;
2767  if ($mode=='member' && ! empty($conf->google->enabled) && ! empty($conf->global->GOOGLE_ENABLE_GMAPS_MEMBERS)) $showgmap=1;
2768  if (($mode=='thirdparty' || $mode =='societe') && ! empty($conf->openstreetmap->enabled) && ! empty($conf->global->OPENSTREETMAP_ENABLE_MAPS)) $showomap=1;
2769  if ($mode=='contact' && ! empty($conf->openstreetmap->enabled) && ! empty($conf->global->OPENSTREETMAP_ENABLE_MAPS_CONTACTS)) $showomap=1;
2770  if ($mode=='member' && ! empty($conf->openstreetmap->enabled) && ! empty($conf->global->OPENSTREETMAP_ENABLE_MAPS_MEMBERS)) $showomap=1;
2771 
2772  if ($showgmap)
2773  {
2774  $url=dol_buildpath('/google/gmaps.php?mode='.$mode.'&id='.$id, 1);
2775  $out.=' <a href="'.$url.'" target="_gmaps"><img id="'.$htmlid.'" class="valigntextbottom" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/common/gmap.png"></a>';
2776  }
2777  if ($showomap)
2778  {
2779  $url=dol_buildpath('/openstreetmap/maps.php?mode='.$mode.'&id='.$id, 1);
2780  $out.=' <a href="'.$url.'" target="_gmaps"><img id="'.$htmlid.'_openstreetmap" class="valigntextbottom" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/common/gmap.png"></a>';
2781  }
2782  }
2783  }
2784  if ($noprint) return $out;
2785  else print $out;
2786 }
2787 
2788 
2796 function isValidEmail($address, $acceptsupervisorkey = 0)
2797 {
2798  if ($acceptsupervisorkey && $address == '__SUPERVISOREMAIL__') return true;
2799  if (filter_var($address, FILTER_VALIDATE_EMAIL)) return true;
2800 
2801  return false;
2802 }
2803 
2811 function isValidMXRecord($domain)
2812 {
2813  if (function_exists('idn_to_ascii') && function_exists('checkdnsrr'))
2814  {
2815  if (! checkdnsrr(idn_to_ascii($domain), 'MX'))
2816  {
2817  return 0;
2818  }
2819  if (function_exists('getmxrr'))
2820  {
2821  $mxhosts=array();
2822  $weight=array();
2823  getmxrr(idn_to_ascii($domain), $mxhosts, $weight);
2824  if (count($mxhosts) > 1) return 1;
2825  if (count($mxhosts) == 1 && ! empty($mxhosts[0])) return 1;
2826 
2827  return 0;
2828  }
2829  }
2830  return -1;
2831 }
2832 
2840 function isValidPhone($phone)
2841 {
2842  return true;
2843 }
2844 
2845 
2853 function dol_strlen($string, $stringencoding = 'UTF-8')
2854 {
2855  if (function_exists('mb_strlen')) return mb_strlen($string, $stringencoding);
2856  else return strlen($string);
2857 }
2858 
2869 function dol_substr($string, $start, $length, $stringencoding = '', $trunconbytes = 0)
2870 {
2871  global $langs;
2872 
2873  if (empty($stringencoding)) $stringencoding=$langs->charset_output;
2874 
2875  $ret='';
2876  if (empty($trunconbytes))
2877  {
2878  if (function_exists('mb_substr'))
2879  {
2880  $ret=mb_substr($string, $start, $length, $stringencoding);
2881  }
2882  else
2883  {
2884  $ret=substr($string, $start, $length);
2885  }
2886  }
2887  else
2888  {
2889  if (function_exists('mb_strcut'))
2890  {
2891  $ret=mb_strcut($string, $start, $length, $stringencoding);
2892  }
2893  else
2894  {
2895  $ret=substr($string, $start, $length);
2896  }
2897  }
2898  return $ret;
2899 }
2900 
2901 
2915 function dol_trunc($string, $size = 40, $trunc = 'right', $stringencoding = 'UTF-8', $nodot = 0, $display = 0)
2916 {
2917  global $conf;
2918 
2919  if ($size==0 || ! empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_TRUNC)) return $string;
2920 
2921  if (empty($stringencoding)) $stringencoding='UTF-8';
2922  // reduce for small screen
2923  if ($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen==1 && $display==1) $size = round($size/3);
2924 
2925  // We go always here
2926  if ($trunc == 'right')
2927  {
2928  $newstring=dol_textishtml($string)?dol_string_nohtmltag($string, 1):$string;
2929  if (dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding) > ($size+($nodot?0:3))) // If nodot is 0 and size is 1,2 or 3 chars more, we don't trunc and don't add ...
2930  return dol_substr($newstring, 0, $size, $stringencoding).($nodot?'':'...');
2931  else
2932  //return 'u'.$size.'-'.$newstring.'-'.dol_strlen($newstring,$stringencoding).'-'.$string;
2933  return $string;
2934  }
2935  elseif ($trunc == 'middle')
2936  {
2937  $newstring=dol_textishtml($string)?dol_string_nohtmltag($string, 1):$string;
2938  if (dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding) > 2 && dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding) > ($size+1))
2939  {
2940  $size1=round($size/2);
2941  $size2=round($size/2);
2942  return dol_substr($newstring, 0, $size1, $stringencoding).'...'.dol_substr($newstring, dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding) - $size2, $size2, $stringencoding);
2943  }
2944  else
2945  return $string;
2946  }
2947  elseif ($trunc == 'left')
2948  {
2949  $newstring=dol_textishtml($string)?dol_string_nohtmltag($string, 1):$string;
2950  if (dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding) > ($size+($nodot?0:3))) // If nodot is 0 and size is 1,2 or 3 chars more, we don't trunc and don't add ...
2951  return '...'.dol_substr($newstring, dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding) - $size, $size, $stringencoding);
2952  else
2953  return $string;
2954  }
2955  elseif ($trunc == 'wrap')
2956  {
2957  $newstring=dol_textishtml($string)?dol_string_nohtmltag($string, 1):$string;
2958  if (dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding) > ($size+1))
2959  return dol_substr($newstring, 0, $size, $stringencoding)."\n".dol_trunc(dol_substr($newstring, $size, dol_strlen($newstring, $stringencoding)-$size, $stringencoding), $size, $trunc);
2960  else
2961  return $string;
2962  }
2963  else return 'BadParam3CallingDolTrunc';
2964 }
2965 
2985 function img_picto($titlealt, $picto, $moreatt = '', $pictoisfullpath = false, $srconly = 0, $notitle = 0, $alt = '', $morecss = '', $marginleftonlyshort = 2)
2986 {
2987  global $conf, $langs;
2988 
2989  // We forge fullpathpicto for image to $path/img/$picto. By default, we take DOL_URL_ROOT/theme/$conf->theme/img/$picto
2990  $url = DOL_URL_ROOT;
2991  $theme = $conf->theme;
2992  $path = 'theme/'.$theme;
2993 
2994  // Define fullpathpicto to use into src
2995  if ($pictoisfullpath) {
2996  // Clean parameters
2997  if (! preg_match('/(\.png|\.gif|\.svg)$/i', $picto)) {
2998  $picto .= '.png';
2999  }
3000  $fullpathpicto = $picto;
3001  $reg=array();
3002  if (preg_match('/class="([^"]+)"/', $moreatt, $reg)) {
3003  $morecss .= ($morecss ? ' ' : '') . $reg[1];
3004  $moreatt = str_replace('class="'.$reg[1].'"', '', $moreatt);
3005  }
3006  } else {
3007  $pictowithoutext = preg_replace('/(\.png|\.gif|\.svg)$/', '', $picto);
3008 
3009  //if (in_array($picto, array('switch_off', 'switch_on', 'off', 'on')))
3010  if (empty($srconly) && in_array($pictowithoutext, array(
3011  'bank', 'close_title', 'delete', 'edit', 'ellipsis-h', 'filter', 'grip', 'grip_title', 'list', 'listlight', 'note', 'off', 'on', 'play', 'playdisabled', 'printer', 'resize',
3012  'note', 'setup', 'sign-out', 'split', 'switch_off', 'switch_on', 'unlink', 'uparrow', '1downarrow', '1uparrow', '1leftarrow', '1rightarrow',
3013  'jabber','skype','twitter','facebook','linkedin',
3014  'chevron-left','chevron-right','chevron-down','chevron-top'
3015  )
3016  )) {
3017  $fa='fa';
3018  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_FONT_AWESOME_5)) $fa='fas';
3019  $fakey = $pictowithoutext;
3020  $facolor = ''; $fasize = '';
3021 
3022  if ($pictowithoutext == 'setup') {
3023  $fakey = 'fa-cog';
3024  $fasize = '1.4em';
3025  }
3026  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'switch_off') {
3027  $fakey = 'fa-toggle-off';
3028  $facolor = '#999';
3029  $fasize = '2em';
3030  }
3031  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'switch_on') {
3032  $fakey = 'fa-toggle-on';
3033  $facolor = '#227722';
3034  $fasize = '2em';
3035  }
3036  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'off') {
3037  $fakey = 'fa-square-o';
3038  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_FONT_AWESOME_5))
3039  {
3040  $fakey = 'fa-square';
3041  $fa='far';
3042  }
3043  $fasize = '1.3em';
3044  }
3045  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'on') {
3046  $fakey = 'fa-check-square-o';
3047  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_FONT_AWESOME_5))
3048  {
3049  $fakey = 'fa-check-square';
3050  $fa='far';
3051  }
3052  $fasize = '1.3em';
3053  }
3054  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'bank') {
3055  $fakey = 'fa-bank';
3056  $facolor = '#444';
3057  }
3058  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'close_title') {
3059  $fakey = 'fa-window-close';
3060  }
3061  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'delete') {
3062  $fakey = 'fa-trash';
3063  $facolor = '#444';
3064  }
3065  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'edit') {
3066  $fakey = 'fa-pencil';
3067  $facolor = '#444';
3068  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_FONT_AWESOME_5)) $fakey = 'fa-pencil-alt';
3069  }
3070  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'filter') {
3071  $fakey = 'fa-'.$pictowithoutext;
3072  }
3073  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'grip_title' || $pictowithoutext == 'grip') {
3074  $fakey = 'fa-arrows';
3075  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_FONT_AWESOME_5)) $fakey = 'fa-arrows-alt';
3076  }
3077  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'listlight') {
3078  $fakey = 'fa-download';
3079  $facolor = '#999';
3080  $marginleftonlyshort=1;
3081  }
3082  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'printer') {
3083  $fakey = 'fa-print';
3084  $fasize = '1.2em';
3085  $facolor = '#444';
3086  }
3087  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'resize') {
3088  $fakey = 'fa-crop';
3089  $facolor = '#444';
3090  }
3091  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'note') {
3092  $fakey = 'fa-sticky-note-o';
3093  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_FONT_AWESOME_5))
3094  {
3095  $fakey = 'fa-sticky-note'; $fa = 'far';
3096  }
3097  $facolor = '#999';
3098  $marginleftonlyshort=1;
3099  }
3100  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'uparrow') {
3101  $fakey = 'fa-mail-forward';
3102  $facolor = '#555';
3103  }
3104  elseif (in_array($pictowithoutext, array('1uparrow', '1downarrow', '1leftarrow', '1rightarrow', '1uparrow_selected', '1downarrow_selected', '1leftarrow_selected', '1rightarrow_selected'))) {
3105  $convertarray=array('1uparrow'=>'caret-up', '1downarrow'=>'caret-down', '1leftarrow'=>'caret-left', '1rightarrow'=>'caret-right', '1uparrow_selected'=>'caret-up', '1downarrow_selected'=>'caret-down', '1leftarrow_selected'=>'caret-left', '1rightarrow_selected'=>'caret-right');
3106  $fakey = 'fa-'.$convertarray[$pictowithoutext];
3107  if (preg_match('/selected/', $pictowithoutext)) $facolor = '#888';
3108  $marginleftonlyshort = 1;
3109  }
3110  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'sign-out') {
3111  $fakey = 'fa-sign-out';
3112  $marginleftonlyshort=0;
3113  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_FONT_AWESOME_5)) $fakey = 'fa-sign-out-alt';
3114  }
3115  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'unlink') {
3116  $fakey = 'fa-chain-broken';
3117  $facolor = '#555';
3118  }
3119  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'playdisabled') {
3120  $fakey = 'fa-play';
3121  $facolor = '#ccc';
3122  }
3123  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'play') {
3124  $fakey = 'fa-play';
3125  $facolor = '#444';
3126  }
3127  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'jabber') {
3128  $fakey = 'fa-comment-o';
3129  }
3130  elseif (in_array($pictowithoutext, array('skype', 'twitter', 'facebook', 'linkedin'))) {
3131  $fakey = 'fa-'.$pictowithoutext;
3132  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_FONT_AWESOME_5)) $fa = 'fab';
3133  }
3134  elseif ($pictowithoutext == 'split') {
3135  $fakey = 'fa-code-fork';
3136  }
3137  else {
3138  $fakey = 'fa-'.$pictowithoutext;
3139  $facolor = '#444';
3140  $marginleftonlyshort=0;
3141  }
3142  //this snippet only needed since function img_edit accepts only one additional parameter: no separate one for css only.
3143  //class/style need to be extracted to avoid duplicate class/style validation errors when $moreatt is added to the end of the attributes
3144  $reg=array();
3145  if (preg_match('/class="([^"]+)"/', $moreatt, $reg)) {
3146  $morecss .= ($morecss ? ' ' : '') . $reg[1];
3147  $moreatt = str_replace('class="'.$reg[1].'"', '', $moreatt);
3148  }
3149  if (preg_match('/style="([^"]+)"/', $moreatt, $reg)) {
3150  $morestyle = ' '. $reg[1];
3151  $moreatt = str_replace('style="'.$reg[1].'"', '', $moreatt);
3152  }
3153  $moreatt=trim($moreatt);
3154 
3155  $enabledisablehtml = '<span class="' . $fa . ' ' . $fakey . ($marginleftonlyshort ? ($marginleftonlyshort == 1 ? ' marginleftonlyshort' : ' marginleftonly') : '');
3156  $enabledisablehtml .= ' valignmiddle' . ($morecss ? ' ' . $morecss : '') . '" style="' . ($fasize ? ('font-size: ' . $fasize . ';') : '') . ($facolor ? (' color: ' . $facolor . ';') : '') . ($morestyle ? ' ' . $morestyle : '') . '"' . (($notitle || empty($titlealt)) ? '' : ' title="' . dol_escape_htmltag($titlealt) . '"') . ($moreatt ? ' ' . $moreatt : '') . '>';
3157  if (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_OPTIMIZEFORTEXTBROWSER)) {
3158  $enabledisablehtml.= $titlealt;
3159  }
3160  $enabledisablehtml.= '</span>';
3161 
3162  return $enabledisablehtml;
3163  }
3164 
3165  if (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_OVERWRITE_THEME_PATH)) {
3166  $path = $conf->global->MAIN_OVERWRITE_THEME_PATH.'/theme/'.$theme; // If the theme does not have the same name as the module
3167  }
3168  elseif (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_OVERWRITE_THEME_RES)) {
3169  $path = $conf->global->MAIN_OVERWRITE_THEME_RES.'/theme/'.$conf->global->MAIN_OVERWRITE_THEME_RES; // To allow an external module to overwrite image resources whatever is activated theme
3170  }
3171  elseif (! empty($conf->modules_parts['theme']) && array_key_exists($theme, $conf->modules_parts['theme'])) {
3172  $path = $theme.'/theme/'.$theme; // If the theme have the same name as the module
3173  }
3174 
3175  // If we ask an image into $url/$mymodule/img (instead of default path)
3176  if (preg_match('/^([^@]+)@([^@]+)$/i', $picto, $regs)) {
3177  $picto = $regs[1];
3178  $path = $regs[2]; // $path is $mymodule
3179  }
3180 
3181  // Clean parameters
3182  if (! preg_match('/(\.png|\.gif|\.svg)$/i', $picto)) {
3183  $picto .= '.png';
3184  }
3185  // If alt path are defined, define url where img file is, according to physical path
3186  // ex: array(["main"]=>"/home/maindir/htdocs", ["alt0"]=>"/home/moddir0/htdocs", ...)
3187  foreach ($conf->file->dol_document_root as $type => $dirroot) {
3188  if ($type == 'main') {
3189  continue;
3190  }
3191  // This need a lot of time, that's why enabling alternative dir like "custom" dir is not recommanded
3192  if (file_exists($dirroot.'/'.$path.'/img/'.$picto)) {
3193  $url = DOL_URL_ROOT.$conf->file->dol_url_root[$type];
3194  break;
3195  }
3196  }
3197 
3198  // $url is '' or '/custom', $path is current theme or
3199  $fullpathpicto = $url.'/'.$path.'/img/'.$picto;
3200  }
3201 
3202  if ($srconly) {
3203  return $fullpathpicto;
3204  }
3205  // tag title is used for tooltip on <a>, tag alt can be used with very simple text on image for blind people
3206  return '<img src="'.$fullpathpicto.'" alt="'.dol_escape_htmltag($alt).'"'.(($notitle || empty($titlealt))?'':' title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($titlealt).'"').($moreatt?' '.$moreatt.($morecss?' class="'.$morecss.'"':''):' class="inline-block'.($morecss?' '.$morecss:'').'"').'>'; // Alt is used for accessibility, title for popup
3207 }
3208 
3222 function img_object($titlealt, $picto, $moreatt = '', $pictoisfullpath = false, $srconly = 0, $notitle = 0)
3223 {
3224  return img_picto($titlealt, 'object_'.$picto, $moreatt, $pictoisfullpath, $srconly, $notitle);
3225 }
3226 
3238 function img_weather($titlealt, $picto, $moreatt = '', $pictoisfullpath = 0, $morecss = '')
3239 {
3240  global $conf;
3241 
3242  if (is_numeric($picto))
3243  {
3244  $leveltopicto=array(0=>'weather-clear.png', 1=>'weather-few-clouds.png', 2=>'weather-clouds.png', 3=>'weather-many-clouds.png', 4=>'weather-storm.png');
3245  //return '<i class="fa fa-weather-level'.$picto.'"></i>';
3246  $picto = $leveltopicto[$picto];
3247  }
3248  elseif (! preg_match('/(\.png|\.gif)$/i', $picto)) $picto .= '.png';
3249 
3250  $path = DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/'.$conf->theme.'/img/weather/'.$picto;
3251 
3252  return img_picto($titlealt, $path, $moreatt, 1, 0, 0, '', $morecss);
3253 }
3254 
3265 function img_picto_common($titlealt, $picto, $moreatt = '', $pictoisfullpath = 0)
3266 {
3267  global $conf;
3268 
3269  if (! preg_match('/(\.png|\.gif)$/i', $picto)) $picto .= '.png';
3270 
3271  if ($pictoisfullpath) $path = $picto;
3272  else
3273  {
3274  $path = DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/common/'.$picto;
3275 
3276  if (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_MODULE_CAN_OVERWRITE_COMMONICONS))
3277  {
3278  $themepath = DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/theme/'.$conf->theme.'/img/'.$picto;
3279 
3280  if (file_exists($themepath)) $path = $themepath;
3281  }
3282  }
3283 
3284  return img_picto($titlealt, $path, $moreatt, 1);
3285 }
3286 
3294 function img_action($titlealt, $numaction)
3295 {
3296  global $conf, $langs;
3297 
3298  if (empty($titlealt) || $titlealt == 'default')
3299  {
3300  if ($numaction == '-1' || $numaction == 'ST_NO') { $numaction = -1; $titlealt = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('ChangeDoNotContact'); }
3301  elseif ($numaction == '0' || $numaction == 'ST_NEVER') { $numaction = 0; $titlealt = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('ChangeNeverContacted'); }
3302  elseif ($numaction == '1' || $numaction == 'ST_TODO') { $numaction = 1; $titlealt = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('ChangeToContact'); }
3303  elseif ($numaction == '2' || $numaction == 'ST_PEND') { $numaction = 2; $titlealt = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('ChangeContactInProcess'); }
3304  elseif ($numaction == '3' || $numaction == 'ST_DONE') { $numaction = 3; $titlealt = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('ChangeContactDone'); }
3305  else { $titlealt = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('ChangeStatus '.$numaction); $numaction = 0; }
3306  }
3307  if (! is_numeric($numaction)) $numaction=0;
3308 
3309  return img_picto($titlealt, 'stcomm'.$numaction.'.png');
3310 }
3311

3322 
3323  if ($titlealt == 'default') $titlealt = $langs->trans('Show');
3324 
3325  return img_picto($titlealt, 'pdf'.$size.'.png');
3326 }

3449 function img_help($usehelpcursor = 1, $usealttitle = 1)
3450 {
3451  global $conf, $langs;
3452 
3453  if ($usealttitle)
3454  {
3455  if (is_string($usealttitle)) $usealttitle = dol_escape_htmltag($usealttitle);
3456  else $usealttitle = $langs->trans('Info');
3457  }
3458 
3459  return img_picto($usealttitle, 'info.png', 'style="vertical-align: middle;'.($usehelpcursor == 1 ? ' cursor: help': ($usehelpcursor == 2 ? ' cursor: pointer':'')).'"');
3460 }

3485 function img_warning($titlealt = 'default', $moreatt = '', $morecss = 'pictowarning')
3486 {

3488 
3489  if ($titlealt == 'default') $titlealt = $langs->trans('Warning');
3490 
3491  //return '<div class="imglatecoin">'.img_picto($titlealt, 'warning_white.png', 'class="pictowarning valignmiddle"'.($moreatt ? ($moreatt == '1' ? ' style="float: right"' : ' '.$moreatt): '')).'</div>';
3492  return img_picto($titlealt, 'warning.png', 'class="valignmiddle'.($morecss?' '.$morecss:'').'"'.($moreatt ? ($moreatt == '1' ? ' style="float: right"' : ' '.$moreatt): ''));
3493 }
3494 
3501 function img_error($titlealt = 'default')
3502 {
3503  global $conf, $langs;
3504 
3505  if ($titlealt == 'default') $titlealt = $langs->trans('Error');
3506 
3507  return img_picto($titlealt, 'error.png', 'class="valigntextbottom"');
3508 }
3509

3518 {
3519  global $conf, $langs;
3520 
3521  if ($titlealt == 'default') $titlealt = $langs->trans('Next');
3522 
3523  //return img_picto($titlealt, 'next.png', $moreatt);
3524  return '<span class="fa fa-chevron-right paddingright paddingleft" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($titlealt).'"></span>';
3525 }

3611 
3619 function img_allow($allow, $titlealt = 'default')
3620 {
3621  global $conf, $langs;
3622 
3623  if ($titlealt == 'default') $titlealt = $langs->trans('Active');
3624 
3625  if ($allow == 1) return img_picto($titlealt, 'tick.png');
3626 
3627  return '-';
3628 }
3629 
3636 function img_credit_card($brand)
3637 {
3638  if ($brand == 'visa' || $brand == 'Visa') {$brand='cc-visa';}
3639  elseif ($brand == 'mastercard' || $brand == 'MasterCard') {$brand='cc-mastercard';}
3640  elseif ($brand == 'amex' || $brand == 'American Express') {$brand='cc-amex';}
3641  elseif ($brand == 'discover' || $brand == 'Discover') {$brand='cc-discover';}
3642  elseif ($brand == 'jcb' || $brand == 'JCB') {$brand='cc-jcb';}
3643  elseif ($brand == 'diners' || $brand == 'Diners club') {$brand='cc-diners-club';}
3644  elseif (! in_array($brand, array('cc-visa','cc-mastercard','cc-amex','cc-discover','cc-jcb','cc-diners-club'))) {$brand='credit-card';}
3645 
3646  return '<span class="fa fa-'.$brand.' fa-2x fa-fw"></span>';
3647 }
3648 
3657 function img_mime($file, $titlealt = '', $morecss = '')
3658 {
3659  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/files.lib.php';
3660 
3661  $mimetype = dol_mimetype($file, '', 1);
3662  $mimeimg = dol_mimetype($file, '', 2);
3663  $mimefa = dol_mimetype($file, '', 4);
3664 
3665  if (empty($titlealt)) $titlealt = 'Mime type: '.$mimetype;
3666 
3667  //return img_picto_common($titlealt, 'mime/'.$mimeimg, 'class="'.$morecss.'"');
3668  return '<i class="fa fa-'.$mimefa.' paddingright"'.($titlealt ? ' title="'.$titlealt.'"' : '').'></i>';
3669 }
3670 
3671 
3679 function img_search($titlealt = 'default', $other = '')
3680 {
3681  global $conf, $langs;
3682 
3683  if ($titlealt == 'default') $titlealt = $langs->trans('Search');
3684 
3685  $img = img_picto($titlealt, 'search.png', $other, false, 1);
3686 
3687  $input = '<input type="image" class="liste_titre" name="button_search" src="'.$img.'" ';
3688  $input.= 'value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($titlealt).'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($titlealt).'" >';
3689 
3690  return $input;
3691 }

3700 function img_searchclear($titlealt = 'default', $other = '')

3702  global $conf, $langs;
3703 
3704  if ($titlealt == 'default') $titlealt = $langs->trans('Search');
3705

3707 
3708  $input = '<input type="image" class="liste_titre" name="button_removefilter" src="'.$img.'" ';
3709  $input.= 'value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($titlealt).'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($titlealt).'" >';
3710 
3711  return $input;
3712 }

3724 function info_admin($text, $infoonimgalt = 0, $nodiv = 0, $admin = '1', $morecss = '')
3725 {
3726  global $conf, $langs;
3727 
3728  if ($infoonimgalt)
3729  {
3730  return img_picto($text, 'info', 'class="hideonsmartphone'.($morecss?' '.$morecss:'').'"');
3731  }
3732 
3733  return ($nodiv?'':'<div class="'.(empty($admin)?'':($admin=='1'?'info':$admin)).' hideonsmartphone'.($morecss?' '.$morecss:'').'">').'<span class="fa fa-info-circle" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($admin?$langs->trans('InfoAdmin'):$langs->trans('Note')).'"></span> '.$text.($nodiv?'':'</div>');
3734 }
3735 
3736 
3749 function dol_print_error($db = '', $error = '', $errors = null)
3750 {
3751  global $conf,$langs,$argv;
3752  global $dolibarr_main_prod;
3753 
3754  $out = '';
3755  $syslog = '';
3756 
3757  // Si erreur intervenue avant chargement langue
3758  if (! $langs)
3759  {
3760  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT .'/core/class/translate.class.php';
3761  $langs = new Translate('', $conf);
3762  $langs->load("main");
3763  }
3764  // Load translation files required by the page
3765  $langs->loadLangs(array('main', 'errors'));
3766 
3767  if ($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT']) // Mode web
3768  {
3769  $out.=$langs->trans("DolibarrHasDetectedError").".<br>\n";
3770  if (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_FEATURES_LEVEL)) $out.="You use an experimental or develop level of features, so please do NOT report any bugs, except if problem is confirmed moving option MAIN_FEATURES_LEVEL back to 0.<br>\n";
3771  $out.=$langs->trans("InformationToHelpDiagnose").":<br>\n";
3772 
3773  $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("Date").":</b> ".dol_print_date(time(), 'dayhourlog')."<br>\n";
3774  $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("Dolibarr").":</b> ".DOL_VERSION."<br>\n";
3775  if (isset($conf->global->MAIN_FEATURES_LEVEL)) $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("LevelOfFeature").":</b> ".$conf->global->MAIN_FEATURES_LEVEL."<br>\n";
3776  if (function_exists("phpversion"))
3777  {
3778  $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("PHP").":</b> ".phpversion()."<br>\n";
3779  }
3780  $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("Server").":</b> ".$_SERVER["SERVER_SOFTWARE"]."<br>\n";
3781  if (function_exists("php_uname"))
3782  {
3783  $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("OS").":</b> ".php_uname()."<br>\n";
3784  }
3785  $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("UserAgent").":</b> ".$_SERVER["HTTP_USER_AGENT"]."<br>\n";
3786  $out.="<br>\n";
3787  $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("RequestedUrl").":</b> ".dol_htmlentities($_SERVER["REQUEST_URI"], ENT_COMPAT, 'UTF-8')."<br>\n";
3788  $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("Referer").":</b> ".(isset($_SERVER["HTTP_REFERER"])?dol_htmlentities($_SERVER["HTTP_REFERER"], ENT_COMPAT, 'UTF-8'):'')."<br>\n";
3789  $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("MenuManager").":</b> ".(isset($conf->standard_menu)?$conf->standard_menu:'')."<br>\n";
3790  $out.="<br>\n";
3791  $syslog.="url=".dol_escape_htmltag($_SERVER["REQUEST_URI"]);
3792  $syslog.=", query_string=".dol_escape_htmltag($_SERVER["QUERY_STRING"]);
3793  }
3794  else // Mode CLI
3795  {
3796  $out.='> '.$langs->transnoentities("ErrorInternalErrorDetected").":\n".$argv[0]."\n";
3797  $syslog.="pid=".dol_getmypid();
3798  }
3799 
3800  if (! empty($conf->modules))
3801  {
3802  $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("Modules").":</b> ".join(', ', $conf->modules)."<br>\n";
3803  }
3804 
3805  if (is_object($db))
3806  {
3807  if ($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT']) // Mode web
3808  {
3809  $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("DatabaseTypeManager").":</b> ".$db->type."<br>\n";
3810  $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("RequestLastAccessInError").":</b> ".($db->lastqueryerror()?dol_escape_htmltag($db->lastqueryerror()):$langs->trans("ErrorNoRequestInError"))."<br>\n";
3811  $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("ReturnCodeLastAccessInError").":</b> ".($db->lasterrno()?dol_escape_htmltag($db->lasterrno()):$langs->trans("ErrorNoRequestInError"))."<br>\n";
3812  $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("InformationLastAccessInError").":</b> ".($db->lasterror()?dol_escape_htmltag($db->lasterror()):$langs->trans("ErrorNoRequestInError"))."<br>\n";
3813  $out.="<br>\n";
3814  }
3815  else // Mode CLI
3816  {
3817  // No dol_escape_htmltag for output, we are in CLI mode
3818  $out.='> '.$langs->transnoentities("DatabaseTypeManager").":\n".$db->type."\n";
3819  $out.='> '.$langs->transnoentities("RequestLastAccessInError").":\n".($db->lastqueryerror()?$db->lastqueryerror():$langs->transnoentities("ErrorNoRequestInError"))."\n";
3820  $out.='> '.$langs->transnoentities("ReturnCodeLastAccessInError").":\n".($db->lasterrno()?$db->lasterrno():$langs->transnoentities("ErrorNoRequestInError"))."\n";
3821  $out.='> '.$langs->transnoentities("InformationLastAccessInError").":\n".($db->lasterror()?$db->lasterror():$langs->transnoentities("ErrorNoRequestInError"))."\n";
3822  }
3823  $syslog.=", sql=".$db->lastquery();
3824  $syslog.=", db_error=".$db->lasterror();
3825  }
3826 
3827  if ($error || $errors)
3828  {
3829  $langs->load("errors");
3830 
3831  // Merge all into $errors array
3832  if (is_array($error) && is_array($errors)) $errors=array_merge($error, $errors);
3833  elseif (is_array($error)) $errors=$error;
3834  elseif (is_array($errors)) $errors=array_merge(array($error), $errors);
3835  else $errors=array_merge(array($error));
3836 
3837  foreach($errors as $msg)
3838  {
3839  if (empty($msg)) continue;
3840  if ($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT']) // Mode web
3841  {
3842  $out.="<b>".$langs->trans("Message").":</b> ".dol_escape_htmltag($msg)."<br>\n" ;
3843  }
3844  else // Mode CLI
3845  {
3846  $out.='> '.$langs->transnoentities("Message").":\n".$msg."\n" ;
3847  }
3848  $syslog.=", msg=".$msg;
3849  }
3850  }
3851  if (empty($dolibarr_main_prod) && $_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'] && function_exists('xdebug_print_function_stack') && function_exists('xdebug_call_file'))
3852  {
3853  xdebug_print_function_stack();
3854  $out.='<b>XDebug informations:</b>'."<br>\n";
3855  $out.='File: '.xdebug_call_file()."<br>\n";
3856  $out.='Line: '.xdebug_call_line()."<br>\n";
3857  $out.='Function: '.xdebug_call_function()."<br>\n";
3858  $out.="<br>\n";
3859  }
3860 
3861  if (empty($dolibarr_main_prod)) print $out;
3862  else
3863  {
3864  print $langs->trans("DolibarrHasDetectedError").'. ';
3865  print $langs->trans("YouCanSetOptionDolibarrMainProdToZero");
3866  define("MAIN_CORE_ERROR", 1);
3867  }
3868  //else print 'Sorry, an error occured but the parameter $dolibarr_main_prod is defined in conf file so no message is reported to your browser. Please read the log file for error message.';
3869  dol_syslog("Error ".$syslog, LOG_ERR);
3870 }
3871 
3882 function dol_print_error_email($prefixcode, $errormessage = '', $errormessages = array(), $morecss = 'error', $email = '')
3883 {
3884  global $langs,$conf;
3885 
3886  if (empty($email)) $email=$conf->global->MAIN_INFO_SOCIETE_MAIL;
3887 
3888  $langs->load("errors");
3889  $now=dol_now();
3890 
3891  print '<br><div class="center login_main_message"><div class="'.$morecss.'">';
3892  print $langs->trans("ErrorContactEMail", $email, $prefixcode.dol_print_date($now, '%Y%m%d'));
3893  if ($errormessage) print '<br><br>'.$errormessage;
3894  if (is_array($errormessages) && count($errormessages))
3895  {
3896  foreach($errormessages as $mesgtoshow)
3897  {
3898  print '<br><br>'.$mesgtoshow;
3899  }
3900  }
3901  print '</div></div>';
3902 }
3903 
3919 function print_liste_field_titre($name, $file = "", $field = "", $begin = "", $moreparam = "", $moreattrib = "", $sortfield = "", $sortorder = "", $prefix = "", $tooltip = "")
3920 {
3921  print getTitleFieldOfList($name, 0, $file, $field, $begin, $moreparam, $moreattrib, $sortfield, $sortorder, $prefix, 0, $tooltip);
3922 }
3923 
3941 function getTitleFieldOfList($name, $thead = 0, $file = "", $field = "", $begin = "", $moreparam = "", $moreattrib = "", $sortfield = "", $sortorder = "", $prefix = "", $disablesortlink = 0, $tooltip = '')
3942 {
3943  global $conf, $langs, $form;
3944  //print "$name, $file, $field, $begin, $options, $moreattrib, $sortfield, $sortorder<br>\n";
3945 
3946  if ($moreattrib == 'class="right"') $prefix.='right '; // For backward compatibility
3947 
3948  $sortorder=strtoupper($sortorder);
3949  $out='';
3950  $sortimg='';
3951 
3952  $tag='th';
3953  if ($thead==2) $tag='div';
3954 
3955  $tmpsortfield=explode(',', $sortfield);
3956  $sortfield1=trim($tmpsortfield[0]); // If $sortfield is 'd.datep,d.id', it becomes 'd.datep'
3957  $tmpfield=explode(',', $field);
3958  $field1=trim($tmpfield[0]); // If $field is 'd.datep,d.id', it becomes 'd.datep'
3959 
3960  //var_dump('field='.$field.' field1='.$field1.' sortfield='.$sortfield.' sortfield1='.$sortfield1);
3961  // If field is used as sort criteria we use a specific css class liste_titre_sel
3962  // Example if (sortfield,field)=("nom","xxx.nom") or (sortfield,field)=("nom","nom")
3963  if ($field1 && ($sortfield1 == $field1 || $sortfield1 == preg_replace("/^[^\.]+\./", "", $field1))) $out.= '<'.$tag.' class="'.$prefix.'liste_titre_sel" '. $moreattrib.'>';
3964  else $out.= '<'.$tag.' class="'.$prefix.'liste_titre" '. $moreattrib.'>';
3965 
3966  if (empty($thead) && $field && empty($disablesortlink)) // If this is a sort field
3967  {
3968  $options=preg_replace('/sortfield=([a-zA-Z0-9,\s\.]+)/i', '', $moreparam);
3969  $options=preg_replace('/sortorder=([a-zA-Z0-9,\s\.]+)/i', '', $options);
3970  $options=preg_replace('/&+/i', '&', $options);
3971  if (! preg_match('/^&/', $options)) $options='&'.$options;
3972 
3973  $sortordertouseinlink='';
3974  if ($field1 != $sortfield1) // We are on another field than current sorted field
3975  {
3976  if (preg_match('/^DESC/i', $sortorder))
3977  {
3978  $sortordertouseinlink.=str_repeat('desc,', count(explode(',', $field)));
3979  }
3980  else // We reverse the var $sortordertouseinlink
3981  {
3982  $sortordertouseinlink.=str_repeat('asc,', count(explode(',', $field)));
3983  }
3984  }
3985  else // We are on field that is the first current sorting criteria
3986  {
3987  if (preg_match('/^ASC/i', $sortorder)) // We reverse the var $sortordertouseinlink
3988  {
3989  $sortordertouseinlink.=str_repeat('desc,', count(explode(',', $field)));
3990  }
3991  else
3992  {
3993  $sortordertouseinlink.=str_repeat('asc,', count(explode(',', $field)));
3994  }
3995  }
3996  $sortordertouseinlink=preg_replace('/,$/', '', $sortordertouseinlink);
3997  $out.= '<a class="reposition" href="'.$file.'?sortfield='.$field.'&sortorder='.$sortordertouseinlink.'&begin='.$begin.$options.'">';
3998  }
3999 
4000  if ($tooltip) $out.=$form->textwithpicto($langs->trans($name), $langs->trans($tooltip));
4001  else $out.=$langs->trans($name);
4002 
4003  if (empty($thead) && $field && empty($disablesortlink)) // If this is a sort field
4004  {
4005  $out.='</a>';
4006  }
4007 
4008  if (empty($thead) && $field) // If this is a sort field
4009  {
4010  $options=preg_replace('/sortfield=([a-zA-Z0-9,\s\.]+)/i', '', $moreparam);
4011  $options=preg_replace('/sortorder=([a-zA-Z0-9,\s\.]+)/i', '', $options);
4012  $options=preg_replace('/&+/i', '&', $options);
4013  if (! preg_match('/^&/', $options)) $options='&'.$options;
4014 
4015  if (! $sortorder || $field1 != $sortfield1)
4016  {
4017  //$out.= '<a href="'.$file.'?sortfield='.$field.'&sortorder=asc&begin='.$begin.$options.'">'.img_down("A-Z",0).'</a>';
4018  //$out.= '<a href="'.$file.'?sortfield='.$field.'&sortorder=desc&begin='.$begin.$options.'">'.img_up("Z-A",0).'</a>';
4019  }
4020  else
4021  {
4022  if (preg_match('/^DESC/', $sortorder)) {
4023  //$out.= '<a href="'.$file.'?sortfield='.$field.'&sortorder=asc&begin='.$begin.$options.'">'.img_down("A-Z",0).'</a>';
4024  //$out.= '<a href="'.$file.'?sortfield='.$field.'&sortorder=desc&begin='.$begin.$options.'">'.img_up("Z-A",1).'</a>';
4025  $sortimg.= '<span class="nowrap">'.img_up("Z-A", 0).'</span>';
4026  }
4027  if (preg_match('/^ASC/', $sortorder)) {
4028  //$out.= '<a href="'.$file.'?sortfield='.$field.'&sortorder=asc&begin='.$begin.$options.'">'.img_down("A-Z",1).'</a>';
4029  //$out.= '<a href="'.$file.'?sortfield='.$field.'&sortorder=desc&begin='.$begin.$options.'">'.img_up("Z-A",0).'</a>';
4030  $sortimg.= '<span class="nowrap">'.img_down("A-Z", 0).'</span>';
4031  }
4032  }
4033  }
4034 
4035  $out.=$sortimg;
4036 
4037  $out.='</'.$tag.'>';
4038 
4039  return $out;
4040 }
4041 
4050 function print_titre($title)
4051 {
4052  dol_syslog(__FUNCTION__ . " is deprecated", LOG_WARNING);
4053 
4054  print '<div class="titre">'.$title.'</div>';
4055 }
4056 
4068 function print_fiche_titre($title, $mesg = '', $picto = 'title_generic.png', $pictoisfullpath = 0, $id = '')
4069 {
4070  print load_fiche_titre($title, $mesg, $picto, $pictoisfullpath, $id);
4071 }
4072 
4086 function load_fiche_titre($titre, $morehtmlright = '', $picto = 'title_generic.png', $pictoisfullpath = 0, $id = '', $morecssontable = '', $morehtmlcenter = '')
4087 {
4088  global $conf;
4089 
4090  $return='';
4091 
4092  if ($picto == 'setup') $picto='title_generic.png';
4093 
4094  $return.= "\n";
4095  $return.= '<table '.($id?'id="'.$id.'" ':'').'class="centpercent notopnoleftnoright'.($morecssontable?' '.$morecssontable:'').'" style="margin-bottom: 6px;"><tr>'; // maring bottom must be same than into print_barre_list
4096  if ($picto) $return.= '<td class="nobordernopadding widthpictotitle opacityhigh valignmiddle">'.img_picto('', $picto, 'class="valignmiddle widthpictotitle pictotitle"', $pictoisfullpath).'</td>';
4097  $return.= '<td class="nobordernopadding valignmiddle">';
4098  $return.= '<div class="titre inline-block">'.$titre.'</div>';
4099  $return.= '</td>';
4100  if (dol_strlen($morehtmlcenter))
4101  {
4102  $return.= '<td class="nobordernopadding center valignmiddle">'.$morehtmlcenter.'</td>';
4103  }
4104  if (dol_strlen($morehtmlright))
4105  {
4106  $return.= '<td class="nobordernopadding titre_right wordbreak right valignmiddle">'.$morehtmlright.'</td>';
4107  }
4108  $return.= '</tr></table>'."\n";
4109 
4110  return $return;
4111 }
4112 
4134 function print_barre_liste($titre, $page, $file, $options = '', $sortfield = '', $sortorder = '', $morehtmlcenter = '', $num = -1, $totalnboflines = '', $picto = 'title_generic.png', $pictoisfullpath = 0, $morehtmlright = '', $morecss = '', $limit = -1, $hideselectlimit = 0, $hidenavigation = 0)
4135 {
4136  global $conf,$langs;
4137 
4138  $savlimit = $limit;
4139  $savtotalnboflines = $totalnboflines;
4140  $totalnboflines=abs($totalnboflines);
4141 
4142  if ($picto == 'setup') $picto='title_setup.png';
4143  if (($conf->browser->name == 'ie') && $picto=='title_generic.png') $picto='title.gif';
4144  if ($limit < 0) $limit = $conf->liste_limit;
4145  if ($savlimit != 0 && (($num > $limit) || ($num == -1) || ($limit == 0)))
4146  {
4147  $nextpage = 1;
4148  }
4149  else
4150  {
4151  $nextpage = 0;
4152  }
4153  //print 'totalnboflines='.$totalnboflines.'-savlimit='.$savlimit.'-limit='.$limit.'-num='.$num.'-nextpage='.$nextpage;
4154 
4155  print "\n";
4156  print "<!-- Begin title '".$titre."' -->\n";
4157  print '<table class="centpercent notopnoleftnoright'.($morecss?' '.$morecss:'').'" style="margin-bottom: 6px; border: 0"><tr>'; // maring bottom must be same than into load_fiche_tire
4158 
4159  // Left
4160  //if ($picto && $titre) print '<td class="nobordernopadding hideonsmartphone left valignmiddle" style="width: 40px">'.img_picto('', $picto, 'id="pictotitle"', $pictoisfullpath).'</td>';
4161  print '<td class="nobordernopadding valignmiddle">';
4162  if ($picto && $titre) print img_picto('', $picto, 'class="hideonsmartphone valignmiddle opacityhigh pictotitle widthpictotitle"', $pictoisfullpath);
4163  print '<div class="titre inline-block">'.$titre;
4164  if (!empty($titre) && $savtotalnboflines >= 0 && (string) $savtotalnboflines != '') print ' ('.$totalnboflines.')';
4165  print '</div></td>';
4166 
4167  // Center
4168  if ($morehtmlcenter)
4169  {
4170  print '<td class="nobordernopadding center valignmiddle">'.$morehtmlcenter.'</td>';
4171  }
4172 
4173  // Right
4174  print '<td class="nobordernopadding valignmiddle right">';
4175  if ($sortfield) $options .= "&sortfield=".urlencode($sortfield);
4176  if ($sortorder) $options .= "&sortorder=".urlencode($sortorder);
4177  // Show navigation bar
4178  $pagelist = '';
4179  if ($savlimit != 0 && ($page > 0 || $num > $limit))
4180  {
4181  if ($totalnboflines) // If we know total nb of lines
4182  {
4183  // Define nb of extra page links before and after selected page + ... + first or last
4184  $maxnbofpage=(empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen) ? 4 : 1);
4185 
4186  if ($limit > 0) $nbpages=ceil($totalnboflines/$limit);
4187  else $nbpages=1;
4188  $cpt=($page-$maxnbofpage);
4189  if ($cpt < 0) { $cpt=0; }
4190 
4191  if ($cpt>=1)
4192  {
4193  $pagelist.= '<li'.(($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4)?' class="pagination"':'').'><a href="'.$file.'?page=0'.$options.'">1</a></li>';
4194  if ($cpt > 2) $pagelist.='<li'.(($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4)?' class="pagination"':'').'><span '.(($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4)?'class="inactive"':'').'>...</span></li>';
4195  elseif ($cpt == 2) $pagelist.='<li'.(($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4)?' class="pagination"':'').'><a href="'.$file.'?page=1'.$options.'">2</a></li>';
4196  }
4197 
4198  do
4199  {
4200  if ($cpt==$page)
4201  {
4202  $pagelist.= '<li'.(($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4)?' class="pagination"':'').'><span '.(($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4)?'class="active"':'').'>'.($page+1).'</span></li>';
4203  }
4204  else
4205  {
4206  $pagelist.= '<li'.(($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4)?' class="pagination"':'').'><a href="'.$file.'?page='.$cpt.$options.'">'.($cpt+1).'</a></li>';
4207  }
4208  $cpt++;
4209  }
4210  while ($cpt < $nbpages && $cpt<=$page+$maxnbofpage);
4211 
4212  if ($cpt<$nbpages)
4213  {
4214  if ($cpt<$nbpages-2) $pagelist.= '<li'.(($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4)?' class="pagination"':'').'><span '.(($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4)?'class="inactive"':'').'>...</span></li>';
4215  elseif ($cpt == $nbpages-2) $pagelist.= '<li'.(($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4)?' class="pagination"':'').'><a href="'.$file.'?page='.($nbpages-2).$options.'">'.($nbpages - 1).'</a></li>';
4216  $pagelist.= '<li'.(($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4)?' class="pagination"':'').'><a href="'.$file.'?page='.($nbpages-1).$options.'">'.$nbpages.'</a></li>';
4217  }
4218  }
4219  else
4220  {
4221  $pagelist.= '<li'.(($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4)?' class="pagination"':'').'><span '.(($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4)?'class="active"':'').'>'.($page+1)."</li>";
4222  }
4223  }
4224 
4225  print_fleche_navigation($page, $file, $options, $nextpage, $pagelist, $morehtmlright, $savlimit, $totalnboflines, $hideselectlimit); // output the div and ul for previous/last completed with page numbers into $pagelist
4226 
4227  print '</td>';
4228 
4229  print '</tr></table>'."\n";
4230  print "<!-- End title -->\n\n";
4231 }
4232 
4247 function print_fleche_navigation($page, $file, $options = '', $nextpage = 0, $betweenarrows = '', $afterarrows = '', $limit = -1, $totalnboflines = 0, $hideselectlimit = 0)
4248 {
4249  global $conf, $langs;
4250 
4251  print '<div class="pagination"><ul>';
4252  if ((int) $limit >= 0 && empty($hideselectlimit))
4253  {
4254  $pagesizechoices='10:10,15:15,20:20,30:30,40:40,50:50,100:100,250:250,500:500,1000:1000,5000:5000';
4255  //$pagesizechoices.=',0:'.$langs->trans("All"); // Not yet supported
4256  //$pagesizechoices.=',2:2';
4257  if (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_PAGESIZE_CHOICES)) $pagesizechoices=$conf->global->MAIN_PAGESIZE_CHOICES;
4258 
4259  print '<li class="pagination">';
4260  print '<select class="flat selectlimit" name="limit" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans("MaxNbOfRecordPerPage")).'">';
4261  $tmpchoice=explode(',', $pagesizechoices);
4262  $tmpkey=$limit.':'.$limit;
4263  if (! in_array($tmpkey, $tmpchoice)) $tmpchoice[]=$tmpkey;
4264  $tmpkey=$conf->liste_limit.':'.$conf->liste_limit;
4265  if (! in_array($tmpkey, $tmpchoice)) $tmpchoice[]=$tmpkey;
4266  asort($tmpchoice, SORT_NUMERIC);
4267  $found=false;
4268  foreach($tmpchoice as $val)
4269  {
4270  $selected='';
4271  $tmp=explode(':', $val);
4272  $key=$tmp[0];
4273  $val=$tmp[1];
4274  if ($key != '' && $val != '')
4275  {
4276  if ((int) $key == (int) $limit)
4277  {
4278  $selected = ' selected="selected"';
4279  $found = true;
4280  }
4281  print '<option name="'.$key.'"'.$selected.'>'.dol_escape_htmltag($val).'</option>'."\n";
4282  }
4283  }
4284  print '</select>';
4285  if ($conf->use_javascript_ajax)
4286  {
4287  print '<!-- JS CODE TO ENABLE select limit to launch submit of page -->
4288  <script>
4289  jQuery(document).ready(function () {
4290  jQuery(".selectlimit").change(function() {
4291  console.log("Change limit. Send submit");
4292  $(this).parents(\'form:first\').submit();
4293  });
4294  });
4295  </script>
4296  ';
4297  }
4298  print '</li>';
4299  }
4300  if ($page > 0)
4301  {
4302  print '<li class="pagination"><a class="paginationprevious" href="'.$file.'?page='.($page-1).$options.'"><i class="fa fa-chevron-left" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans("Previous")).'"></i></a></li>';
4303  }
4304  if ($betweenarrows)
4305  {
4306  print $betweenarrows;
4307  }
4308  if ($nextpage > 0)
4309  {
4310  print '<li class="pagination"><a class="paginationnext" href="'.$file.'?page='.($page+1).$options.'"><i class="fa fa-chevron-right" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans("Next")).'"></i></a></li>';
4311  }
4312  if ($afterarrows)
4313  {
4314  print '<li class="paginationafterarrows">';
4315  print $afterarrows;
4316  print '</li>';
4317  }
4318  print '</ul></div>'."\n";
4319 }
4320 
4321 
4332 function vatrate($rate, $addpercent = false, $info_bits = 0, $usestarfornpr = 0)
4333 {
4334  $morelabel='';
4335 
4336  if (preg_match('/%/', $rate))
4337  {
4338  $rate=str_replace('%', '', $rate);
4339  $addpercent=true;
4340  }
4341  if (preg_match('/\((.*)\)/', $rate, $reg))
4342  {
4343  $morelabel=' ('.$reg[1].')';
4344  $rate=preg_replace('/\s*'.preg_quote($morelabel, '/').'/', '', $rate);
4345  }
4346  if (preg_match('/\*/', $rate))
4347  {
4348  $rate=str_replace('*', '', $rate);
4349  $info_bits |= 1;
4350  }
4351 
4352  // If rate is '9/9/9' we don't change it. If rate is '9.000' we apply price()
4353  if (! preg_match('/\//', $rate)) $ret=price($rate, 0, '', 0, 0).($addpercent?'%':'');
4354  else
4355  {
4356  // TODO Split on / and output with a price2num to have clean numbers without ton of 000.
4357  $ret=$rate.($addpercent?'%':'');
4358  }
4359  if (($info_bits & 1) && $usestarfornpr >= 0) $ret.=' *';
4360  $ret.=$morelabel;
4361  return $ret;
4362 }
4363 
4364 
4380 function price($amount, $form = 0, $outlangs = '', $trunc = 1, $rounding = -1, $forcerounding = -1, $currency_code = '')
4381 {
4382  global $langs,$conf;
4383 
4384  // Clean parameters
4385  if (empty($amount)) $amount=0; // To have a numeric value if amount not defined or = ''
4386  $amount = (is_numeric($amount)?$amount:0); // Check if amount is numeric, for example, an error occured when amount value = o (letter) instead 0 (number)
4387  if ($rounding < 0) $rounding=min($conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_UNIT, $conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_TOT);
4388  $nbdecimal=$rounding;
4389 
4390  // Output separators by default (french)
4391  $dec=','; $thousand=' ';
4392 
4393  // If $outlangs not forced, we use use language
4394  if (! is_object($outlangs)) $outlangs=$langs;
4395 
4396  if ($outlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorDecimal") != "SeparatorDecimal") $dec=$outlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorDecimal");
4397  if ($outlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorThousand")!= "SeparatorThousand") $thousand=$outlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorThousand");
4398  if ($thousand == 'None') $thousand='';
4399  elseif ($thousand == 'Space') $thousand=' ';
4400  //print "outlangs=".$outlangs->defaultlang." amount=".$amount." html=".$form." trunc=".$trunc." nbdecimal=".$nbdecimal." dec='".$dec."' thousand='".$thousand."'<br>";
4401 
4402  //print "amount=".$amount."-";
4403  $amount = str_replace(',', '.', $amount); // should be useless
4404  //print $amount."-";
4405  $datas = explode('.', $amount);
4406  $decpart = isset($datas[1])?$datas[1]:'';
4407  $decpart = preg_replace('/0+$/i', '', $decpart); // Supprime les 0 de fin de partie decimale
4408  //print "decpart=".$decpart."<br>";
4409  $end='';
4410 
4411  // We increase nbdecimal if there is more decimal than asked (to not loose information)
4412  if (dol_strlen($decpart) > $nbdecimal) $nbdecimal=dol_strlen($decpart);
4413  // Si on depasse max
4414  if ($trunc && $nbdecimal > $conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_SHOWN)
4415  {
4416  $nbdecimal=$conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_SHOWN;
4417  if (preg_match('/\.\.\./i', $conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_SHOWN))
4418  {
4419  // Si un affichage est tronque, on montre des ...
4420  $end='...';
4421  }
4422  }
4423 
4424  // If force rounding
4425  if ($forcerounding >= 0) $nbdecimal = $forcerounding;
4426 
4427  // Format number
4428  $output=number_format($amount, $nbdecimal, $dec, $thousand);
4429  if ($form)
4430  {
4431  $output=preg_replace('/\s/', '&nbsp;', $output);
4432  $output=preg_replace('/\'/', '&#039;', $output);
4433  }
4434  // Add symbol of currency if requested
4435  $cursymbolbefore=$cursymbolafter='';
4436  if ($currency_code)
4437  {
4438  if ($currency_code == 'auto') $currency_code=$conf->currency;
4439 
4440  $listofcurrenciesbefore=array('USD','GBP','AUD','HKD','MXN','PEN','CNY','CAD');
4441  $listoflanguagesbefore=array('nl_NL');
4442  if (in_array($currency_code, $listofcurrenciesbefore) || in_array($outlangs->defaultlang, $listoflanguagesbefore))
4443  {
4444  $cursymbolbefore.=$outlangs->getCurrencySymbol($currency_code);
4445  }
4446  else
4447  {
4448  $tmpcur=$outlangs->getCurrencySymbol($currency_code);
4449  $cursymbolafter.=($tmpcur == $currency_code ? ' '.$tmpcur : $tmpcur);
4450  }
4451  }
4452  $output=$cursymbolbefore.$output.$end.($cursymbolafter?' ':'').$cursymbolafter;
4453 
4454  return $output;
4455 }
4456 
4472 function price2num($amount, $rounding = '', $alreadysqlnb = 0)
4473 {
4474  global $langs,$conf;
4475 
4476  // Round PHP function does not allow number like '1,234.56' nor '1.234,56' nor '1 234,56'
4477  // Numbers must be '1234.56'
4478  // Decimal delimiter for PHP and database SQL requests must be '.'
4479  $dec=','; $thousand=' ';
4480  if ($langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorDecimal") != "SeparatorDecimal") $dec=$langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorDecimal");
4481  if ($langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorThousand")!= "SeparatorThousand") $thousand=$langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("SeparatorThousand");
4482  if ($thousand == 'None') $thousand='';
4483  elseif ($thousand == 'Space') $thousand=' ';
4484  //print "amount=".$amount." html=".$form." trunc=".$trunc." nbdecimal=".$nbdecimal." dec='".$dec."' thousand='".$thousand."'<br>";
4485 
4486  // Convert value to universal number format (no thousand separator, '.' as decimal separator)
4487  if ($alreadysqlnb != 1) // If not a PHP number or unknown, we change format
4488  {
4489  //print 'PP'.$amount.' - '.$dec.' - '.$thousand.' - '.intval($amount).'<br>';
4490 
4491  // Convert amount to format with dolibarr dec and thousand (this is because PHP convert a number
4492  // to format defined by LC_NUMERIC after a calculation and we want source format to be like defined by Dolibarr setup.
4493  if (is_numeric($amount))
4494  {
4495  // We put in temps value of decimal ("0.00001"). Works with 0 and 2.0E-5 and 9999.10
4496  $temps=sprintf("%0.10F", $amount-intval($amount)); // temps=0.0000000000 or 0.0000200000 or 9999.1000000000
4497  $temps=preg_replace('/([\.1-9])0+$/', '\\1', $temps); // temps=0. or 0.00002 or 9999.1
4498  $nbofdec=max(0, dol_strlen($temps)-2); // -2 to remove "0."
4499  $amount=number_format($amount, $nbofdec, $dec, $thousand);
4500  }
4501  //print "QQ".$amount.'<br>';
4502 
4503  // Now make replace (the main goal of function)
4504  if ($thousand != ',' && $thousand != '.') $amount=str_replace(',', '.', $amount); // To accept 2 notations for french users
4505  $amount=str_replace(' ', '', $amount); // To avoid spaces
4506  $amount=str_replace($thousand, '', $amount); // Replace of thousand before replace of dec to avoid pb if thousand is .
4507  $amount=str_replace($dec, '.', $amount);
4508  }
4509 
4510  // Now, make a rounding if required
4511  if ($rounding)
4512  {
4513  $nbofdectoround='';
4514  if ($rounding == 'MU') $nbofdectoround=$conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_UNIT;
4515  elseif ($rounding == 'MT') $nbofdectoround=$conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_TOT;
4516  elseif ($rounding == 'MS') $nbofdectoround=empty($conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_STOCK)?5:$conf->global->MAIN_MAX_DECIMALS_STOCK;
4517  elseif (is_numeric($rounding)) $nbofdectoround=$rounding;
4518  //print "RR".$amount.' - '.$nbofdectoround.'<br>';
4519  if (dol_strlen($nbofdectoround)) $amount = round($amount, $nbofdectoround); // $nbofdectoround can be 0.
4520  else return 'ErrorBadParameterProvidedToFunction';
4521  //print 'SS'.$amount.' - '.$nbofdec.' - '.$dec.' - '.$thousand.' - '.$nbofdectoround.'<br>';
4522 
4523  // Convert amount to format with dolibarr dec and thousand (this is because PHP convert a number
4524  // to format defined by LC_NUMERIC after a calculation and we want source format to be defined by Dolibarr setup.
4525  if (is_numeric($amount))
4526  {
4527  // We put in temps value of decimal ("0.00001"). Works with 0 and 2.0E-5 and 9999.10
4528  $temps=sprintf("%0.10F", $amount-intval($amount)); // temps=0.0000000000 or 0.0000200000 or 9999.1000000000
4529  $temps=preg_replace('/([\.1-9])0+$/', '\\1', $temps); // temps=0. or 0.00002 or 9999.1
4530  $nbofdec=max(0, dol_strlen($temps)-2); // -2 to remove "0."
4531  $amount=number_format($amount, min($nbofdec, $nbofdectoround), $dec, $thousand); // Convert amount to format with dolibarr dec and thousand
4532  }
4533  //print "TT".$amount.'<br>';
4534 
4535  // Always make replace because each math function (like round) replace
4536  // with local values and we want a number that has a SQL string format x.y
4537  if ($thousand != ',' && $thousand != '.') $amount=str_replace(',', '.', $amount); // To accept 2 notations for french users
4538  $amount=str_replace(' ', '', $amount); // To avoid spaces
4539  $amount=str_replace($thousand, '', $amount); // Replace of thousand before replace of dec to avoid pb if thousand is .
4540  $amount=str_replace($dec, '.', $amount);
4541  }
4542 
4543  return $amount;
4544 }
4545 
4546 
4558 function showDimensionInBestUnit($dimension, $unit, $type, $outputlangs, $round = -1, $forceunitoutput = 'no')
4559 {
4560  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/product.lib.php';
4561 
4562  if (($forceunitoutput == 'no' && $dimension < 1/10000 && $unit < 90) || (is_numeric($forceunitoutput) && $forceunitoutput == -6))
4563  {
4564  $dimension = $dimension * 1000000;
4565  $unit = $unit - 6;
4566  }
4567  elseif (($forceunitoutput == 'no' && $dimension < 1/10 && $unit < 90) || (is_numeric($forceunitoutput) && $forceunitoutput == -3))
4568  {
4569  $dimension = $dimension * 1000;
4570  $unit = $unit - 3;
4571  }
4572  elseif (($forceunitoutput == 'no' && $dimension > 100000000 && $unit < 90) || (is_numeric($forceunitoutput) && $forceunitoutput == 6))
4573  {
4574  $dimension = $dimension / 1000000;
4575  $unit = $unit + 6;
4576  }
4577  elseif (($forceunitoutput == 'no' && $dimension > 100000 && $unit < 90) || (is_numeric($forceunitoutput) && $forceunitoutput == 3))
4578  {
4579  $dimension = $dimension / 1000;
4580  $unit = $unit + 3;
4581  }
4582  // Special case when we want output unit into pound or ounce
4583  /* TODO
4584  if ($unit < 90 && $type == 'weight' && is_numeric($forceunitoutput) && (($forceunitoutput == 98) || ($forceunitoutput == 99))
4585  {
4586  $dimension = // convert dimension from standard unit into ounce or pound
4587  $unit = $forceunitoutput;
4588  }
4589  if ($unit > 90 && $type == 'weight' && is_numeric($forceunitoutput) && $forceunitoutput < 90)
4590  {
4591  $dimension = // convert dimension from standard unit into ounce or pound
4592  $unit = $forceunitoutput;
4593  }*/
4594 
4595  $ret=price($dimension, 0, $outputlangs, 0, 0, $round).' '.measuring_units_string($unit, $type);
4596 
4597  return $ret;
4598 }
4599 
4600 
4613 function get_localtax($vatrate, $local, $thirdparty_buyer = "", $thirdparty_seller = "", $vatnpr = 0)
4614 {
4615  global $db, $conf, $mysoc;
4616 
4617  if (empty($thirdparty_seller) || ! is_object($thirdparty_seller)) $thirdparty_seller=$mysoc;
4618 
4619  dol_syslog("get_localtax tva=".$vatrate." local=".$local." thirdparty_buyer id=".(is_object($thirdparty_buyer)?$thirdparty_buyer->id:'')."/country_code=".(is_object($thirdparty_buyer)?$thirdparty_buyer->country_code:'')." thirdparty_seller id=".$thirdparty_seller->id."/country_code=".$thirdparty_seller->country_code." thirdparty_seller localtax1_assuj=".$thirdparty_seller->localtax1_assuj." thirdparty_seller localtax2_assuj=".$thirdparty_seller->localtax2_assuj);
4620 
4621  $vatratecleaned = $vatrate;
4622  if (preg_match('/^(.*)\s*\((.*)\)$/', $vatrate, $reg)) // If vat is "xx (yy)"
4623  {
4624  $vatratecleaned = trim($reg[1]);
4625  $vatratecode = $reg[2];
4626  }
4627 
4628  /*if ($thirdparty_buyer->country_code != $thirdparty_seller->country_code)
4629  {
4630  return 0;
4631  }*/
4632 
4633  // Some test to guess with no need to make database access
4634  if ($mysoc->country_code == 'ES') // For spain localtaxes 1 and 2, tax is qualified if buyer use local tax
4635  {
4636  if ($local == 1)
4637  {
4638  if (! $mysoc->localtax1_assuj || (string) $vatratecleaned == "0") return 0;
4639  if ($thirdparty_seller->id == $mysoc->id)
4640  {
4641  if (! $thirdparty_buyer->localtax1_assuj) return 0;
4642  }
4643  else
4644  {
4645  if (! $thirdparty_seller->localtax1_assuj) return 0;
4646  }
4647  }
4648 
4649  if ($local == 2)
4650  {
4651  //if (! $mysoc->localtax2_assuj || (string) $vatratecleaned == "0") return 0;
4652  if (! $mysoc->localtax2_assuj) return 0; // If main vat is 0, IRPF may be different than 0.
4653  if ($thirdparty_seller->id == $mysoc->id)
4654  {
4655  if (! $thirdparty_buyer->localtax2_assuj) return 0;
4656  }
4657  else
4658  {
4659  if (! $thirdparty_seller->localtax2_assuj) return 0;
4660  }
4661  }
4662  }
4663  else
4664  {
4665  if ($local == 1 && ! $thirdparty_seller->localtax1_assuj) return 0;
4666  if ($local == 2 && ! $thirdparty_seller->localtax2_assuj) return 0;
4667  }
4668 
4669  // For some country MAIN_GET_LOCALTAXES_VALUES_FROM_THIRDPARTY is forced to on.
4670  if (in_array($mysoc->country_code, array('ES')))
4671  {
4672  $conf->global->MAIN_GET_LOCALTAXES_VALUES_FROM_THIRDPARTY = 1;
4673  }
4674 
4675  // Search local taxes
4676  if (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_GET_LOCALTAXES_VALUES_FROM_THIRDPARTY))
4677  {
4678  if ($local==1)
4679  {
4680  if ($thirdparty_seller != $mysoc)
4681  {
4682  if (!isOnlyOneLocalTax($local)) // TODO We should provide $vatrate to search on correct line and not always on line with highest vat rate
4683  {
4684  return $thirdparty_seller->localtax1_value;
4685  }
4686  }
4687  else // i am the seller
4688  {
4689  if (!isOnlyOneLocalTax($local)) // TODO If seller is me, why not always returning this, even if there is only one locatax vat.
4690  {
4691  return $conf->global->MAIN_INFO_VALUE_LOCALTAX1;
4692  }
4693  }
4694  }
4695  if ($local==2)
4696  {
4697  if ($thirdparty_seller != $mysoc)
4698  {
4699  if (!isOnlyOneLocalTax($local)) // TODO We should provide $vatrate to search on correct line and not always on line with highest vat rate
4700  // TODO We should also return value defined on thirdparty only if defined
4701  {
4702  return $thirdparty_seller->localtax2_value;
4703  }
4704  }
4705  else // i am the seller
4706  {
4707  if (in_array($mysoc->country_code, array('ES')))
4708  {
4709  return $thirdparty_buyer->localtax2_value;
4710  }
4711  else
4712  {
4713  return $conf->global->MAIN_INFO_VALUE_LOCALTAX2;
4714  }
4715  }
4716  }
4717  }
4718 
4719  // By default, search value of local tax on line of common tax
4720  $sql = "SELECT t.localtax1, t.localtax2, t.localtax1_type, t.localtax2_type";
4721  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as t, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c";
4722  $sql .= " WHERE t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code = '".$thirdparty_seller->country_code."'";
4723  $sql .= " AND t.taux = ".((float) $vatratecleaned)." AND t.active = 1";
4724  if ($vatratecode) $sql.= " AND t.code ='".$vatratecode."'"; // If we have the code, we use it in priority
4725  else $sql.= " AND t.recuperableonly ='".$vatnpr."'";
4726  dol_syslog("get_localtax", LOG_DEBUG);
4727  $resql=$db->query($sql);
4728 
4729  if ($resql)
4730  {
4731  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
4732  if ($local==1) return $obj->localtax1;
4733  elseif ($local==2) return $obj->localtax2;
4734  }
4735 
4736  return 0;
4737 }
4738 
4739 
4748 function isOnlyOneLocalTax($local)
4749 {
4750  $tax=get_localtax_by_third($local);
4751 
4752  $valors=explode(":", $tax);
4753 
4754  if (count($valors)>1)
4755  {
4756  return false;
4757  }
4758  else
4759  {
4760  return true;
4761  }
4762 }
4763 
4770 function get_localtax_by_third($local)
4771 {
4772  global $db, $mysoc;
4773  $sql ="SELECT t.localtax1, t.localtax2 ";
4774  $sql.=" FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as t inner join ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c ON c.rowid=t.fk_pays";
4775  $sql.=" WHERE c.code = '".$mysoc->country_code."' AND t.active = 1 AND t.taux=(";
4776  $sql.=" SELECT max(tt.taux) FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as tt inner join ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c ON c.rowid=tt.fk_pays";
4777  $sql.=" WHERE c.code = '".$mysoc->country_code."' AND tt.active = 1";
4778  $sql.=" )";
4779 
4780  $resql=$db->query($sql);
4781  if ($resql)
4782  {
4783  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
4784  if ($local==1) return $obj->localtax1;
4785  elseif ($local==2) return $obj->localtax2;
4786  }
4787 
4788  return 0;
4789 }
4790 
4791 
4803 function getTaxesFromId($vatrate, $buyer = null, $seller = null, $firstparamisid = 1)
4804 {
4805  global $db, $mysoc;
4806 
4807  dol_syslog("getTaxesFromId vat id or rate = ".$vatrate);
4808 
4809  // Search local taxes
4810  $sql = "SELECT t.rowid, t.code, t.taux as rate, t.recuperableonly as npr, t.accountancy_code_sell, t.accountancy_code_buy";
4811  $sql.= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as t";
4812  if ($firstparamisid) $sql.= " WHERE t.rowid = ".(int) $vatrate;
4813  else
4814  {
4815  $vatratecleaned = $vatrate;
4816  $vatratecode = '';
4817  if (preg_match('/^(.*)\s*\((.*)\)$/', $vatrate, $reg)) // If vat is "xx (yy)"
4818  {
4819  $vatratecleaned = $reg[1];
4820  $vatratecode = $reg[2];
4821  }
4822 
4823  $sql.=", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c";
4824  /*if ($mysoc->country_code == 'ES') $sql.= " WHERE t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code = '".$buyer->country_code."'"; // vat in spain use the buyer country ??
4825  else $sql.= " WHERE t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code = '".$seller->country_code."'";*/
4826  $sql.= " WHERE t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code = '".$seller->country_code."'";
4827  $sql.= " AND t.taux = ".((float) $vatratecleaned)." AND t.active = 1";
4828  if ($vatratecode) $sql.= " AND t.code = '".$vatratecode."'";
4829  }
4830 
4831  $resql=$db->query($sql);
4832  if ($resql)
4833  {
4834  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
4835  if ($obj) return array('rowid'=>$obj->rowid, 'code'=>$obj->code, 'rate'=>$obj->rate, 'npr'=>$obj->npr, 'accountancy_code_sell'=>$obj->accountancy_code_sell, 'accountancy_code_buy'=>$obj->accountancy_code_buy);
4836  else return array();
4837  }
4838  else dol_print_error($db);
4839 
4840  return array();
4841 }
4842 
4859 function getLocalTaxesFromRate($vatrate, $local, $buyer, $seller, $firstparamisid = 0)
4860 {
4861  global $db, $mysoc;
4862 
4863  dol_syslog("getLocalTaxesFromRate vatrate=".$vatrate." local=".$local);
4864 
4865  // Search local taxes
4866  $sql = "SELECT t.localtax1, t.localtax1_type, t.localtax2, t.localtax2_type, t.accountancy_code_sell, t.accountancy_code_buy";
4867  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as t";
4868  if ($firstparamisid) $sql.= " WHERE t.rowid = ".(int) $vatrate;
4869  else
4870  {
4871  $vatratecleaned = $vatrate;
4872  $vatratecode = '';
4873  if (preg_match('/^(.*)\s*\((.*)\)$/', $vatrate, $reg)) // If vat is "x.x (yy)"
4874  {
4875  $vatratecleaned = $reg[1];
4876  $vatratecode = $reg[2];
4877  }
4878 
4879  $sql.=", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c";
4880  if ($mysoc->country_code == 'ES') $sql .= " WHERE t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code = '".$buyer->country_code."'"; // local tax in spain use the buyer country ??
4881  else $sql .= " WHERE t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code = '".$seller->country_code."'";
4882  $sql.= " AND t.taux = ".((float) $vatratecleaned)." AND t.active = 1";
4883  if ($vatratecode) $sql.= " AND t.code = '".$vatratecode."'";
4884  }
4885 
4886  $resql=$db->query($sql);
4887  if ($resql)
4888  {
4889  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
4890  if ($local == 1)
4891  {
4892  return array($obj->localtax1_type, get_localtax($vatrate, $local, $buyer, $seller), $obj->accountancy_code_sell, $obj->accountancy_code_buy);
4893  }
4894  elseif ($local == 2)
4895  {
4896  return array($obj->localtax2_type, get_localtax($vatrate, $local, $buyer, $seller),$obj->accountancy_code_sell, $obj->accountancy_code_buy);
4897  }
4898  else
4899  {
4900  return array($obj->localtax1_type, get_localtax($vatrate, 1, $buyer, $seller), $obj->localtax2_type, get_localtax($vatrate, 2, $buyer, $seller), $obj->accountancy_code_sell,$obj->accountancy_code_buy);
4901  }
4902  }
4903 
4904  return 0;
4905 }
4906 
4917 function get_product_vat_for_country($idprod, $thirdparty_seller, $idprodfournprice = 0)
4918 {
4919  global $db,$conf,$mysoc;
4920 
4921  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT . '/product/class/product.class.php';
4922 
4923  $ret=0;
4924  $found=0;
4925 
4926  if ($idprod > 0)
4927  {
4928  // Load product
4929  $product=new Product($db);
4930  $result=$product->fetch($idprod);
4931 
4932  if ($mysoc->country_code == $thirdparty_seller->country_code) // If selling country is ours
4933  {
4934  if ($idprodfournprice > 0) // We want vat for product for a "supplier" object
4935  {
4936  $product->get_buyprice($idprodfournprice, 0, 0, 0);
4937  $ret=$product->vatrate_supplier;
4938  if ($product->default_vat_code) $ret.=' ('.$product->default_vat_code.')';
4939  }
4940  else
4941  {
4942  $ret=$product->tva_tx; // Default vat of product we defined
4943  if ($product->default_vat_code) $ret.=' ('.$product->default_vat_code.')';
4944  }
4945  $found=1;
4946  }
4947  else
4948  {
4949  // TODO Read default product vat according to countrycode and product. Vat for couple countrycode/product is a feature not implemeted yet.
4950  // May be usefull/required if hidden option SERVICE_ARE_ECOMMERCE_200238EC is on
4951  }
4952  }
4953 
4954  if (! $found)
4955  {
4956  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_VAT_DEFAULT_IF_AUTODETECT_FAILS))
4957  {
4958  // If vat of product for the country not found or not defined, we return the first higher vat of country.
4959  $sql = "SELECT t.taux as vat_rate, t.code as default_vat_code";
4960  $sql.= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as t, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c";
4961  $sql.= " WHERE t.active=1 AND t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code='".$thirdparty_seller->country_code."'";
4962  $sql.= " ORDER BY t.taux DESC, t.code ASC, t.recuperableonly ASC";
4963  $sql.= $db->plimit(1);
4964 
4965  $resql=$db->query($sql);
4966  if ($resql)
4967  {
4968  $obj=$db->fetch_object($resql);
4969  if ($obj)
4970  {
4971  $ret=$obj->vat_rate;
4972  if ($obj->default_vat_code) $ret.=' ('.$obj->default_vat_code.')';
4973  }
4974  $db->free($sql);
4975  }
4976  else dol_print_error($db);
4977  }
4978  else $ret=$conf->global->MAIN_VAT_DEFAULT_IF_AUTODETECT_FAILS; // Forced value if autodetect fails
4979  }
4980 
4981  dol_syslog("get_product_vat_for_country: ret=".$ret);
4982  return $ret;
4983 }
4984 
4994 function get_product_localtax_for_country($idprod, $local, $thirdparty_seller)
4995 {
4996  global $db,$mysoc;
4997 
4998  if (! class_exists('Product')) {
4999  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT . '/product/class/product.class.php';
5000  }
5001 
5002  $ret=0;
5003  $found=0;
5004 
5005  if ($idprod > 0)
5006  {
5007  // Load product
5008  $product=new Product($db);
5009  $result=$product->fetch($idprod);
5010 
5011  if ($mysoc->country_code == $thirdparty_seller->country_code) // If selling country is ours
5012  {
5013  /* Not defined yet, so we don't use this
5014  if ($local==1) $ret=$product->localtax1_tx;
5015  elseif ($local==2) $ret=$product->localtax2_tx;
5016  $found=1;
5017  */
5018  }
5019  else
5020  {
5021  // TODO Read default product vat according to countrycode and product
5022  }
5023  }
5024 
5025  if (! $found)
5026  {
5027  // If vat of product for the country not found or not defined, we return higher vat of country.
5028  $sql = "SELECT taux as vat_rate, localtax1, localtax2";
5029  $sql.= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as t, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c";
5030  $sql.= " WHERE t.active=1 AND t.fk_pays = c.rowid AND c.code='".$thirdparty_seller->country_code."'";
5031  $sql.= " ORDER BY t.taux DESC, t.recuperableonly ASC";
5032  $sql.= $db->plimit(1);
5033 
5034  $resql=$db->query($sql);
5035  if ($resql)
5036  {
5037  $obj=$db->fetch_object($resql);
5038  if ($obj)
5039  {
5040  if ($local==1) $ret=$obj->localtax1;
5041  elseif ($local==2) $ret=$obj->localtax2;
5042  }
5043  }
5044  else dol_print_error($db);
5045  }
5046 
5047  dol_syslog("get_product_localtax_for_country: ret=".$ret);
5048  return $ret;
5049 }
5050 
5067 function get_default_tva(Societe $thirdparty_seller, Societe $thirdparty_buyer, $idprod = 0, $idprodfournprice = 0)
5068 {
5069  global $conf;
5070 
5071  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/company.lib.php';
5072 
5073  // Note: possible values for tva_assuj are 0/1 or franchise/reel
5074  $seller_use_vat=((is_numeric($thirdparty_seller->tva_assuj) && ! $thirdparty_seller->tva_assuj) || (! is_numeric($thirdparty_seller->tva_assuj) && $thirdparty_seller->tva_assuj=='franchise'))?0:1;
5075 
5076  $seller_country_code = $thirdparty_seller->country_code;
5077  $seller_in_cee = isInEEC($thirdparty_seller);
5078 
5079  $buyer_country_code = $thirdparty_buyer->country_code;
5080  $buyer_in_cee = isInEEC($thirdparty_buyer);
5081 
5082  dol_syslog("get_default_tva: seller use vat=".$seller_use_vat.", seller country=".$seller_country_code.", seller in cee=".$seller_in_cee.", buyer vat number=".$thirdparty_buyer->tva_intra." buyer country=".$buyer_country_code.", buyer in cee=".$buyer_in_cee.", idprod=".$idprod.", idprodfournprice=".$idprodfournprice.", SERVICE_ARE_ECOMMERCE_200238EC=".(! empty($conf->global->SERVICES_ARE_ECOMMERCE_200238EC)?$conf->global->SERVICES_ARE_ECOMMERCE_200238EC:''));
5083 
5084  // If services are eServices according to EU Council Directive 2002/38/EC (http://ec.europa.eu/taxation_customs/taxation/vat/traders/e-commerce/article_1610_en.htm)
5085  // we use the buyer VAT.
5086  if (! empty($conf->global->SERVICE_ARE_ECOMMERCE_200238EC))
5087  {
5088  if ($seller_in_cee && $buyer_in_cee && ! $thirdparty_buyer->isACompany())
5089  {
5090  //print 'VATRULE 0';
5091  return get_product_vat_for_country($idprod, $thirdparty_buyer, $idprodfournprice);
5092  }
5093  }
5094 
5095  // If seller does not use VAT
5096  if (! $seller_use_vat)
5097  {
5098  //print 'VATRULE 1';
5099  return 0;
5100  }
5101 
5102  // Le test ci-dessus ne devrait pas etre necessaire. Me signaler l'exemple du cas juridique concerne si le test suivant n'est pas suffisant.
5103 
5104  // Si le (pays vendeur = pays acheteur) alors la TVA par defaut=TVA du produit vendu. Fin de regle.
5105  if (($seller_country_code == $buyer_country_code)
5106  || (in_array($seller_country_code, array('FR,MC')) && in_array($buyer_country_code, array('FR','MC')))) // Warning ->country_code not always defined
5107  {
5108  //print 'VATRULE 2';
5109  return get_product_vat_for_country($idprod, $thirdparty_seller, $idprodfournprice);
5110  }
5111 
5112  // Si (vendeur et acheteur dans Communaute europeenne) et (bien vendu = moyen de transports neuf comme auto, bateau, avion) alors TVA par defaut=0 (La TVA doit etre paye par l'acheteur au centre d'impots de son pays et non au vendeur). Fin de regle.
5113  // Not supported
5114 
5115  // Si (vendeur et acheteur dans Communaute europeenne) et (acheteur = entreprise) alors TVA par defaut=0. Fin de regle
5116  // Si (vendeur et acheteur dans Communaute europeenne) et (acheteur = particulier) alors TVA par defaut=TVA du produit vendu. Fin de regle
5117  if (($seller_in_cee && $buyer_in_cee))
5118  {
5119  $isacompany=$thirdparty_buyer->isACompany();
5120  if ($isacompany)
5121  {
5122  //print 'VATRULE 3';
5123  return 0;
5124  }
5125  else
5126  {
5127  //print 'VATRULE 4';
5128  return get_product_vat_for_country($idprod, $thirdparty_seller, $idprodfournprice);
5129  }
5130  }
5131 
5132  // Si (vendeur en France et acheteur hors Communaute europeenne et acheteur particulier) alors TVA par defaut=TVA du produit vendu. Fin de regle
5133  if (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_VAT_OF_PRODUCT_FOR_INDIVIDUAL_CUSTOMER_OUT_OF_EEC) && empty($buyer_in_cee) && !$thirdparty_buyer->isACompany()) {
