5134  return get_product_vat_for_country($idprod, $thirdparty_seller, $idprodfournprice);
5135  }
5136 
5137  // Sinon la TVA proposee par defaut=0. Fin de regle.
5138  // Rem: Cela signifie qu'au moins un des 2 est hors Communaute europeenne et que le pays differe
5139  //print 'VATRULE 5';
5140  return 0;
5141 }
5142 
5143 
5154 function get_default_npr(Societe $thirdparty_seller, Societe $thirdparty_buyer, $idprod = 0, $idprodfournprice = 0)
5155 {
5156  global $db;
5157 
5158  if ($idprodfournprice > 0)
5159  {
5160  if (! class_exists('ProductFournisseur'))
5161  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT . '/fourn/class/fournisseur.product.class.php';
5162  $prodprice = new ProductFournisseur($db);
5163  $prodprice->fetch_product_fournisseur_price($idprodfournprice);
5164  return $prodprice->fourn_tva_npr;
5165  }
5166  elseif ($idprod > 0)
5167  {
5168  if (! class_exists('Product'))
5169  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT . '/product/class/product.class.php';
5170  $prod = new Product($db);
5171  $prod->fetch($idprod);
5172  return $prod->tva_npr;
5173  }
5174 
5175  return 0;
5176 }
5177 
5191 function get_default_localtax($thirdparty_seller, $thirdparty_buyer, $local, $idprod = 0)
5192 {
5193  global $mysoc;
5194 
5195  if (!is_object($thirdparty_seller)) return -1;
5196  if (!is_object($thirdparty_buyer)) return -1;
5197 
5198  if ($local==1) // Localtax 1
5199  {
5200  if ($mysoc->country_code == 'ES')
5201  {
5202  if (is_numeric($thirdparty_buyer->localtax1_assuj) && ! $thirdparty_buyer->localtax1_assuj) return 0;
5203  }
5204  else
5205  {
5206  // Si vendeur non assujeti a Localtax1, localtax1 par default=0
5207  if (is_numeric($thirdparty_seller->localtax1_assuj) && ! $thirdparty_seller->localtax1_assuj) return 0;
5208  if (! is_numeric($thirdparty_seller->localtax1_assuj) && $thirdparty_seller->localtax1_assuj=='localtax1off') return 0;
5209  }
5210  }
5211  elseif ($local==2) //I Localtax 2
5212  {
5213  // Si vendeur non assujeti a Localtax2, localtax2 par default=0
5214  if (is_numeric($thirdparty_seller->localtax2_assuj) && ! $thirdparty_seller->localtax2_assuj) return 0;
5215  if (! is_numeric($thirdparty_seller->localtax2_assuj) && $thirdparty_seller->localtax2_assuj=='localtax2off') return 0;
5216  }
5217 
5218  if ($thirdparty_seller->country_code == $thirdparty_buyer->country_code)
5219  {
5220  return get_product_localtax_for_country($idprod, $local, $thirdparty_seller);
5221  }
5222 
5223  return 0;
5224 }
5225 
5234 function yn($yesno, $case = 1, $color = 0)
5235 {
5236  global $langs;
5237  $result='unknown'; $classname='';
5238  if ($yesno == 1 || strtolower($yesno) == 'yes' || strtolower($yesno) == 'true') // A mettre avant test sur no a cause du == 0
5239  {
5240  $result=$langs->trans('yes');
5241  if ($case == 1 || $case == 3) $result=$langs->trans("Yes");
5242  if ($case == 2) $result='<input type="checkbox" value="1" checked disabled>';
5243  if ($case == 3) $result='<input type="checkbox" value="1" checked disabled> '.$result;
5244 
5245  $classname='ok';
5246  }
5247  elseif ($yesno == 0 || strtolower($yesno) == 'no' || strtolower($yesno) == 'false')
5248  {
5249  $result=$langs->trans("no");
5250  if ($case == 1 || $case == 3) $result=$langs->trans("No");
5251  if ($case == 2) $result='<input type="checkbox" value="0" disabled>';
5252  if ($case == 3) $result='<input type="checkbox" value="0" disabled> '.$result;
5253 
5254  if ($color == 2) $classname='ok';
5255  else $classname='error';
5256  }
5257  if ($color) return '<font class="'.$classname.'">'.$result.'</font>';
5258  return $result;
5259 }
5260 
5276 function get_exdir($num, $level, $alpha, $withoutslash, $object, $modulepart)
5277 {
5278  global $conf;
5279 
5280  $path = '';
5281 
5282  $arrayforoldpath=array('cheque','user','category','holiday','supplier_invoice','invoice_supplier','mailing','supplier_payment');
5283  if (! empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_OLD_PATH_FOR_PHOTO)) $arrayforoldpath[]='product';
5284  if (! empty($level) && in_array($modulepart, $arrayforoldpath))
5285  {
5286  // This part should be removed once all code is using "get_exdir" to forge path, with all parameters provided.
5287  if (empty($alpha)) $num = preg_replace('/([^0-9])/i', '', $num);
5288  else $num = preg_replace('/^.*\-/i', '', $num);
5289  $num = substr("000".$num, -$level);
5290  if ($level == 1) $path = substr($num, 0, 1);
5291  if ($level == 2) $path = substr($num, 1, 1).'/'.substr($num, 0, 1);
5292  if ($level == 3) $path = substr($num, 2, 1).'/'.substr($num, 1, 1).'/'.substr($num, 0, 1);
5293  }
5294  else
5295  {
5296  // TODO
5297  // We will enhance here a common way of forging path for document storage
5298  // Here, object->id, object->ref and modulepart are required.
5299  //var_dump($modulepart);
5300  if (in_array($modulepart, array('thirdparty','contact','member','propal','proposal','commande','order','facture','invoice',
5301  'supplier_order','supplier_proposal','shipment','contract','expensereport','ficheinter')))
5302  {
5303  $path=($object->ref?$object->ref:$object->id);
5304  }
5305  }
5306 
5307  if (empty($withoutslash) && ! empty($path)) $path.='/';
5308 
5309  return $path;
5310 }
5311 
5320 function dol_mkdir($dir, $dataroot = '', $newmask = null)
5321 {
5322  global $conf;
5323 
5324  dol_syslog("functions.lib::dol_mkdir: dir=".$dir, LOG_INFO);
5325 
5326  $dir_osencoded=dol_osencode($dir);
5327  if (@is_dir($dir_osencoded)) return 0;
5328 
5329  $nberr=0;
5330  $nbcreated=0;
5331 
5332  $ccdir='';
5333  if (! empty($dataroot)) {
5334  // Remove data root from loop
5335  $dir = str_replace($dataroot.'/', '', $dir);
5336  $ccdir = $dataroot.'/';
5337  }
5338 
5339  $cdir = explode("/", $dir);
5340  $num=count($cdir);
5341  for ($i = 0; $i < $num; $i++)
5342  {
5343  if ($i > 0) $ccdir .= '/'.$cdir[$i];
5344  else $ccdir .= $cdir[$i];
5345  if (preg_match("/^.:$/", $ccdir, $regs)) continue; // Si chemin Windows incomplet, on poursuit par rep suivant
5346 
5347  // Attention, le is_dir() peut echouer bien que le rep existe.
5348  // (ex selon config de open_basedir)
5349  if ($ccdir)
5350  {
5351  $ccdir_osencoded=dol_osencode($ccdir);
5352  if (! @is_dir($ccdir_osencoded))
5353  {
5354  dol_syslog("functions.lib::dol_mkdir: Directory '".$ccdir."' does not exists or is outside open_basedir PHP setting.", LOG_DEBUG);
5355 
5356  umask(0);
5357  $dirmaskdec=octdec($newmask);
5358  if (empty($newmask)) {
5359  $dirmaskdec = empty($conf->global->MAIN_UMASK) ? octdec('0755') : octdec($conf->global->MAIN_UMASK);
5360  }
5361  $dirmaskdec |= octdec('0111'); // Set x bit required for directories
5362  if (! @mkdir($ccdir_osencoded, $dirmaskdec))
5363  {
5364  // Si le is_dir a renvoye une fausse info, alors on passe ici.
5365  dol_syslog("functions.lib::dol_mkdir: Fails to create directory '".$ccdir."' or directory already exists.", LOG_WARNING);
5366  $nberr++;
5367  }
5368  else
5369  {
5370  dol_syslog("functions.lib::dol_mkdir: Directory '".$ccdir."' created", LOG_DEBUG);
5371  $nberr=0; // On remet a zero car si on arrive ici, cela veut dire que les echecs precedents peuvent etre ignore
5372  $nbcreated++;
5373  }
5374  }
5375  else
5376  {
5377  $nberr=0; // On remet a zero car si on arrive ici, cela veut dire que les echecs precedents peuvent etre ignores
5378  }
5379  }
5380  }
5381  return ($nberr ? -$nberr : $nbcreated);
5382 }
5383 
5384 
5390 function picto_required()
5391 {
5392  return '<span class="fieldrequired">*</span>';
5393 }
5394 
5395 
5411 function dol_string_nohtmltag($stringtoclean, $removelinefeed = 1, $pagecodeto = 'UTF-8', $strip_tags = 0)
5412 {
5413  if ($removelinefeed == 2) $stringtoclean = preg_replace('/<br[^>]*>\n+/ims', '<br>', $stringtoclean);
5414  $temp = preg_replace('/<br[^>]*>/i', "\n", $stringtoclean);
5415 
5416  if ($strip_tags) {
5417  $temp = strip_tags($temp);
5418  } else {
5419  $pattern = "/<[^<>]+>/";
5420  // Exemple of $temp: <a href="/myurl" title="<u>A title</u>">0000-021</a>
5421  $temp = preg_replace($pattern, "", $temp); // pass 1
5422  // $temp after pass 1: <a href="/myurl" title="A title">0000-021
5423  $temp = preg_replace($pattern, "", $temp); // pass 2
5424  // $temp after pass 2: 0000-021
5425  }
5426 
5427  $temp = dol_html_entity_decode($temp, ENT_COMPAT, $pagecodeto);
5428 
5429  // Supprime aussi les retours
5430  if ($removelinefeed == 1) $temp=str_replace(array("\r\n","\r","\n"), " ", $temp);
5431 
5432  // et les espaces doubles
5433  while (strpos($temp, " "))
5434  {
5435  $temp = str_replace(" ", " ", $temp);
5436  }
5437 
5438  return trim($temp);
5439 }
5440 
5449 function dol_string_onlythesehtmltags($stringtoclean)
5450 {
5451  $allowed_tags = array(
5452  "html", "head", "meta", "body", "article", "a", "b", "br", "div", "em", "font", "img", "ins", "hr", "i", "li", "link",
5453  "ol", "p", "s", "section", "span", "strong", "title",
5454  "table", "tr", "th", "td", "u", "ul"
5455  );
5456 
5457  $allowed_tags_string = join("><", $allowed_tags);
5458  $allowed_tags_string = preg_replace('/^>/', '', $allowed_tags_string);
5459  $allowed_tags_string = preg_replace('/<$/', '', $allowed_tags_string);
5460 
5461  $temp = strip_tags($stringtoclean, $allowed_tags_string);
5462 
5463  return $temp;
5464 }
5465 
5475 function dol_string_neverthesehtmltags($stringtoclean, $disallowed_tags = array('textarea'))
5476 {
5477  $temp = $stringtoclean;
5478  foreach($disallowed_tags as $tagtoremove)
5479  {
5480  $temp = preg_replace('/<\/?'.$tagtoremove.'>/', '', $temp);
5481  $temp = preg_replace('/<\/?'.$tagtoremove.'\s+[^>]*>/', '', $temp);
5482  }
5483  return $temp;
5484 }
5485 
5486 
5496 function dolGetFirstLineOfText($text, $nboflines = 1, $charset = 'UTF-8')
5497 {
5498  if ($nboflines == 1)
5499  {
5500  if (dol_textishtml($text))
5501  {
5502  $firstline=preg_replace('/<br[^>]*>.*$/s', '', $text); // The s pattern modifier means the . can match newline characters
5503  $firstline=preg_replace('/<div[^>]*>.*$/s', '', $firstline); // The s pattern modifier means the . can match newline characters
5504  }
5505  else
5506  {
5507  $firstline=preg_replace('/[\n\r].*/', '', $text);
5508  }
5509  return $firstline.((strlen($firstline) != strlen($text))?'...':'');
5510  }
5511  else
5512  {
5513  $ishtml=0;
5514  if (dol_textishtml($text))
5515  {
5516  $text=preg_replace('/\n/', '', $text);
5517  $ishtml=1;
5518  $repTable = array("\t" => " ", "\n" => " ", "\r" => " ", "\0" => " ", "\x0B" => " ");
5519  }
5520  else
5521  {
5522  $repTable = array("\t" => " ", "\n" => "<br>", "\r" => " ", "\0" => " ", "\x0B" => " ");
5523  }
5524 
5525  $text = strtr($text, $repTable);
5526  if ($charset == 'UTF-8') { $pattern = '/(<br[^>]*>)/Uu'; } // /U is to have UNGREEDY regex to limit to one html tag. /u is for UTF8 support
5527  else $pattern = '/(<br[^>]*>)/U'; // /U is to have UNGREEDY regex to limit to one html tag.
5528  $a = preg_split($pattern, $text, -1, PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE | PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY);
5529 
5530  $firstline='';
5531  $i=0;
5532  $nba = count($a); // 2x nb of lines in $a because $a contains also a line for each new line separator
5533  while (($i < $nba) && ($i < ($nboflines * 2)))
5534  {
5535  if ($i % 2 == 0) $firstline .= $a[$i];
5536  elseif (($i < (($nboflines * 2) - 1)) && ($i < ($nba - 1))) $firstline .= ($ishtml?"<br>\n":"\n");
5537  $i++;
5538  }
5539  unset($a);
5540  return $firstline.(($i < $nba)?'...':'');
5541  }
5542 }
5543 
5544 
5554 function dol_nl2br($stringtoencode, $nl2brmode = 0, $forxml = false)
5555 {
5556  if (!$nl2brmode) {
5557  return nl2br($stringtoencode, $forxml);
5558  } else {
5559  $ret=preg_replace('/(\r\n|\r|\n)/i', ($forxml?'<br />':'<br>'), $stringtoencode);
5560  return $ret;
5561  }
5562 }
5563 
5564 
5582 function dol_htmlentitiesbr($stringtoencode, $nl2brmode = 0, $pagecodefrom = 'UTF-8', $removelasteolbr = 1)
5583 {
5584  $newstring=$stringtoencode;
5585  if (dol_textishtml($stringtoencode)) // Check if text is already HTML or not
5586  {
5587  $newstring=preg_replace('/<br(\s[\sa-zA-Z_="]*)?\/?>/i', '<br>', $newstring); // Replace "<br type="_moz" />" by "<br>". It's same and avoid pb with FPDF.
5588  if ($removelasteolbr) $newstring=preg_replace('/<br>$/i', '', $newstring); // Remove last <br> (remove only last one)
5589  $newstring=strtr($newstring, array('&'=>'__and__','<'=>'__lt__','>'=>'__gt__','"'=>'__dquot__'));
5590  $newstring=dol_htmlentities($newstring, ENT_COMPAT, $pagecodefrom); // Make entity encoding
5591  $newstring=strtr($newstring, array('__and__'=>'&','__lt__'=>'<','__gt__'=>'>','__dquot__'=>'"'));
5592  }
5593  else
5594  {
5595  if ($removelasteolbr) $newstring=preg_replace('/(\r\n|\r|\n)$/i', '', $newstring); // Remove last \n (may remove several)
5596  $newstring=dol_nl2br(dol_htmlentities($newstring, ENT_COMPAT, $pagecodefrom), $nl2brmode);
5597  }
5598  // Other substitutions that htmlentities does not do
5599  //$newstring=str_replace(chr(128),'&euro;',$newstring); // 128 = 0x80. Not in html entity table. // Seems useles with TCPDF. Make bug with UTF8 languages
5600  return $newstring;
5601 }
5602 
5610 function dol_htmlentitiesbr_decode($stringtodecode, $pagecodeto = 'UTF-8')
5611 {
5612  $ret=dol_html_entity_decode($stringtodecode, ENT_COMPAT, $pagecodeto);
5613  $ret=preg_replace('/'."\r\n".'<br(\s[\sa-zA-Z_="]*)?\/?>/i', "<br>", $ret);
5614  $ret=preg_replace('/<br(\s[\sa-zA-Z_="]*)?\/?>'."\r\n".'/i', "\r\n", $ret);
5615  $ret=preg_replace('/<br(\s[\sa-zA-Z_="]*)?\/?>'."\n".'/i', "\n", $ret);
5616  $ret=preg_replace('/<br(\s[\sa-zA-Z_="]*)?\/?>/i', "\n", $ret);
5617  return $ret;
5618 }
5619 
5626 function dol_htmlcleanlastbr($stringtodecode)
5627 {
5628  $ret=preg_replace('/(<br>|<br(\s[\sa-zA-Z_="]*)?\/?>|'."\n".'|'."\r".')+$/i', "", $stringtodecode);
5629  return $ret;
5630 }
5631 
5640 function dol_html_entity_decode($a, $b, $c = 'UTF-8')
5641 {
5642  return html_entity_decode($a, $b, $c);
5643 }
5644 
5655 function dol_htmlentities($string, $flags = null, $encoding = 'UTF-8', $double_encode = false)
5656 {
5657  return htmlentities($string, $flags, $encoding, $double_encode);
5658 }
5659 
5668 function dol_string_is_good_iso($s)
5669 {
5670  $len=dol_strlen($s);
5671  $ok=1;
5672  for($scursor=0;$scursor<$len;$scursor++)
5673  {
5674  $ordchar=ord($s[$scursor]);
5675  //print $scursor.'-'.$ordchar.'<br>';
5676  if ($ordchar < 32 && $ordchar != 13 && $ordchar != 10) { $ok=0; break; }
5677  if ($ordchar > 126 && $ordchar < 160) { $ok=0; break; }
5678  }
5679  return $ok;
5680 }
5681 
5682 
5691 function dol_nboflines($s, $maxchar = 0)
5692 {
5693  if ($s == '') return 0;
5694  $arraystring=explode("\n", $s);
5695  $nb=count($arraystring);
5696 
5697  return $nb;
5698 }
5699 
5700 
5710 function dol_nboflines_bis($text, $maxlinesize = 0, $charset = 'UTF-8')
5711 {
5712  $repTable = array("\t" => " ", "\n" => "<br>", "\r" => " ", "\0" => " ", "\x0B" => " ");
5713  if (dol_textishtml($text)) $repTable = array("\t" => " ", "\n" => " ", "\r" => " ", "\0" => " ", "\x0B" => " ");
5714 
5715  $text = strtr($text, $repTable);
5716  if ($charset == 'UTF-8') { $pattern = '/(<br[^>]*>)/Uu'; } // /U is to have UNGREEDY regex to limit to one html tag. /u is for UTF8 support
5717  else $pattern = '/(<br[^>]*>)/U'; // /U is to have UNGREEDY regex to limit to one html tag.
5718  $a = preg_split($pattern, $text, -1, PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE | PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY);
5719 
5720  $nblines = (int) floor((count($a)+1)/2);
5721  // count possible auto line breaks
5722  if($maxlinesize)
5723  {
5724  foreach ($a as $line)
5725  {
5726  if (dol_strlen($line)>$maxlinesize)
5727  {
5728  //$line_dec = html_entity_decode(strip_tags($line));
5729  $line_dec = html_entity_decode($line);
5730  if(dol_strlen($line_dec)>$maxlinesize)
5731  {
5732  $line_dec=wordwrap($line_dec, $maxlinesize, '\n', true);
5733  $nblines+=substr_count($line_dec, '\n');
5734  }
5735  }
5736  }
5737  }
5738 
5739  unset($a);
5740  return $nblines;
5741 }
5742 
5750 function dol_microtime_float()
5751 {
5752  dol_syslog(__FUNCTION__ . " is deprecated", LOG_WARNING);
5753 
5754  return microtime(true);
5755 }
5756 
5765 function dol_textishtml($msg, $option = 0)
5766 {
5767  if ($option == 1)
5768  {
5769  if (preg_match('/<html/i', $msg)) return true;
5770  elseif (preg_match('/<body/i', $msg)) return true;
5771  elseif (preg_match('/<br/i', $msg)) return true;
5772  return false;
5773  }
5774  else
5775  {
5776  if (preg_match('/<html/i', $msg)) return true;
5777  elseif (preg_match('/<body/i', $msg)) return true;
5778  elseif (preg_match('/<(b|em|i|u)>/i', $msg)) return true;
5779  elseif (preg_match('/<br\/>/i', $msg)) return true;
5780  elseif (preg_match('/<(br|div|font|li|p|span|strong|table)>/i', $msg)) return true;
5781  elseif (preg_match('/<(br|div|font|li|p|span|strong|table)\s+[^<>\/]*>/i', $msg)) return true;
5782  elseif (preg_match('/<(br|div|font|li|p|span|strong|table)\s+[^<>\/]*\/>/i', $msg)) return true;
5783  elseif (preg_match('/<img\s+[^<>]*src[^<>]*>/i', $msg)) return true; // must accept <img src="http://example.com/aaa.png" />
5784  elseif (preg_match('/<a\s+[^<>]*href[^<>]*>/i', $msg)) return true; // must accept <a href="http://example.com/aaa.png" />
5785  elseif (preg_match('/<h[0-9]>/i', $msg)) return true;
5786  elseif (preg_match('/&[A-Z0-9]{1,6};/i', $msg)) return true; // Html entities names (http://www.w3schools.com/tags/ref_entities.asp)
5787  elseif (preg_match('/&#[0-9]{2,3};/i', $msg)) return true; // Html entities numbers (http://www.w3schools.com/tags/ref_entities.asp)
5788 
5789  return false;
5790  }
5791 }
5792 
5807 function dol_concatdesc($text1, $text2, $forxml = false, $invert = false)
5808 {
5809  if (!empty($invert))
5810  {
5811  $tmp = $text1;
5812  $text1 = $text2;
5813  $text2 = $tmp;
5814  }
5815 
5816  $ret='';
5817  $ret.= (! dol_textishtml($text1) && dol_textishtml($text2))?dol_nl2br($text1, 0, $forxml):$text1;
5818  $ret.= (! empty($text1) && ! empty($text2)) ? ((dol_textishtml($text1) || dol_textishtml($text2))?($forxml?"<br >\n":"<br>\n") : "\n") : "";
5819  $ret.= (dol_textishtml($text1) && ! dol_textishtml($text2))?dol_nl2br($text2, 0, $forxml):$text2;
5820  return $ret;
5821 }
5822 
5823 
5824 
5835 function getCommonSubstitutionArray($outputlangs, $onlykey = 0, $exclude = null, $object = null)
5836 {
5837  global $db, $conf, $mysoc, $user, $extrafields;
5838 
5839  $substitutionarray=array();
5840 
5841  if (empty($exclude) || ! in_array('user', $exclude))
5842  {
5843  // Add SIGNATURE into substitutionarray first, so, when we will make the substitution,
5844  // this will include signature content first and then replace var found into content of signature
5845  $signature = $user->signature;
5846 $substitutionarray=array_merge($substitutionarray, array(
5847  '__USER_SIGNATURE__' => (string) (($signature && empty($conf->global->MAIN_MAIL_DO_NOT_USE_SIGN)) ? ($onlykey == 2 ? dol_trunc(dol_string_nohtmltag($signature), 30) : $signature) : '')
5848  )
5849  );
5850  // For backward compatibility
5851  if ($onlykey != 2)
5852  {
5853  $substitutionarray['__SIGNATURE__'] = (string) (($signature && empty($conf->global->MAIN_MAIL_DO_NOT_USE_SIGN)) ? ($onlykey == 2 ? dol_trunc(dol_string_nohtmltag($signature), 30) : $signature) : '');
5854  }
5855 
5856 $substitutionarray=array_merge($substitutionarray, array(
5857  '__USER_ID__' => (string) $user->id,
5858  '__USER_LOGIN__' => (string) $user->login,
5859  '__USER_LASTNAME__' => (string) $user->lastname,
5860  '__USER_FIRSTNAME__' => (string) $user->firstname,
5861  '__USER_FULLNAME__' => (string) $user->getFullName($outputlangs),
5862  '__USER_SUPERVISOR_ID__' => (string) ($user->fk_user ? $user->fk_user : '0'),
5863  '__USER_REMOTE_IP__' => (string) getUserRemoteIP()
5864  )
5865  );
5866  }
5867  if ((empty($exclude) || ! in_array('mycompany', $exclude)) && is_object($mysoc))
5868  {
5869 $substitutionarray=array_merge($substitutionarray, array(
5870  '__MYCOMPANY_NAME__' => $mysoc->name,
5871  '__MYCOMPANY_EMAIL__' => $mysoc->email,
5872  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID1__' => $mysoc->idprof1,
5873  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID2__' => $mysoc->idprof2,
5874  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID3__' => $mysoc->idprof3,
5875  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID4__' => $mysoc->idprof4,
5876  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID5__' => $mysoc->idprof5,
5877  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID6__' => $mysoc->idprof6,
5878  '__MYCOMPANY_CAPITAL__' => $mysoc->capital,
5879  '__MYCOMPANY_FULLADDRESS__' => $mysoc->getFullAddress(1, ', '),
5880  '__MYCOMPANY_ADDRESS__' => $mysoc->address,
5881  '__MYCOMPANY_ZIP__' => $mysoc->zip,
5882  '__MYCOMPANY_TOWN__' => $mysoc->town,
5883  '__MYCOMPANY_COUNTRY__' => $mysoc->country,
5884  '__MYCOMPANY_COUNTRY_ID__' => $mysoc->country_id,
5885  '__MYCOMPANY_CURRENCY_CODE__' => $conf->currency
5886  ));
5887  }
5888 
5889  if (($onlykey || is_object($object)) && (empty($exclude) || ! in_array('object', $exclude)))
5890  {
5891  if ($onlykey)
5892  {
5893  $substitutionarray['__ID__'] = '__ID__';
5894  $substitutionarray['__REF__'] = '__REF__';
5895  $substitutionarray['__REF_CLIENT__'] = '__REF_CLIENT__';
5896  $substitutionarray['__REF_SUPPLIER__'] = '__REF_SUPPLIER__';
5897  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_XXX__'] = '__EXTRAFIELD_XXX__';
5898 
5899  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ID__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_ID__';
5900  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_NAME__';
5901  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME_ALIAS__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_NAME_ALIAS__';
5902  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_EMAIL__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_EMAIL__';
5903 
5904  if (! empty($conf->adherent->enabled))
5905  {
5906  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_ID__'] = '__MEMBER_ID__';
5907  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_CIVILITY__'] = '__MEMBER_CIVILITY__';
5908  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FIRSTNAME__'] = '__MEMBER_FIRSTNAME__';
5909  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LASTNAME__'] = '__MEMBER_LASTNAME__';
5910  }
5911  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_ID__'] = '__PROJECT_ID__';
5912  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_REF__'] = '__PROJECT_REF__';
5913  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_NAME__'] = '__PROJECT_NAME__';
5914 
5915  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_HIGHEST_PLANNED_START_DATE__'] = 'Highest date planned for a service start';
5916  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_HIGHEST_PLANNED_START_DATETIME__'] = 'Highest date and hour planned for service start';
5917  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_LOWEST_EXPIRATION_DATE__'] = 'Lowest data for planned expiration of service';
5918  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_LOWEST_EXPIRATION_DATETIME__'] = 'Lowest date and hour for planned expiration of service';
5919 
5920  $substitutionarray['__ONLINE_PAYMENT_URL__'] = 'UrlToPayOnlineIfApplicable';
5921  $substitutionarray['__ONLINE_PAYMENT_TEXT_AND_URL__'] = 'TextAndUrlToPayOnlineIfApplicable';
5922  $substitutionarray['__SECUREKEYPAYMENT__'] = 'Security key (if key is not unique per record)';
5923  $substitutionarray['__SECUREKEYPAYMENT_MEMBER__'] = 'Security key for payment on a member subscription (one key per member)';
5924  $substitutionarray['__SECUREKEYPAYMENT_ORDER__'] = 'Security key for payment on an order';
5925  $substitutionarray['__SECUREKEYPAYMENT_INVOICE__'] = 'Security key for payment on an invoice';
5926  $substitutionarray['__SECUREKEYPAYMENT_CONTRACTLINE__'] = 'Security key for payment on a a service';
5927 
5928  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_PROPOSAL__'] = 'Direct download url of a proposal';
5929  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_ORDER__'] = 'Direct download url of an order';
5930  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_INVOICE__'] = 'Direct download url of an invoice';
5931 
5932  if (! empty($conf->expedition->enabled))
5933  {
5934  $substitutionarray['__SHIPPINGTRACKNUM__']='Shipping tacking number';
5935  $substitutionarray['__SHIPPINGTRACKNUMURL__']='Shipping tracking url';
5936  }
5937  }
5938  else
5939  {
5940  $substitutionarray['__ID__'] = $object->id;
5941  $substitutionarray['__REF__'] = $object->ref;
5942  $substitutionarray['__REF_CLIENT__'] = (isset($object->ref_client) ? $object->ref_client : (isset($object->ref_customer) ? $object->ref_customer : null));
5943  $substitutionarray['__REF_SUPPLIER__'] = (isset($object->ref_supplier) ? $object->ref_supplier : null);
5944  $substitutionarray['__SUPPLIER_ORDER_DATE_DELIVERY__'] = (isset($object->date_livraison) ? dol_print_date($object->date_livraison, 'day', 0, $outputlangs): '');
5945  // For backward compatibility
5946  $substitutionarray['__REFCLIENT__'] = (isset($object->ref_client) ? $object->ref_client : (isset($object->ref_customer) ? $object->ref_customer : null));
5947  $substitutionarray['__REFSUPPLIER__'] = (isset($object->ref_supplier) ? $object->ref_supplier : null);
5948 
5949  // TODO Remove this
5950  $msgishtml = 0;
5951 
5952  $birthday = dol_print_date($object->birth, 'day');
5953 
5954  if ($object->id > 0)
5955  {
5956  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_ID__']=$object->id;
5957  if (method_exists($object, 'getCivilityLabel')) $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_CIVILITY__'] = $object->getCivilityLabel();
5958  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FIRSTNAME__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->firstname):$object->firstname;
5959  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LASTNAME__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->lastname):$object->lastname;
5960  if (method_exists($object, 'getFullName')) $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FULLNAME__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->getFullName($outputlangs)):$object->getFullName($outputlangs);
5961  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_COMPANY__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->societe):$object->societe;
5962  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_ADDRESS__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->address):$object->address;
5963  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_ZIP__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->zip):$object->zip;
5964  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_TOWN__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->town):$object->town;
5965  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_COUNTRY__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->country):$object->country;
5966  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_EMAIL__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->email):$object->email;
5967  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_BIRTH__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($birthday):$birthday;
5968  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_PHOTO__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->photo):$object->photo;
5969  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LOGIN__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->login):$object->login;
5970  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_PASSWORD__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->pass):$object->pass;
5971  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_PHONE__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->phone):$object->phone;
5972  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_PHONEPRO__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->phone_perso):$object->phone_perso;
5973  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_PHONEMOBILE__']=$msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->phone_mobile):$object->phone_mobile;
5974  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FIRST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE__'] = dol_print_date($object->first_subscription_date, 'dayrfc');
5975  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FIRST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE_START__'] = dol_print_date($object->first_subscription_date_start, 'dayrfc');
5976  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FIRST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE_END__'] = dol_print_date($object->first_subscription_date_end, 'dayrfc');
5977  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LAST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE__'] = dol_print_date($object->last_subscription_date, 'dayrfc');
5978  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LAST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE_START__'] = dol_print_date($object->last_subscription_date_start, 'dayrfc');
5979  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LAST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE_END__'] = dol_print_date($object->last_subscription_date_end, 'dayrfc');
5980  }
5981 
5982  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'societe')
5983  {
5984  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ID__'] = (is_object($object)?$object->id:'');
5985  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME__'] = (is_object($object)?$object->name:'');
5986  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME_ALIAS__'] = (is_object($object)?$object->name_alias:'');
5987  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_EMAIL__'] = (is_object($object)?$object->email:'');
5988  }
5989  elseif (is_object($object->thirdparty) && $object->thirdparty->id > 0)
5990  {
5991  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ID__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty)?$object->thirdparty->id:'');
5992  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty)?$object->thirdparty->name:'');
5993  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME_ALIAS__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty)?$object->thirdparty->name_alias:'');
5994  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_EMAIL__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty)?$object->thirdparty->email:'');
5995  }
5996 
5997  if (is_object($object->projet) && $object->projet->id > 0)
5998  {
5999  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_ID__'] = (is_object($object->projet)?$object->projet->id:'');
6000  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_REF__'] = (is_object($object->projet)?$object->projet->ref:'');
6001  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_NAME__'] = (is_object($object->projet)?$object->projet->title:'');
6002  }
6003 
6004  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'shipping')
6005  {
6006  $substitutionarray['__SHIPPINGTRACKNUM__']=$object->tracking_number;
6007  $substitutionarray['__SHIPPINGTRACKNUMURL__']=$object->tracking_url;
6008  }
6009 
6010  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'contrat' && is_array($object->lines))
6011  {
6012  if ($object->id > 0)
6013  {
6014  $dateplannedstart='';
6015  $datenextexpiration='';
6016  foreach($object->lines as $line)
6017  {
6018  if ($line->date_ouverture_prevue > $dateplannedstart) $dateplannedstart = $line->date_ouverture_prevue;
6019  if ($line->statut == 4 && $line->date_fin_prevue && (! $datenextexpiration || $line->date_fin_prevue < $datenextexpiration)) $datenextexpiration = $line->date_fin_prevue;
6020  }
6021  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_HIGHEST_PLANNED_START_DATE__'] = dol_print_date($dateplannedstart, 'dayrfc');
6022  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_HIGHEST_PLANNED_START_DATETIME__'] = dol_print_date($dateplannedstart, 'standard');
6023  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_LOWEST_EXPIRATION_DATE__'] = dol_print_date($datenextexpiration, 'dayrfc');
6024  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_LOWEST_EXPIRATION_DATETIME__'] = dol_print_date($datenextexpiration, 'standard');
6025  }
6026  }
6027 
6028  // Create dynamic tags for __EXTRAFIELD_FIELD__
6029  if ($object->table_element && $object->id > 0)
6030  {
6031  if (! is_object($extrafields)) $extrafields = new ExtraFields($db);
6032  $extrafields->fetch_name_optionals_label($object->table_element, true);
6033 
6034  if ($object->fetch_optionals() > 0)
6035  {
6036  if (is_array($extrafields->attributes[$object->table_element]['label']) && count($extrafields->attributes[$object->table_element]['label']) > 0)
6037  {
6038  foreach ($extrafields->attributes[$object->table_element]['label'] as $key => $label) {
6039  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_' . strtoupper($key) . '__'] = $object->array_options['options_' . $key];
6040  }
6041  }
6042  }
6043  }
6044 
6045  // Complete substitution array with the url to make online payment
6046  $paymenturl='';
6047  if (empty($substitutionarray['__REF__']))
6048  {
6049  $paymenturl='';
6050  }
6051  else
6052  {
6053  // Set the online payment url link into __ONLINE_PAYMENT_URL__ key
6054  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/payments.lib.php';
6055  $outputlangs->loadLangs(array('paypal','other'));
6056  $typeforonlinepayment='free';
6057  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'commande') $typeforonlinepayment='order';
6058  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'facture') $typeforonlinepayment='invoice';
6059  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'member') $typeforonlinepayment='member';
6060  $url=getOnlinePaymentUrl(0, $typeforonlinepayment, $substitutionarray['__REF__']);
6061  $paymenturl=$url;
6062  }
6063 
6064  if ($object->id > 0)
6065  {
6066  $substitutionarray['__ONLINE_PAYMENT_TEXT_AND_URL__']=($paymenturl?str_replace('\n', "\n", $outputlangs->trans("PredefinedMailContentLink", $paymenturl)):'');
6067  $substitutionarray['__ONLINE_PAYMENT_URL__']=$paymenturl;
6068 
6069  if (! empty($conf->global->PROPOSAL_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD) && is_object($object) && $object->element == 'propal')
6070  {
6071  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_PROPOSAL__'] = $object->getLastMainDocLink($object->element);
6072  }
6073  else $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_PROPOSAL__'] = '';
6074  if (! empty($conf->global->ORDER_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD) && is_object($object) && $object->element == 'commande')
6075  {
6076  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_ORDER__'] = $object->getLastMainDocLink($object->element);
6077  }
6078  else $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_ORDER__'] = '';
6079  if (! empty($conf->global->INVOICE_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD) && is_object($object) && $object->element == 'facture')
6080  {
6081  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_INVOICE__'] = $object->getLastMainDocLink($object->element);
6082  }
6083  else $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_INVOICE__'] = '';
6084  }
6085  }
6086  }
6087  if (empty($exclude) || ! in_array('objectamount', $exclude))
6088  {
6089  $substitutionarray['__DATE_YMD__'] = is_object($object)?(isset($object->date) ? dol_print_date($object->date, 'day', 0, $outputlangs) : null) : '';
6090  $substitutionarray['__DATE_DUE_YMD__'] = is_object($object)?(isset($object->date_lim_reglement) ? dol_print_date($object->date_lim_reglement, 'day', 0, $outputlangs) : null) : '';
6091 
6092  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT__'] = is_object($object)?$object->total_ttc:'';
6093  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_EXCL_TAX__'] = is_object($object)?$object->total_ht:'';
6094  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_VAT__'] = is_object($object)?($object->total_vat?$object->total_vat:$object->total_tva):'';
6095  if ($onlykey != 2 || $mysoc->useLocalTax(1)) $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_TAX2__'] = is_object($object)?$object->total_localtax1:'';
6096  if ($onlykey != 2 || $mysoc->useLocalTax(2)) $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_TAX3__'] = is_object($object)?$object->total_localtax2:'';
6097 
6098  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object)?($object->total_ttc ? price($object->total_ttc, 0, $outputlangs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency) : null):'';
6099  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_EXCL_TAX_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object)?($object->total_ht ? price($object->total_ht, 0, $outputlangs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency) : null):'';
6100  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_VAT_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object)?($object->total_vat ? price($object->total_vat, 0, $outputlangs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency): ($object->total_tva ? price($object->total_tva, 0, $outputlangs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency) : null)):'';
6101  if ($onlykey != 2 || $mysoc->useLocalTax(1)) $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_TAX2_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object)? ($object->total_localtax1 ? price($object->total_localtax1, 0, $outputlangs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency) : null):'';
6102  if ($onlykey != 2 || $mysoc->useLocalTax(2)) $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_TAX3_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object)? ($object->total_localtax2 ? price($object->total_localtax2, 0, $outputlangs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency) : null):'';
6103 
6104  // TODO Add keys for foreign multicurrency
6105 
6106  // For backward compatibility
6107  if ($onlykey != 2)
6108  {
6109  $substitutionarray['__TOTAL_TTC__'] = is_object($object)?$object->total_ttc:'';
6110  $substitutionarray['__TOTAL_HT__'] = is_object($object)?$object->total_ht:'';
6111  $substitutionarray['__TOTAL_VAT__'] = is_object($object)?($object->total_vat?$object->total_vat:$object->total_tva):'';
6112  }
6113  }
6114 
6115  //var_dump($substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_FORMATED__']);
6116  if (empty($exclude) || ! in_array('date', $exclude))
6117  {
6118  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/date.lib.php';
6119 
6120  $tmp=dol_getdate(dol_now(), true);
6121  $tmp2=dol_get_prev_day($tmp['mday'], $tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']);
6122  $tmp3=dol_get_prev_month($tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']);
6123  $tmp4=dol_get_next_day($tmp['mday'], $tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']);
6124  $tmp5=dol_get_next_month($tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']);
6125 
6126  $substitutionarray=array_merge($substitutionarray, array(
6127  '__DAY__' => (string) $tmp['mday'],
6128  '__DAY_TEXT__' => $outputlangs->trans('Day'.$tmp['wday']), // Monday
6129  '__DAY_TEXT_SHORT__' => $outputlangs->trans($tmp['weekday'].'Min'), // Mon
6130  '__DAY_TEXT_MIN__' => $outputlangs->trans('Short'.$tmp['weekday']), // M
6131  '__MONTH__' => (string) $tmp['mon'],
6132  '__MONTH_TEXT__' => $outputlangs->trans('Month'.sprintf("%02d", $tmp['mon'])),
6133  '__MONTH_TEXT_SHORT__' => $outputlangs->trans('MonthShort'.sprintf("%02d", $tmp['mon'])),
6134  '__MONTH_TEXT_MIN__' => $outputlangs->trans('MonthVeryShort'.sprintf("%02d", $tmp['mon'])),
6135  '__YEAR__' => (string) $tmp['year'],
6136  '__PREVIOUS_DAY__' => (string) $tmp2['day'],
6137  '__PREVIOUS_MONTH__' => (string) $tmp3['month'],
6138  '__PREVIOUS_YEAR__' => (string) ($tmp['year'] - 1),
6139  '__NEXT_DAY__' => (string) $tmp4['day'],
6140  '__NEXT_MONTH__' => (string) $tmp5['month'],
6141  '__NEXT_YEAR__' => (string) ($tmp['year'] + 1),
6142  ));
6143  }
6144 
6145  if (! empty($conf->multicompany->enabled))
6146  {
6147  $substitutionarray=array_merge($substitutionarray, array('__ENTITY_ID__' => $conf->entity));
6148  }
6149  if (empty($exclude) || ! in_array('system', $exclude))
6150  {
6151  $substitutionarray['__DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT__']=DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT;
6152  $substitutionarray['__(AnyTranslationKey)__']=$outputlangs->trans('TranslationOfKey');
6153  $substitutionarray['__(AnyTranslationKey|langfile)__']=$outputlangs->trans('TranslationOfKey').' (load also language file before)';
6154  $substitutionarray['__[AnyConstantKey]__']=$outputlangs->trans('ValueOfConstantKey');
6155  }
6156 
6157  return $substitutionarray;
6158 }
6159 
6174 function make_substitutions($text, $substitutionarray, $outputlangs = null)
6175 {
6176  global $conf, $langs;
6177 
6178  if (! is_array($substitutionarray)) return 'ErrorBadParameterSubstitutionArrayWhenCalling_make_substitutions';
6179 
6180  if (empty($outputlangs)) $outputlangs=$langs;
6181 
6182  // Make substitution for language keys: __(AnyTranslationKey)__ or __(AnyTranslationKey|langfile)__
6183  if (is_object($outputlangs))
6184  {
6185  while (preg_match('/__\(([^\)]+)\)__/', $text, $reg))
6186  {
6187  $msgishtml = 0;
6188  if (dol_textishtml($text, 1)) $msgishtml = 1;
6189 
6190  // If key is __(TranslationKey|langfile)__, then force load of langfile.lang
6191  $tmp=explode('|', $reg[1]);
6192  if (! empty($tmp[1])) $outputlangs->load($tmp[1]);
6193 
6194  $text = preg_replace('/__\('.preg_quote($reg[1], '/').'\)__/', $msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv($reg[1])):$outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv($reg[1]), $text);
6195  }
6196  }
6197 
6198  // Make substitution for constant keys.
6199  // Must be after the substitution of translation, so if the text of translation contains a string __[xxx]__, it is also converted.
6200  while (preg_match('/__\[([^\]]+)\]__/', $text, $reg))
6201  {
6202  $msgishtml = 0;
6203  if (dol_textishtml($text, 1)) $msgishtml = 1;
6204 
6205  $keyfound = $reg[1];
6206  if (preg_match('/(_pass|password|secret|_key|key$)/i', $keyfound)) $newval = '*****forbidden*****';
6207  else $newval=empty($conf->global->$keyfound)?'':$conf->global->$keyfound;
6208  $text = preg_replace('/__\['.preg_quote($keyfound, '/').'\]__/', $msgishtml?dol_htmlentitiesbr($newval):$newval, $text);
6209  }
6210 
6211  // Make substitition for array $substitutionarray
6212  foreach ($substitutionarray as $key => $value)
6213  {
6214  if (! isset($value)) continue; // If value is null, it same than not having substitution key at all into array, we do not replace.
6215 
6216  if ($key == '__SIGNATURE__' && (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_MAIL_DO_NOT_USE_SIGN))) $value=''; // Protection
6217  if ($key == '__USER_SIGNATURE__' && (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_MAIL_DO_NOT_USE_SIGN))) $value=''; // Protection
6218 
6219  $text=str_replace("$key", "$value", $text); // We must keep the " to work when value is 123.5 for example
6220  }
6221 
6222  return $text;
6223 }
6224 
6237 function complete_substitutions_array(&$substitutionarray, $outputlangs, $object = null, $parameters = null, $callfunc = "completesubstitutionarray")
6238 {
6239  global $conf,$user;
6240 
6241  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/files.lib.php';
6242 
6243  // Add a substitution key for each extrafields, using key __EXTRA_XXX__
6244  // TODO Remove this. Already available into the getCommonSubstitutionArray used to build the substitution array.
6245  /*if (is_object($object) && is_array($object->array_options))
6246  {
6247  foreach($object->array_options as $key => $val)
6248  {
6249  $keyshort=preg_replace('/^(options|extra)_/','',$key);
6250  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_'.$keyshort.'__']=$val;
6251  // For backward compatibiliy
6252  $substitutionarray['%EXTRA_'.$keyshort.'%']=$val;
6253  }
6254  }*/
6255 
6256  // Check if there is external substitution to do, requested by plugins
6257  $dirsubstitutions=array_merge(array(), (array) $conf->modules_parts['substitutions']);
6258 
6259  foreach($dirsubstitutions as $reldir)
6260  {
6261  $dir=dol_buildpath($reldir, 0);
6262 
6263  // Check if directory exists
6264  if (! dol_is_dir($dir)) continue;
6265 
6266  $substitfiles=dol_dir_list($dir, 'files', 0, 'functions_');
6267  foreach($substitfiles as $substitfile)
6268  {
6269  if (preg_match('/functions_(.*)\.lib\.php/i', $substitfile['name'], $reg))
6270  {
6271  $module=$reg[1];
6272 
6273  dol_syslog("Library ".$substitfile['name']." found into ".$dir);
6274  // Include the user's functions file
6275  require_once $dir.$substitfile['name'];
6276  // Call the user's function, and only if it is defined
6277  $function_name=$module."_".$callfunc;
6278  if (function_exists($function_name)) $function_name($substitutionarray, $outputlangs, $object, $parameters);
6279  }
6280  }
6281  }
6282 }
6283 
6293 function print_date_range($date_start, $date_end, $format = '', $outputlangs = '')
6294 {
6295  print get_date_range($date_start, $date_end, $format, $outputlangs);
6296 }
6297 
6308 function get_date_range($date_start, $date_end, $format = '', $outputlangs = '', $withparenthesis = 1)
6309 {
6310  global $langs;
6311 
6312  $out='';
6313 
6314  if (! is_object($outputlangs)) $outputlangs=$langs;
6315 
6316  if ($date_start && $date_end)
6317  {
6318  $out.= ($withparenthesis?' (':'').$outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv('DateFromTo', dol_print_date($date_start, $format, false, $outputlangs), dol_print_date($date_end, $format, false, $outputlangs)).($withparenthesis?')':'');
6319  }
6320  if ($date_start && ! $date_end)
6321  {
6322  $out.= ($withparenthesis?' (':'').$outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv('DateFrom', dol_print_date($date_start, $format, false, $outputlangs)).($withparenthesis?')':'');
6323  }
6324  if (! $date_start && $date_end)
6325  {
6326  $out.= ($withparenthesis?' (':'').$outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv('DateUntil', dol_print_date($date_end, $format, false, $outputlangs)).($withparenthesis?')':'');
6327  }
6328 
6329  return $out;
6330 }
6331 
6340 function dolGetFirstLastname($firstname, $lastname, $nameorder = -1)
6341 {
6342  global $conf;
6343 
6344  $ret='';
6345  // If order not defined, we use the setup
6346  if ($nameorder < 0) $nameorder=(empty($conf->global->MAIN_FIRSTNAME_NAME_POSITION)?1:0);
6347  if ($nameorder && $nameorder != 2 && $nameorder != 3)
6348  {
6349  $ret.=$firstname;
6350  if ($firstname && $lastname) $ret.=' ';
6351  $ret.=$lastname;
6352  }
6353  elseif ($nameorder == 2 || $nameorder == 3)
6354  {
6355  $ret.=$firstname;
6356  if (empty($ret) && $nameorder == 3)
6357  {
6358  $ret.=$lastname;
6359  }
6360  }
6361  else
6362  {
6363  $ret.=$lastname;
6364  if ($firstname && $lastname) $ret.=' ';
6365  $ret.=$firstname;
6366  }
6367  return $ret;
6368 }
6369 
6370 
6381 function setEventMessage($mesgs, $style = 'mesgs')
6382 {
6383  //dol_syslog(__FUNCTION__ . " is deprecated", LOG_WARNING); This is not deprecated, it is used by setEventMessages function
6384  if (! is_array($mesgs)) // If mesgs is a string
6385  {
6386  if ($mesgs) $_SESSION['dol_events'][$style][] = $mesgs;
6387  }
6388  else // If mesgs is an array
6389  {
6390  foreach($mesgs as $mesg)
6391  {
6392  if ($mesg) $_SESSION['dol_events'][$style][] = $mesg;
6393  }
6394  }
6395 }
6396 
6408 function setEventMessages($mesg, $mesgs, $style = 'mesgs', $messagekey = '')
6409 {
6410  if (empty($mesg) && empty($mesgs))
6411  {
6412  dol_syslog("Try to add a message in stack with empty message", LOG_WARNING);
6413  }
6414  else
6415  {
6416  if ($messagekey)
6417  {
6418  // Complete message with a js link to set a cookie "DOLHIDEMESSAGE".$messagekey;
6419  // TODO
6420  $mesg.='';
6421  }
6422  if (empty($messagekey) || empty($_COOKIE["DOLHIDEMESSAGE".$messagekey]))
6423  {
6424  if (! in_array((string) $style, array('mesgs','warnings','errors'))) dol_print_error('', 'Bad parameter style='.$style.' for setEventMessages');
6425  if (empty($mesgs)) setEventMessage($mesg, $style);
6426  else
6427  {
6428  if (! empty($mesg) && ! in_array($mesg, $mesgs)) setEventMessage($mesg, $style); // Add message string if not already into array
6429  setEventMessage($mesgs, $style);
6430  }
6431  }
6432  }
6433 }
6434 
6444 function dol_htmloutput_events($disabledoutputofmessages = 0)
6445 {
6446  // Show mesgs
6447  if (isset($_SESSION['dol_events']['mesgs'])) {
6448  if (empty($disabledoutputofmessages)) dol_htmloutput_mesg('', $_SESSION['dol_events']['mesgs']);
6449  unset($_SESSION['dol_events']['mesgs']);
6450  }
6451 
6452  // Show errors
6453  if (isset($_SESSION['dol_events']['errors'])) {
6454  if (empty($disabledoutputofmessages)) dol_htmloutput_mesg('', $_SESSION['dol_events']['errors'], 'error');
6455  unset($_SESSION['dol_events']['errors']);
6456  }
6457 
6458  // Show warnings
6459  if (isset($_SESSION['dol_events']['warnings'])) {
6460  if (empty($disabledoutputofmessages)) dol_htmloutput_mesg('', $_SESSION['dol_events']['warnings'], 'warning');
6461  unset($_SESSION['dol_events']['warnings']);
6462  }
6463 }
6464 
6479 function get_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring = '', $mesgarray = '', $style = 'ok', $keepembedded = 0)
6480 {
6481  global $conf, $langs;
6482 
6483  $ret=0; $return='';
6484  $out='';
6485  $divstart=$divend='';
6486 
6487  // If inline message with no format, we add it.
6488  if ((empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) || ! empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_JQUERY_JNOTIFY) || $keepembedded) && ! preg_match('/<div class=".*">/i', $out))
6489  {
6490  $divstart='<div class="'.$style.' clearboth">';
6491  $divend='</div>';
6492  }
6493 
6494  if ((is_array($mesgarray) && count($mesgarray)) || $mesgstring)
6495  {
6496  $langs->load("errors");
6497  $out.=$divstart;
6498  if (is_array($mesgarray) && count($mesgarray))
6499  {
6500  foreach($mesgarray as $message)
6501  {
6502  $ret++;
6503  $out.= $langs->trans($message);
6504  if ($ret < count($mesgarray)) $out.= "<br>\n";
6505  }
6506  }
6507  if ($mesgstring)
6508  {
6509  $langs->load("errors");
6510  $ret++;
6511  $out.= $langs->trans($mesgstring);
6512  }
6513  $out.=$divend;
6514  }
6515 
6516  if ($out)
6517  {
6518  if (! empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_JQUERY_JNOTIFY) && empty($keepembedded))
6519  {
6520  $return = '<script>
6521  $(document).ready(function() {
6522  var block = '.(! empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_JQUERY_BLOCKUI)?"true":"false").'
6523  if (block) {
6524  $.dolEventValid("","'.dol_escape_js($out).'");
6525  } else {
6526  /* jnotify(message, preset of message type, keepmessage) */
6527  $.jnotify("'.dol_escape_js($out).'",
6528  "'.($style=="ok" ? 3000 : $style).'",
6529  '.($style=="ok" ? "false" : "true").',
6530  { remove: function (){} } );
6531  }
6532  });
6533  </script>';
6534  }
6535  else
6536  {
6537  $return = $out;
6538  }
6539  }
6540 
6541  return $return;
6542 }
6543 
6555 function get_htmloutput_errors($mesgstring = '', $mesgarray = array(), $keepembedded = 0)
6556 {
6557  return get_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring, $mesgarray, 'error', $keepembedded);
6558 }
6559 
6573 function dol_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring = '', $mesgarray = array(), $style = 'ok', $keepembedded = 0)
6574 {
6575  if (empty($mesgstring) && (! is_array($mesgarray) || count($mesgarray) == 0)) return;
6576 
6577  $iserror=0;
6578  $iswarning=0;
6579  if (is_array($mesgarray))
6580  {
6581  foreach($mesgarray as $val)
6582  {
6583  if ($val && preg_match('/class="error"/i', $val)) { $iserror++; break; }
6584  if ($val && preg_match('/class="warning"/i', $val)) { $iswarning++; break; }
6585  }
6586  }
6587  elseif ($mesgstring && preg_match('/class="error"/i', $mesgstring)) $iserror++;
6588  elseif ($mesgstring && preg_match('/class="warning"/i', $mesgstring)) $iswarning++;
6589  if ($style=='error') $iserror++;
6590  if ($style=='warning') $iswarning++;
6591 
6592  if ($iserror || $iswarning)
6593  {
6594  // Remove div from texts
6595  $mesgstring=preg_replace('/<\/div><div class="(error|warning)">/', '<br>', $mesgstring);
6596  $mesgstring=preg_replace('/<div class="(error|warning)">/', '', $mesgstring);
6597  $mesgstring=preg_replace('/<\/div>/', '', $mesgstring);
6598  // Remove div from texts array
6599  if (is_array($mesgarray))
6600  {
6601  $newmesgarray=array();
6602  foreach($mesgarray as $val)
6603  {
6604  if (is_string($val))
6605  {
6606  $tmpmesgstring=preg_replace('/<\/div><div class="(error|warning)">/', '<br>', $val);
6607  $tmpmesgstring=preg_replace('/<div class="(error|warning)">/', '', $tmpmesgstring);
6608  $tmpmesgstring=preg_replace('/<\/div>/', '', $tmpmesgstring);
6609  $newmesgarray[]=$tmpmesgstring;
6610  }
6611  else
6612  {
6613  dol_syslog("Error call of dol_htmloutput_mesg with an array with a value that is not a string", LOG_WARNING);
6614  }
6615  }
6616  $mesgarray=$newmesgarray;
6617  }
6618  print get_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring, $mesgarray, ($iserror?'error':'warning'), $keepembedded);
6619  }
6620  else print get_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring, $mesgarray, 'ok', $keepembedded);
6621 }
6622 
6634 function dol_htmloutput_errors($mesgstring = '', $mesgarray = array(), $keepembedded = 0)
6635 {
6636  dol_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring, $mesgarray, 'error', $keepembedded);
6637 }
6638 
6652 function dol_sort_array(&$array, $index, $order = 'asc', $natsort = 0, $case_sensitive = 0, $keepindex = 0)
6653 {
6654  // Clean parameters
6655  $order=strtolower($order);
6656 
6657  if (is_array($array))
6658  {
6659  $sizearray=count($array);
6660  if ($sizearray>0)
6661  {
6662  $temp = array();
6663  foreach(array_keys($array) as $key)
6664  {
6665  if (is_object($array[$key]))
6666  {
6667  $temp[$key]=$array[$key]->$index;
6668  }
6669  else
6670  {
6671  $temp[$key]=$array[$key][$index];
6672  }
6673  }
6674 
6675  if (! $natsort) {
6676  ($order=='asc') ? asort($temp) : arsort($temp);
6677  } else {
6678  ($case_sensitive) ? natsort($temp) : natcasesort($temp);
6679  if($order!='asc') $temp=array_reverse($temp, true);
6680  }
6681 
6682  $sorted = array();
6683 
6684  foreach(array_keys($temp) as $key)
6685  {
6686  (is_numeric($key) && empty($keepindex)) ? $sorted[]=$array[$key] : $sorted[$key]=$array[$key];
6687  }
6688 
6689  return $sorted;
6690  }
6691  }
6692  return $array;
6693 }
6694 
6695 
6702 function utf8_check($str)
6703 {
6704  // We must use here a binary strlen function (so not dol_strlen)
6705  $strLength = dol_strlen($str);
6706  for ($i=0; $i<$strLength; $i++)
6707  {
6708  if (ord($str[$i]) < 0x80) continue; // 0bbbbbbb
6709  elseif ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xE0) == 0xC0) $n=1; // 110bbbbb
6710  elseif ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xF0) == 0xE0) $n=2; // 1110bbbb
6711  elseif ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xF8) == 0xF0) $n=3; // 11110bbb
6712  elseif ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xFC) == 0xF8) $n=4; // 111110bb
6713  elseif ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xFE) == 0xFC) $n=5; // 1111110b
6714  else return false; // Does not match any model
6715  for ($j=0; $j<$n; $j++) { // n bytes matching 10bbbbbb follow ?
6716  if ((++$i == strlen($str)) || ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xC0) != 0x80))
6717  return false;
6718  }
6719  }
6720  return true;
6721 }
6722 
6723 
6731 function dol_osencode($str)
6732 {
6733  global $conf;
6734 
6735  $tmp=ini_get("unicode.filesystem_encoding"); // Disponible avec PHP 6.0
6736  if (empty($tmp) && ! empty($_SERVER["WINDIR"])) $tmp='iso-8859-1'; // By default for windows
6737  if (empty($tmp)) $tmp='utf-8'; // By default for other
6738  if (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_FILESYSTEM_ENCODING)) $tmp=$conf->global->MAIN_FILESYSTEM_ENCODING;
6739 
6740  if ($tmp == 'iso-8859-1') return utf8_decode($str);
6741  return $str;
6742 }
6743 
6744 
6758 function dol_getIdFromCode($db, $key, $tablename, $fieldkey = 'code', $fieldid = 'id', $entityfilter = 0)
6759 {
6760  global $cache_codes;
6761 
6762  // If key empty
6763  if ($key == '') return '';
6764 
6765  // Check in cache
6766  if (isset($cache_codes[$tablename][$key][$fieldid])) // Can be defined to 0 or ''
6767  {
6768  return $cache_codes[$tablename][$key][$fieldid]; // Found in cache
6769  }
6770 
6771  dol_syslog('dol_getIdFromCode (value for field '.$fieldid.' from key '.$key.' not found into cache)', LOG_DEBUG);
6772 
6773  $sql = "SELECT ".$fieldid." as valuetoget";
6774  $sql.= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$tablename;
6775  $sql.= " WHERE ".$fieldkey." = '".$db->escape($key)."'";
6776  if (! empty($entityfilter))
6777  $sql.= " AND entity IN (" . getEntity($tablename) . ")";
6778 
6779  $resql = $db->query($sql);
6780  if ($resql)
6781  {
6782  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
6783  if ($obj) $cache_codes[$tablename][$key][$fieldid]=$obj->valuetoget;
6784  else $cache_codes[$tablename][$key][$fieldid]='';
6785  $db->free($resql);
6786  return $cache_codes[$tablename][$key][$fieldid];
6787  }
6788  else
6789  {
6790  return -1;
6791  }
6792 }
6793 
6800 function verifCond($strRights)
6801 {
6802  global $user,$conf,$langs;
6803  global $leftmenu;
6804  global $rights; // To export to dol_eval function
6805 
6806  //print $strRights."<br>\n";
6807  $rights = true;
6808  if ($strRights != '')
6809  {
6810  $str = 'if(!(' . $strRights . ')) { $rights = false; }';
6811  dol_eval($str); // The dol_eval must contains all the global $xxx used into a condition
6812  }
6813  return $rights;
6814 }
6815 
6825 function dol_eval($s, $returnvalue = 0, $hideerrors = 1)
6826 {
6827  // Only global variables can be changed by eval function and returned to caller
6828  global $db, $langs, $user, $conf, $website, $websitepage;
6829  global $action, $mainmenu, $leftmenu;
6830  global $rights;
6831  global $object;
6832  global $mysoc;
6833 
6834  global $obj; // To get $obj used into list when dol_eval is used for computed fields and $obj is not yet $object
6835  global $soc; // For backward compatibility
6836 
6837  //print $s."<br>\n";
6838  if ($returnvalue)
6839  {
6840  if ($hideerrors) return @eval('return '.$s.';');
6841  else return eval('return '.$s.';');
6842  }
6843  else
6844  {
6845  if ($hideerrors) @eval($s);
6846  else eval($s);
6847  }
6848 }
6849 
6856 function dol_validElement($element)
6857 {
6858  return (trim($element) != '');
6859 }
6860 
6868 function picto_from_langcode($codelang, $moreatt = '')
6869 {
6870  global $langs;
6871 
6872  if (empty($codelang)) return '';
6873 
6874  if ($codelang == 'auto')
6875  {
6876  return '<span class="fa fa-globe"></span>';
6877  }
6878 
6879  $langtocountryflag = array(
6880  'ar_AR' => '',
6881  'ca_ES' => 'catalonia',
6882  'da_DA' => 'dk',
6883  'fr_CA' => 'mq',
6884  'sv_SV' => 'se'
6885  );
6886 
6887  if (isset($langtocountryflag[$codelang])) $flagImage = $langtocountryflag[$codelang];
6888  else
6889  {
6890  $tmparray = explode('_', $codelang);
6891  $flagImage = empty($tmparray[1]) ? $tmparray[0] : $tmparray[1];
6892  }
6893 
6894  return img_picto_common($codelang, 'flags/'.strtolower($flagImage).'.png', $moreatt);
6895 }
6896 
6904 function getLanguageCodeFromCountryCode($countrycode)
6905 {
6906  global $mysoc;
6907 
6908  if (empty($countrycode)) return null;
6909 
6910  if (strtoupper($countrycode) == 'MQ') return 'fr_CA';
6911  if (strtoupper($countrycode) == 'SE') return 'sv_SE'; // se_SE is Sami/Sweden, and we want in priority sv_SE for SE country
6912  if (strtoupper($countrycode) == 'CH')
6913  {
6914  if ($mysoc->country_code == 'FR') return 'fr_CH';
6915  if ($mysoc->country_code == 'DE') return 'de_CH';
6916  }
6917 
6918  // Locale list taken from:
6919  // http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3191664/
6920  // list-of-all-locales-and-their-short-codes
6921  $locales = array(
6922  'af-ZA',
6923  'am-ET',
6924  'ar-AE',
6925  'ar-BH',
6926  'ar-DZ',
6927  'ar-EG',
6928  'ar-IQ',
6929  'ar-JO',
6930  'ar-KW',
6931  'ar-LB',
6932  'ar-LY',
6933  'ar-MA',
6934  'ar-OM',
6935  'ar-QA',
6936  'ar-SA',
6937  'ar-SY',
6938  'ar-TN',
6939  'ar-YE',
6940  'as-IN',
6941  'ba-RU',
6942  'be-BY',
6943  'bg-BG',
6944  'bn-BD',
6945  'bn-IN',
6946  'bo-CN',
6947  'br-FR',
6948  'ca-ES',
6949  'co-FR',
6950  'cs-CZ',
6951  'cy-GB',
6952  'da-DK',
6953  'de-AT',
6954  'de-CH',
6955  'de-DE',
6956  'de-LI',
6957  'de-LU',
6958  'dv-MV',
6959  'el-GR',
6960  'en-AU',
6961  'en-BZ',
6962  'en-CA',
6963  'en-GB',
6964  'en-IE',
6965  'en-IN',
6966  'en-JM',
6967  'en-MY',
6968  'en-NZ',
6969  'en-PH',
6970  'en-SG',
6971  'en-TT',
6972  'en-US',
6973  'en-ZA',
6974  'en-ZW',
6975  'es-AR',
6976  'es-BO',
6977  'es-CL',
6978  'es-CO',
6979  'es-CR',
6980  'es-DO',
6981  'es-EC',
6982  'es-ES',
6983  'es-GT',
6984  'es-HN',
6985  'es-MX',
6986  'es-NI',
6987  'es-PA',
6988  'es-PE',
6989  'es-PR',
6990  'es-PY',
6991  'es-SV',
6992  'es-US',
6993  'es-UY',
6994  'es-VE',
6995  'et-EE',
6996  'eu-ES',
6997  'fa-IR',
6998  'fi-FI',
6999  'fo-FO',
7000  'fr-BE',
7001  'fr-CA',
7002  'fr-CH',
7003  'fr-FR',
7004  'fr-LU',
7005  'fr-MC',
7006  'fy-NL',
7007  'ga-IE',
7008  'gd-GB',
7009  'gl-ES',
7010  'gu-IN',
7011  'he-IL',
7012  'hi-IN',
7013  'hr-BA',
7014  'hr-HR',
7015  'hu-HU',
7016  'hy-AM',
7017  'id-ID',
7018  'ig-NG',
7019  'ii-CN',
7020  'is-IS',
7021  'it-CH',
7022  'it-IT',
7023  'ja-JP',
7024  'ka-GE',
7025  'kk-KZ',
7026  'kl-GL',
7027  'km-KH',
7028  'kn-IN',
7029  'ko-KR',
7030  'ky-KG',
7031  'lb-LU',
7032  'lo-LA',
7033  'lt-LT',
7034  'lv-LV',
7035  'mi-NZ',
7036  'mk-MK',
7037  'ml-IN',
7038  'mn-MN',
7039  'mr-IN',
7040  'ms-BN',
7041  'ms-MY',
7042  'mt-MT',
7043  'nb-NO',
7044  'ne-NP',
7045  'nl-BE',
7046  'nl-NL',
7047  'nn-NO',
7048  'oc-FR',
7049  'or-IN',
7050  'pa-IN',
7051  'pl-PL',
7052  'ps-AF',
7053  'pt-BR',
7054  'pt-PT',
7055  'rm-CH',
7056  'ro-RO',
7057  'ru-RU',
7058  'rw-RW',
7059  'sa-IN',
7060  'se-FI',
7061  'se-NO',
7062  'se-SE',
7063  'si-LK',
7064  'sk-SK',
7065  'sl-SI',
7066  'sq-AL',
7067  'sv-FI',
7068  'sv-SE',
7069  'sw-KE',
7070  'ta-IN',
7071  'te-IN',
7072  'th-TH',
7073  'tk-TM',
7074  'tn-ZA',
7075  'tr-TR',
7076  'tt-RU',
7077  'ug-CN',
7078  'uk-UA',
7079  'ur-PK',
7080  'vi-VN',
7081  'wo-SN',
7082  'xh-ZA',
7083  'yo-NG',
7084  'zh-CN',
7085  'zh-HK',
7086  'zh-MO',
7087  'zh-SG',
7088  'zh-TW',
7089  'zu-ZA',
7090  );
7091 
7092  $buildprimarykeytotest = strtolower($countrycode).'-'.strtoupper($countrycode);
7093  if (in_array($buildprimarykeytotest, $locales)) return strtolower($countrycode).'_'.strtoupper($countrycode);
7094 
7095  if (function_exists('locale_get_primary_language') && function_exists('locale_get_region')) // Need extension php-intl
7096  {
7097  foreach ($locales as $locale)
7098  {
7099  $locale_language = locale_get_primary_language($locale);
7100  $locale_region = locale_get_region($locale);
7101  if (strtoupper($countrycode) == $locale_region)
7102  {
7103  //var_dump($locale.'-'.$locale_language.'-'.$locale_region);
7104  return strtolower($locale_language).'_'.strtoupper($locale_region);
7105  }
7106  }
7107  }
7108  else
7109  {
7110  dol_syslog("Warning Exention php-intl is not available", LOG_WARNING);
7111  }
7112 
7113  return null;
7114 }
7115 
7145 function complete_head_from_modules($conf, $langs, $object, &$head, &$h, $type, $mode = 'add')
7146 {
7147  global $hookmanager;
7148 
7149  if (isset($conf->modules_parts['tabs'][$type]) && is_array($conf->modules_parts['tabs'][$type]))
7150  {
7151  foreach ($conf->modules_parts['tabs'][$type] as $value)
7152  {
7153  $values=explode(':', $value);
7154 
7155  if ($mode == 'add' && ! preg_match('/^\-/', $values[1]))
7156  {
7157  if (count($values) == 6) // new declaration with permissions: $value='objecttype:+tabname1:Title1:langfile@mymodule:$user->rights->mymodule->read:/mymodule/mynewtab1.php?id=__ID__'
7158  {
7159  if ($values[0] != $type) continue;
7160 
7161  if (verifCond($values[4]))
7162  {
7163  if ($values[3]) $langs->load($values[3]);
7164  if (preg_match('/SUBSTITUTION_([^_]+)/i', $values[2], $reg))
7165  {
7166  $substitutionarray=array();
7167  complete_substitutions_array($substitutionarray, $langs, $object, array('needforkey'=>$values[2]));
7168  $label=make_substitutions($reg[1], $substitutionarray);
7169  }
7170  else $label=$langs->trans($values[2]);
7171 
7172  $head[$h][0] = dol_buildpath(preg_replace('/__ID__/i', ((is_object($object) && ! empty($object->id))?$object->id:''), $values[5]), 1);
7173  $head[$h][1] = $label;
7174  $head[$h][2] = str_replace('+', '', $values[1]);
7175  $h++;
7176  }
7177  }
7178  elseif (count($values) == 5) // deprecated
7179  {
7180  dol_syslog('Passing 5 values in tabs module_parts is deprecated. Please update to 6 with permissions.', LOG_WARNING);
7181 
7182  if ($values[0] != $type) continue;
7183  if ($values[3]) $langs->load($values[3]);
7184  if (preg_match('/SUBSTITUTION_([^_]+)/i', $values[2], $reg))
7185  {
7186  $substitutionarray=array();
7187  complete_substitutions_array($substitutionarray, $langs, $object, array('needforkey'=>$values[2]));
7188  $label=make_substitutions($reg[1], $substitutionarray);
7189  }
7190  else $label=$langs->trans($values[2]);
7191 
7192  $head[$h][0] = dol_buildpath(preg_replace('/__ID__/i', ((is_object($object) && ! empty($object->id))?$object->id:''), $values[4]), 1);
7193  $head[$h][1] = $label;
7194  $head[$h][2] = str_replace('+', '', $values[1]);
7195  $h++;
7196  }
7197  }
7198  elseif ($mode == 'remove' && preg_match('/^\-/', $values[1]))
7199  {
7200  if ($values[0] != $type) continue;
7201  $tabname=str_replace('-', '', $values[1]);
7202  foreach($head as $key => $val)
7203  {
7204  $condition = (! empty($values[3]) ? verifCond($values[3]) : 1);
7205  //var_dump($key.' - '.$tabname.' - '.$head[$key][2].' - '.$values[3].' - '.$condition);
7206  if ($head[$key][2]==$tabname && $condition)
7207  {
7208  unset($head[$key]);
7209  break;
7210  }
7211  }
7212  }
7213  }
7214  }
7215 
7216  // No need to make a return $head. Var is modified as a reference
7217  if (! empty($hookmanager))
7218  {
7219  $parameters=array('object' => $object, 'mode' => $mode, 'head' => $head);
7220  $reshook=$hookmanager->executeHooks('completeTabsHead', $parameters);
7221  if ($reshook > 0)
7222  {
7223  $head = $hookmanager->resArray;
7224  $h = count($head);
7225  }
7226  }
7227 }
7228 
7240 function printCommonFooter($zone = 'private')
7241 {
7242  global $conf, $hookmanager, $user, $debugbar;
7243  global $action;
7244  global $micro_start_time;
7245 
7246  if ($zone == 'private') print "\n".'<!-- Common footer for private page -->'."\n";
7247  else print "\n".'<!-- Common footer for public page -->'."\n";
7248 
7249  // A div to store page_y POST parameter so we can read it using javascript
7250  print "\n<!-- A div to store page_y POST parameter -->\n";
7251  print '<div id="page_y" style="display: none;">'.$_POST['page_y'].'</div>'."\n";
7252 
7253  $parameters=array();
7254  $reshook=$hookmanager->executeHooks('printCommonFooter', $parameters); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
7255  if (empty($reshook))
7256  {
7257  if (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_HTML_FOOTER)) print $conf->global->MAIN_HTML_FOOTER."\n";
7258 
7259  print "\n";
7260  if (! empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax))
7261  {
7262  print '<script>'."\n";
7263  print 'jQuery(document).ready(function() {'."\n";
7264 
7265  if ($zone == 'private' && empty($conf->dol_use_jmobile))
7266  {
7267  print "\n";
7268  print '/* JS CODE TO ENABLE to manage handler to switch left menu page (menuhider) */'."\n";
7269  print 'jQuery(".menuhider").click(function(event) {';
7270  print ' if (!$( "body" ).hasClass( "sidebar-collapse" )){ event.preventDefault(); }'."\n";
7271  print ' console.log("We click on .menuhider");'."\n";
7272  print ' $("body").toggleClass("sidebar-collapse")'."\n";
7273  print '});'."\n";
7274  }
7275 
7276  // Management of focus and mandatory for fields
7277  if ($action == 'create' || $action == 'edit' || (empty($action) && (preg_match('/new\.php/', $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"]))))
7278  {
7279  print '/* JS CODE TO ENABLE to manage focus and mandatory form fields */'."\n";
7280  $relativepathstring = $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"];
7281  // Clean $relativepathstring
7282  if (constant('DOL_URL_ROOT')) $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^'.preg_quote(constant('DOL_URL_ROOT'), '/').'/', '', $relativepathstring);
7283  $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^\//', '', $relativepathstring);
7284  $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^custom\//', '', $relativepathstring);
7285  $tmpqueryarraywehave=explode('&', dol_string_nohtmltag($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']));
7286  if (!empty($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['focus']))
7287  {
7288  foreach($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['focus'] as $defkey => $defval)
7289  {
7290  $qualified = 0;
7291  if ($defkey != '_noquery_')
7292  {
7293  $tmpqueryarraytohave=explode('&', $defkey);
7294  $foundintru=0;
7295  foreach($tmpqueryarraytohave as $tmpquerytohave)
7296  {
7297  if (! in_array($tmpquerytohave, $tmpqueryarraywehave)) $foundintru=1;
7298  }
7299  if (! $foundintru) $qualified=1;
7300  //var_dump($defkey.'-'.$qualified);
7301  }
7302  else $qualified = 1;
7303 
7304  if ($qualified)
7305  {
7306  foreach($defval as $paramkey => $paramval)
7307  {
7308  // Set focus on field
7309  print 'jQuery("input[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").focus();'."\n";
7310  print 'jQuery("textarea[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").focus();'."\n";
7311  print 'jQuery("select[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").focus();'."\n"; // Not really usefull, but we keep it in case of.
7312  }
7313  }
7314  }
7315  }
7316  if (!empty($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['mandatory']))
7317  {
7318  foreach($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['mandatory'] as $defkey => $defval)
7319  {
7320  $qualified = 0;
7321  if ($defkey != '_noquery_')
7322  {
7323  $tmpqueryarraytohave=explode('&', $defkey);
7324  $foundintru=0;
7325  foreach($tmpqueryarraytohave as $tmpquerytohave)
7326  {
7327  if (! in_array($tmpquerytohave, $tmpqueryarraywehave)) $foundintru=1;
7328  }
7329  if (! $foundintru) $qualified=1;
7330  //var_dump($defkey.'-'.$qualified);
7331  }
7332  else $qualified = 1;
7333 
7334  if ($qualified)
7335  {
7336  foreach($defval as $paramkey => $paramval)
7337  {
7338  // Add property 'required' on input
7339  print 'jQuery("input[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").prop(\'required\',true);'."\n";
7340  print 'jQuery("textarea[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").prop(\'required\',true);'."\n";
7341  print 'jQuery("select[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").prop(\'required\',true);'."\n"; // required on a select works only if key is "", this does not happen in Dolibarr
7342  }
7343  }
7344  }
7345  }
7346  }
7347 
7348  print '});'."\n";
7349 
7350  // Google Analytics
7351  // TODO Add a hook here
7352  if (! empty($conf->google->enabled) && ! empty($conf->global->MAIN_GOOGLE_AN_ID))
7353  {
7354  if (($conf->dol_use_jmobile != 4))
7355  {
7356  print "\n";
7357  print "/* JS CODE TO ENABLE for google analtics tag */\n";
7358  print ' var _gaq = _gaq || [];'."\n";
7359  print ' _gaq.push([\'_setAccount\', \''.$conf->global->MAIN_GOOGLE_AN_ID.'\']);'."\n";
7360  print ' _gaq.push([\'_trackPageview\']);'."\n";
7361  print ''."\n";
7362  print ' (function() {'."\n";
7363  print ' var ga = document.createElement(\'script\'); ga.type = \'text/javascript\'; ga.async = true;'."\n";
7364  print ' ga.src = (\'https:\' == document.location.protocol ? \'https://ssl\' : \'http://www\') + \'.google-analytics.com/ga.js\';'."\n";
7365  print ' var s = document.getElementsByTagName(\'script\')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);'."\n";
7366  print ' })();'."\n";
7367  }
7368  }
7369 
7370  // End of tuning
7371  if (! empty($_SERVER['MAIN_SHOW_TUNING_INFO']) || ! empty($conf->global->MAIN_SHOW_TUNING_INFO))
7372  {
7373  print "\n";
7374  print "/* JS CODE TO ENABLE to add memory info */\n";
7375  print 'window.console && console.log("';
7376  if (! empty($conf->global->MEMCACHED_SERVER)) print 'MEMCACHED_SERVER='.$conf->global->MEMCACHED_SERVER.' - ';
7377  print 'MAIN_OPTIMIZE_SPEED='.(isset($conf->global->MAIN_OPTIMIZE_SPEED)?$conf->global->MAIN_OPTIMIZE_SPEED:'off');
7378  if (! empty($micro_start_time)) // Works only if MAIN_SHOW_TUNING_INFO is defined at $_SERVER level. Not in global variable.
7379  {
7380  $micro_end_time = microtime(true);
7381  print ' - Build time: '.ceil(1000*($micro_end_time-$micro_start_time)).' ms';
7382  }
7383  if (function_exists("memory_get_usage"))
7384  {
7385  print ' - Mem: '.memory_get_usage();
7386  }
7387  if (function_exists("xdebug_memory_usage"))
7388  {
7389  print ' - XDebug time: '.ceil(1000*xdebug_time_index()).' ms';
7390  print ' - XDebug mem: '.xdebug_memory_usage();
7391  print ' - XDebug mem peak: '.xdebug_peak_memory_usage();
7392  }
7393  if (function_exists("zend_loader_file_encoded"))
7394  {
7395  print ' - Zend encoded file: '.(zend_loader_file_encoded()?'yes':'no');
7396  }
7397  print '");'."\n";
7398  }
7399 
7400  print "\n".'</script>'."\n";
7401  }
7402 
7403  // Add Xdebug coverage of code
7404  if (defined('XDEBUGCOVERAGE'))
7405  {
7406  print_r(xdebug_get_code_coverage());
7407  }
7408 
7409  // Add DebugBar data
7410  if (! empty($user->rights->debugbar->read) && is_object($debugbar))
7411  {
7412  $debugbar['time']->stopMeasure('pageaftermaster');
7413  print '<!-- Output debugbar data -->'."\n";
7414  print $debugbar->getRenderer()->render();
7415  }
7416  elseif (count($conf->logbuffer)) // If there is some logs in buffer to show
7417  {
7418  print "\n";
7419  print "<!-- Start of log output\n";
7420  //print '<div class="hidden">'."\n";
7421  foreach($conf->logbuffer as $logline)
7422  {
7423  print $logline."<br>\n";
7424  }
7425  //print '</div>'."\n";
7426  print "End of log output -->\n";
7427  }
7428  }
7429 }
7430 
7440 function dolExplodeIntoArray($string, $delimiter = ';', $kv = '=')
7441 {
7442  if ($a = explode($delimiter, $string))
7443  {
7444  $ka = array();
7445  foreach ($a as $s) { // each part
7446  if ($s) {
7447  if ($pos = strpos($s, $kv)) { // key/value delimiter
7448  $ka[trim(substr($s, 0, $pos))] = trim(substr($s, $pos + strlen($kv)));
7449  } else { // key delimiter not found
7450  $ka[] = trim($s);
7451  }
7452  }
7453  }
7454  return $ka;
7455  }
7456  return array();
7457 }
7458 
7459 
7466 function dol_set_focus($selector)
7467 {
7468  print "\n".'<!-- Set focus onto a specific field -->'."\n";
7469  print '<script>jQuery(document).ready(function() { jQuery("'.dol_escape_js($selector).'").focus(); });</script>'."\n";
7470 }
7471 
7472 
7480 function dol_getmypid()
7481 {
7482  if (! function_exists('getmypid')) {
7483  return mt_rand(1, 32768);
7484  } else {
7485  return getmypid();
7486  }
7487 }
7488 
7489 
7506 function natural_search($fields, $value, $mode = 0, $nofirstand = 0)
7507 {
7508  global $db,$langs;
7509 
7510  $value=trim($value);
7511 
7512  if ($mode == 0)
7513  {
7514  $value=preg_replace('/\*/', '%', $value); // Replace * with %
7515  }
7516  if ($mode == 1)
7517  {
7518  $value=preg_replace('/([<>=]+)\s+([0-9'.preg_quote($langs->trans("DecimalSeparator"), '/').'\-])/', '\1\2', $value); // Clean string '< 10' into '<10' so we can the explode on space to get all tests to do
7519  }
7520 
7521  $value = preg_replace('/\s*\|\s*/', '|', $value);
7522 
7523  $crits = explode(' ', $value);
7524  $res = '';
7525  if (! is_array($fields)) $fields = array($fields);
7526 
7527  $nboffields = count($fields);
7528  $end2 = count($crits);
7529  $j = 0;
7530  foreach ($crits as $crit)
7531  {
7532  $i = 0; $i2 = 0;
7533  $newres = '';
7534  foreach ($fields as $field)
7535  {
7536  if ($mode == 1)
7537  {
7538  $operator='=';
7539  $newcrit = preg_replace('/([<>=]+)/', '', trim($crit));
7540 
7541  preg_match('/([<>=]+)/', trim($crit), $reg);
7542  if ($reg[1])
7543  {
7544  $operator = $reg[1];
7545  }
7546  if ($newcrit != '')
7547  {
7548  $numnewcrit = price2num($newcrit);
7549  if (is_numeric($numnewcrit))
7550  {
7551  $newres .= ($i2 > 0 ? ' OR ' : '') . $field . ' '.$operator.' '.$numnewcrit;
7552  }
7553  else
7554  {
7555  $newres .= ($i2 > 0 ? ' OR ' : '') . '1 = 2'; // force false
7556  }
7557  $i2++; // a criteria was added to string
7558  }
7559  }
7560  elseif ($mode == 2)
7561  {
7562  $newres .= ($i2 > 0 ? ' OR ' : '') . $field . " IN (" . $db->escape(trim($crit)) . ")";
7563  $i2++; // a criteria was added to string
7564  }
7565  elseif ($mode == 3)
7566  {
7567  $tmparray=explode(',', trim($crit));
7568  if (count($tmparray))
7569  {
7570  $listofcodes='';
7571  foreach($tmparray as $val)
7572  {
7573  if ($val)
7574  {
7575  $listofcodes.=($listofcodes?',':'');
7576  $listofcodes.="'".$db->escape(trim($val))."'";
7577  }
7578  }
7579  $newres .= ($i2 > 0 ? ' OR ' : '') . $field . " IN (" . $listofcodes . ")";
7580  $i2++; // a criteria was added to string
7581  }
7582  }
7583  elseif ($mode == 4)
7584  {
7585  $tmparray=explode(',', trim($crit));
7586  if (count($tmparray))
7587  {
7588  $listofcodes='';
7589  foreach($tmparray as $val)
7590  {
7591  if ($val)
7592  {
7593  $newres .= ($i2 > 0 ? ' OR (' : '(') . $field . ' LIKE \'' . $db->escape(trim($val)) . ',%\'';
7594  $newres .= ' OR '. $field . ' = \'' . $db->escape(trim($val)) . '\'';
7595  $newres .= ' OR '. $field . ' LIKE \'%,' . $db->escape(trim($val)) . '\'';
7596  $newres .= ' OR '. $field . ' LIKE \'%,' . $db->escape(trim($val)) . ',%\'';
7597  $newres .= ')';
7598  $i2++;
7599  }
7600  }
7601  }
7602  }
7603  else // $mode=0
7604  {
7605  $textcrit = '';
7606  $tmpcrits = explode('|', $crit);
7607  $i3 = 0;
7608  foreach($tmpcrits as $tmpcrit)
7609  {
7610  if(empty($tmpcrit)) continue;
7611 
7612  $newres .= (($i2 > 0 || $i3 > 0) ? ' OR ' : '');
7613 
7614  if (preg_match('/\.(id|rowid)$/', $field)) // Special case for rowid that is sometimes a ref so used as a search field
7615  {
7616  $newres .= $field . " = " . (is_numeric(trim($tmpcrit))?trim($tmpcrit):'0');
7617  }
7618  else
7619  {
7620  $newres .= $field . " LIKE '";
7621 
7622  $tmpcrit=trim($tmpcrit);
7623  $tmpcrit2=$tmpcrit;
7624  $tmpbefore='%'; $tmpafter='%';
7625  if (preg_match('/^[\^\$]/', $tmpcrit))
7626  {
7627  $tmpbefore='';
7628  $tmpcrit2 = preg_replace('/^[\^\$]/', '', $tmpcrit2);
7629  }
7630  if (preg_match('/[\^\$]$/', $tmpcrit))
7631  {
7632  $tmpafter='';
7633  $tmpcrit2 = preg_replace('/[\^\$]$/', '', $tmpcrit2);
7634  }
7635  $newres .= $tmpbefore;
7636  $newres .= $db->escape($tmpcrit2);
7637  $newres .= $tmpafter;
7638  $newres .= "'";
7639  if ($tmpcrit2 == '')
7640  {
7641  $newres .= ' OR ' . $field . " IS NULL";
7642  }
7643  }
7644 
7645  $i3++;
7646  }
7647  $i2++; // a criteria was added to string
7648  }
7649  $i++;
7650  }
7651  if ($newres) $res = $res . ($res ? ' AND ' : '') . ($i2 > 1 ? '(' : '') .$newres . ($i2 > 1 ? ')' : '');
7652  $j++;
7653  }
7654  $res = ($nofirstand?"":" AND ")."(" . $res . ")";
7655  //print 'xx'.$res.'yy';
7656  return $res;
7657 }
7658 
7665 function showDirectDownloadLink($object)
7666 {
7667  global $conf, $langs;
7668 
7669  $out='';
7670  $url = $object->getLastMainDocLink($object->element);
7671 
7672  if ($url)
7673  {
7674  $out.= img_picto('', 'object_globe.png').' '.$langs->trans("DirectDownloadLink").'<br>';
7675  $out.= '<input type="text" id="directdownloadlink" class="quatrevingtpercent" value="'.$url.'">';
7676  $out.= ajax_autoselect("directdownloadlink", 0);
7677  }
7678  return $out;
7679 }
7680 
7689 function getImageFileNameForSize($file, $extName, $extImgTarget = '')
7690 {
7691  $dirName = dirname($file);
7692  if ($dirName == '.') $dirName='';
7693 
7694  $fileName = preg_replace('/(\.gif|\.jpeg|\.jpg|\.png|\.bmp)$/i', '', $file); // We remove extension, whatever is its case
7695  $fileName = basename($fileName);
7696 
7697  if (empty($extImgTarget)) $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.jpg$/i', $file)?'.jpg':'');
7698  if (empty($extImgTarget)) $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.jpeg$/i', $file)?'.jpeg':'');
7699  if (empty($extImgTarget)) $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.gif$/i', $file)?'.gif':'');
7700  if (empty($extImgTarget)) $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.png$/i', $file)?'.png':'');
7701  if (empty($extImgTarget)) $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.bmp$/i', $file)?'.bmp':'');
7702 
7703  if (! $extImgTarget) return $file;
7704 
7705  $subdir='';
7706  if ($extName) $subdir = 'thumbs/';
7707 
7708  return ($dirName?$dirName.'/':'').$subdir.$fileName.$extName.$extImgTarget; // New filename for thumb
7709 }
7710 
7711 
7721 function getAdvancedPreviewUrl($modulepart, $relativepath, $alldata = 0, $param = '')
7722 {
7723  global $conf, $langs;
7724 
7725  if (empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) return '';
7726 
7727  $mime_preview = array('bmp', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif', 'tiff', 'pdf', 'plain', 'css', 'svg+xml');
7728  //$mime_preview[]='vnd.oasis.opendocument.presentation';
7729  //$mime_preview[]='archive';
7730  $num_mime = array_search(dol_mimetype($relativepath, '', 1), $mime_preview);
7731 
7732  if ($alldata == 1)
7733  {
7734  if ($num_mime !== false) return array('target'=>'_blank', 'css'=>'documentpreview', 'url'=>DOL_URL_ROOT.'/document.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&attachment=0&file='.urlencode($relativepath).($param?'&'.$param:''), 'mime'=>dol_mimetype($relativepath), );
7735  else return array();
7736  }
7737 
7738  // old behavior
7739  if ($num_mime !== false) return 'javascript:document_preview(\''.dol_escape_js(DOL_URL_ROOT.'/document.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&attachment=0&file='.urlencode($relativepath).($param?'&'.$param:'')).'\', \''.dol_mimetype($relativepath).'\', \''.dol_escape_js($langs->trans('Preview')).'\')';
7740  else return '';
7741 }
7742 
7743 
7751 function ajax_autoselect($htmlname, $addlink = '')
7752 {
7753  global $langs;
7754  $out = '<script>
7755  jQuery(document).ready(function () {
7756  jQuery("#'.$htmlname.'").click(function() { jQuery(this).select(); } );
7757  });
7758  </script>';
7759  if ($addlink) $out.=' <a href="'.$addlink.'" target="_blank">'.$langs->trans("Link").'</a>';
7760  return $out;
7761 }
7762 
7763 
7773 function dol_mimetype($file, $default = 'application/octet-stream', $mode = 0)
7774 {
7775  $mime=$default;
7776  $imgmime='other.png';
7777  $famime='file-o';
7778  $srclang='';
7779 
7780  $tmpfile=preg_replace('/\.noexe$/', '', $file);
7781 
7782  // Text files
7783  if (preg_match('/\.txt$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime='text/plain'; $imgmime='text.png'; $famime='file-text-o'; }
7784  if (preg_match('/\.rtx$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime='text/richtext'; $imgmime='text.png'; $famime='file-text-o'; }
7785  if (preg_match('/\.csv$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime='text/csv'; $imgmime='text.png'; $famime='file-text-o'; }
7786  if (preg_match('/\.tsv$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime='text/tab-separated-values'; $imgmime='text.png'; $famime='file-text-o'; }
7787  if (preg_match('/\.(cf|conf|log)$/i', $tmpfile)) { $mime='text/plain'; $imgmime='text.png'; $famime='file-text-o'; }
